Jane, aged 32, is a widowed mother of two children, aged 20 and 18 years.
She sells jackets, handbags and clothes by hawking (selling on foot), a business she has been doing for seven years. It earns her a monthly income of 38,800 Kenyan shillings.
This is her fifth loan from KADET LTD., and she has a good credit history with KADET. She will use the loan amount to buy more jackets, handbags and clothes for sale. Jane hopes to start importing clothes on her own in the future.

loan.use: To buy jackets, handbags and clothes for sale.

loan.name: Unidas De Saguazu Group

texts.es: En la zona denominada Saguazu, ciudad de Yaguarn a 23 Km. de la ciudad de Paraguar, se renen un grupo de mujeres con el fn de mejorar sus ingresos sobre el programa ofrecido por la Fundacin Paraguaya, es as que realizan la reunin, la cual les ha resultado una interesante oportunidad por lo que deciden conformar el comit. El comit lleva por nombre Unidas de Saguazu por estar integrada por mujeres que siempre han trabajado unidas para todas las actividades, mantenindose juntas bajo un marco de respeto mutuo entre todas, actualmente se encuentran en el 8vo ciclo con calificacin excelente, integrada por 17 mujeres valientes quienes invierten sus crditos en sus actividades diarias. La Sra. Emiliana necesita de este prstamo para la compra de alimentos de sus cerdos, ya que esto le permitir comercializar luego y obtener as un ingreso que le ayude a solventar los gastos diarios. Ella es una mujer que lucha cada da para progresar de entre la pobreza en la que se encuentra.
texts.en:
In the Saguazu zone in Yaguarn city, 23 km from the city of Paraguar, there is a group of women who hope to improve their lives through the microfinance program offered by Fundacin Paraguaya. The group meets in Saguazu, and all the members agree that the program is a unique opportunity for each of them.
The group is called Unidas de Saguazu ('United Women of Saguazu'), to represent the 17 remarkable women members who invest their loans in their businesses and come together in the spirit of mutual respect for one another. They are currently in their 8th loan cycle with an excellent credit history.
Emiliana needs a loan to buy feed for her pigs. She raises the pigs and later sells them, using the sales profit to meet daily household expenses. She struggles every day to keep her family out of poverty through her hard work.

loan.use: To buy a feed-weighing scale for her pig raising business.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase more products to sell

loan.name: Dogratias

texts.fr: Dogratias est commerant et agriculteur des pommes de terre, il est le client dACB depuis 2009.il a 58 ans, il a 5 enfants entre 23 ans et 39 ans. Un de ses enfant va lecole.Dogratias ne RUBAVU au RWANDA, il a 6 ans des tudes primaire.son crdit est la 1er cycle avec ACB .il va utilise son crdit de 400 000 FRW pour acheter 800kgs des pommes de terre, 50 sacs ,2 L detane (type dinsecticide), et payement de main duvre pour son business.ses stratgies pour la croissance de laffaire est daugmenter la capacit de laffaire, dvelopper son business. Pour la famille il voudrait btir sa propre maison dhabitation, payer les frais dtudes secondaire pour son enfant.Deogratias est aussi vangliste.
texts.en: Dogratias is a shopkeeper and a potato grower. He has been an Amasezerano client since 2009. He is 58 years old and has five children between the ages of 23 and 39. One of his children goes to school. Dogratias is born in RUBAVU, RWANDA. He has six years of primary school education. His loan is his first cycle with Amasezerano. He is going to use his 400,000 loan to purchase 800 kilos of potatoes, 50 two-litter bags of detane (a type of insecticide), and to hire some labor for his business. His business growth strategy is to increase the business capacity to develop the company. On the family side, he would like to build his own house and pay the expenses of his child's secondary education. Deogratias is also an evangelist.

loan.use: to purchase 800 kilos of potatoes, 50 two-liter bags of detane (a type of insecticide) and to pay the workforce for his business.

loan.name: 24 De Enero Group

texts.es: Este Comit se form gracias a la Sra. Irma Elvira que vive en la ciudad D. Belen. El motivo por el cual la presidenta se esforz en formar este grupo fue la D. querer ayudar a cada una D. ellas ya que todas tienen ganas D. salir adelante por todo el esfuerzo que estn realizando en este pequeo lapso D. tiempo que llevan dentro del comit. Encantadas aceptaron conformar el comit D. mujeres emprendedoras Nombrndolo Comit 24 D. Enero. El comit cuenta con veinte (20) integrantes en donD. todas tienen una pequea actividad a la cual dedicarse por ms pequea que sea, las seoras se sienten muy emocionadas, la ayuda mutua entre ellas es constante y por sobre todo las inspira las ganas D. seguir luchando por sus familias, el trabajo en quipo y utilizando todos sus recursos disponibles hace D. sus luchas su mayor fortaleza. Una D. las integrantes, Catalina, espera conseguir el crdito para poder comprar productos varios D. mercera y lencera al por mayor y destinarlos a la reventa a los negocios ms pequeos como los almacenes, y as seguir con sus objetivos D. superarse cada da ms.
texts.en:
This committee was formed thanks to Irma Elvira who lives in the city of B.. The reason why the group President put in such an effort to form this group was wanting to help each one of them because they all want to get ahead through all the effort they are putting into it in the short period of time theyve been in the committee. They gladly accepted to form a womens committee that they called Comit 24 D. Enero (January 24 Committee.)
The committee has 20 members. Each has a small business to dedicate herself to regardless of its size. The women feel very excited; mutual help among them is constant and, above all, they are inspired by the desire to continue fighting for their families, working as a team and using all available resources makes their struggles their greatest strength.
One of the members, Catalina, hopes to get the loan to buy various notions and lingerie at wholesale to resell to smaller businesses, like stores, thus attaining her goal of improving more each day.

loan.use: to buy notions and lingerie.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase additional products

loan.name: Kazinga Development Group

texts.en: Banard, 36, sells maize and beans to earn his living. This business, which he began two years ago, has, in a way, significantly enabled him support to his family of three kids and his wife. Banard lives and operates his business from Kihihi. He sells his foods in food markets in the district. It goes without saying that his business has not lasted so long but Banard says it's been worthwhile, especially in terms of bringing in some income for him. He says hard work is a principal factor he firmly believes in. Weekly, he says he makes profits totaling to 80,000 shillings. With this loan, he says he is going to purchase more bags of beans and maize to resell. Banard is the one with the raised hand.

loan.use: to purchase more bags of maize and beans to resell.

loan.name: Neni Angelica

texts.es:
La Sra.Neni Angelica , pertenece al Banco Comunal Luz y Esperanza, Distrito de Tarapoto, Provincia de San Martin, Departamento de San Martn. Es Soltera, tiene una nia de 10 aos esta en el nivel primario .
Se inicia en la venta de productos de salchipapa lo deja por problemas de salud para luego dedicarce a la venta de cosmeticos y calzados con un capital de S / 500.00 nuevos soles, actividad que en la actualidad le da la oportunidad de generar sus propios ingresos y aportar as a la economa del hogar, y como mujer sentirse realizada.
Con este prstamo de S/. 2000.00 comprar productos de belleza para su stock como, perfumes y colonias para damas y caballeros, cremas, polvos compactos, talcos, locion de cuerpo, desodorantes lpices labiales, esmaltes de uas, asimismo zapatos y sandalias .
Neni , mujer Trabajadora se siente muy contenta y quiere continuar trabajando para la realizacin de sus ideas y est muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por ayudar a mujeres como ella a tener oportunidades de desarrollarse en el medio donde se desenvuelven.
texts.en:
Neni Anglica is a member of the "Luz y Esperanza" (Light and Hope) community bank which is located in Tarapoto district, in San Martin province, in San Martin department. She is single and has a 10 year-old daughter who is in elementary school.
Neni started out selling salchipapa (a traditional fast food). She left this business as a result of health problems and then started selling cosmetics and footwear with a capital of 500 Peruvian soles. This business currently gives her the opportunity to make her own income and contribute to her household finances. It also helps her to feel fulfilled as a woman.
With this loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles, Neni will buy beauty products to keep in stock such as ladies' and men's perfumes and colognes, creams, foundation, talcum powder, body lotion, deodorants, lipsticks, nail polish and also shoes and sandals.
Neni is a hard-working woman. She feels happy and would like to continue working to achieve her goals. She is very grateful to Movimiento Manuela Ramos for helping women such as herself to benefit from these opportunities to make progress.

loan.use: to buy beauty products such as ladies' and men's perfumes and colognes, creams, foundation, talcum powder, body lotion, deodorants, lipsticks, nail polish and also shoes and sandals

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase 12 trees and 40 metal sheets, and to rent a sand truck to build his own house.

loan.name: Taleh

texts.en:
Taleh is a successful father and dedicated husband and together with his wife he has two children. Taleh began a small grocery store seven years ago with a small amount of savings that he had earned as a carpenter. He was assisted by his father who helps him with serving his clients.
Today, his clientele has grown greater and his grocery has become more popular. He is asking for a loan so that he may expand the variety of goods that are sold in his store. Taleh is very grateful to everyone who is helping him to achieve successes in his business with this loan.

loan.use: purchase more foodstuff to increase profit

loan.name: Meyling Raquel

texts.es: Meyling casada, su esposo trabaja como inspector, tiene a sus hijos estudiando, planes que se profesionalicen para un mejor futuro. Tiene su propio negocio vende variedades de ropa, bisutera, prendas de plata y oro desde hace aos atrs inicio su negocio como vendedora de otra persona y poco a poco con fondo propio empez a vender sus propios productos. Proyeccin aumentar su ventas as adquiriendo mayores ganancia. Hoy en da con el prstamo comprara mercadera: anillos, cadenas, pulseras, chapas, dgitos, ropas de damas, para aumentar su inventario y ofrecerle a sus clientes variedad de productos.
texts.en:
Meyling is married. Her husband works as an Inspector. She has her children in school and plans for them to become professionals to have a better future.
She has her own business selling clothes, costume jewelry, silver and gold items. She started out years ago working as a salesperson for someone else but gradually started selling her own products using her own funds. Her aim is to increase sales to earn higher profits.
Today, shell use the loan to buy merchandise: rings, chains, bracelets, make-up, fingernails, womens clothes to increase inventory and offer customers more variety.

loan.use: to buy merchandise.

loan.name: Eyvaz

texts.en:
Eyvaz is 50 years old and is married with two children. Six years ago he started his business selling cell phones. He believes that this business is profitable and the generated income allows him to support his family.
However, Eyvaz thinks that it is expensive to purchase cell phones locally and that he will save money if he purchases the goods in another city. With this purpose in mind, he requests a loan of 800 AZN.
Eyvaz is grateful to everyone supporting him and promises to repay the loan promptly.

loan.use: to purchase more invemtories for the shop

loan.name: Innab

texts.en:
Innab is 53 years old. She is married with six children. For almost 6 years, Innab has been working as a market vendor. She sells plates and dishes in the oriental style. This kind of goods is in popular demand among the population. This kind of china is widely used for girl's dowry and also for family celebrations. The love for her children is the biggest reason for Innab to make an effort to provide what they need.
Now Innab is planning to enlarge her range of goods and to purchase the china for re-sale. For this purpose she is requesting 1,000 AZN. She promises to make all repayments on time and is grateful for your support.

loan.use: to purchase more inventory to sell

loan.name: Primavera Group

texts.es: Este comit se form gracias a la Sra. Mirna que vive en la ciudad de Concepcin. La presidenta se motiv en la idea de producir un bien para sus compaeras, dandoles una visin de que a travs del comit estaran alcanzando el progreso de cada una. Encantadas aceptaron conformar el comit de mujeres emprendedoras nombrndolo Comit Primavera. El comit cuenta con quince (15) miembros en donde la mayora se dedica a pequeas actividades desde la venta de minutas, mercaderas en general, de tal manera que en un futuro no muy lejano les estara produciendo una pequea ganancia a travs de su venta. Tambin estas seoras son muy unidas, trabajan en grupo y les es ms fcil pagar la cuota segn experiencias anteriores. Por otro lado la Sra. Patricia, es una mujer muy humilde y desea el crdito para invertir en una actividad productiva y espera generar una pequea ganancia atravs de la venta de alimentos y todo tipo de comidas rpidas para superar los desafos cotidianos. Todas tienen la esperanza de seguir luchando por salir adelante, buscando el progreso de cada una de ellas y la de su comunidad.
texts.en:
This Committee came together thanks to Mirna who lives in the city of Concepcin. The group President was motivated by the idea of doing good for her fellow members, providing them with the vision that each one of them could attain progress through the committee. Gladly they agreed to form part of this group of enterprising women that they called Comit Primavera (Spring Committee.)
It has 15 members. Most are in businesses selling snacks and merchandise and hope in the not too distant future to be producing small profits through their sales. These women are also very unified, they work as a team and making their payments is easier than had been in previous experiences.
Patricia is a very humble woman. She wants the loan to invest in a productive activity and hopes to generate small profits selling food and all kinds of fast food to overcome daily challenges.
They all hope to continue to struggle to get ahead seeking progress for each one of them and for their community.

loan.use: to buy fast food ingredients.

loan.name: Donmaz

texts.en:
Donmaz lives in Agsu city. He is married and has three children. Donmaz has a business selling oil for cars. He has been in this business for 7 years. He buys goods from a wholesale supplier and sells them at the market. His average income is 300 USD per month.
Donmaz would like to get a loan of 1,000 AZN to purchase building materials and household goods to sell. He thanks all lenders who support him, which allows him to expand his business and improve his familys life.

loan.use: to purchase and diversify number of products

loan.name: Sevda

texts.en:
Sevda is married and has three children. She runs a small business selling womens clothing in the central market of Agsu. She believes that one of the biggest advantages of her work is a flexible schedule that gives her the opportunity to take good care of her family.
Sevda has been in business for seven years and her attentiveness and creativity have helped her develop a good understanding of what her clients need and want. They always feel complimented when she goes out of her way to help them with their selections. This has naturally boosted her sales and led to growth in her business.
Sevda is requesting a loan of 1000 AZN to enable her to significantly expand her business by purchasing a new seasonal clothes. She is hoping to reinvest the generated income in further expansion of her business. She believes that consistent growth will help her provide a stable source of income and will continue to secure her familys well-being.

loan.use: to purchase new women's clothes for summer

loan.name: Mujeres Talentosas Group

texts.es: Este Comit se form a travs de la Sra. Eladia, quien se haba acercado hasta la Oficina de la Fundacin Paraguaya para interiorizarse ms del Programa de Comit de Mujeres Emprendedoras. La misma invit a sus amigas y compaeras del Barrio y decidieron sumarse al trabajo grupal para salir adelante y as mejorar su estilo de vida. Son 16 (Dez y Seis) mujeres trabajadoras y humildes que deben ganarse el sustento todos los das. Ellas son independientes en sus labores como vendedoras de ropas, venta de comidas, tienen despensa, almacn, huertas comunitarias y comercializan sus propios productos. Venden artculos de limpieza, mercera, carbn, mandioca, etc. La Sra. Teresa, con el deseo de superarse por su familia, solicita este crdito con el cual espera tener su propio de negocio de bijouterie, realizando ella misma los objetos con la compra de acrlicos, perlitas, alocates, cadenas, hilos, etc.
texts.en:
This Committee came together thanks to Eladia who had stopped by the Fundacin Paraguaya office to get detailed information about the program of the Enterprising Womens Committee. She then invited her friends and acquaintances in the neighborhood who decided to add themselves to the group effort to get ahead thus improving their way of life.
They are 16 humble, hard working women who must earn their daily sustenance. They work independently at their tasks. Some sell clothes, others sell food or have grocery stores, general stores or community farms; they sell their own products. They sell cleaning supplies, notions, charcoal, manioc, etc.
Teresa, hoping to get ahead with her family, is asking for this loan that she hopes will help her have her own costume jewelry business. She will make the items herself. She will buy acrylics, seed pearls, pincers, chains, string, etc.

loan.use: to buy costume jewelry making supplies.

loan.name: Angel

texts.es:
ngel tiene 56 aos, es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos que son solteros en el Cantn Guaranda Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 7 hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. GRUPO PUCARA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Pucara Parroquia Guanujo, cantn Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 22 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercializacin de venta de legumbres.
ngel se dedica a la agricultura tiene 10 cuadras de terreno siembra papas, trigo, maz, adems tiene 10 cabezas de ganado. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos y alimentacin de los animales. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es comprar mas ganado y tener porteras.
Le gusta hacer deporte, festejar las fiestas de San Pedro y carnaval.
texts.en:
ngel, 56, is married living with his wife and unmarried children in Guaranda Canton, Bolvar Province. He has 7 children.
The GRUPO PUCARA communal bank is located in the community of Pucara in Guanujo Parish, Guaranda Canton 15 minutes from the Cooperatives office. This communal bank has 22 members who are farmers, raise livestock and sell vegetables.
ngel is a farmer. Her has 10 cuadras (1 cuadra = 275 feet approx.) of farmland where he grows potatoes, wheat and corn. He also has ten head of cattle. His purchases take place in the market in Guaranda and sales at the wholesale market in the same city.
He is asking for the loan to buy farming supplies and animal feed. Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs. The challenges he faces are infestations, illnesses and variations in the weather. His dream is to buy more cattle and to have pig sties.
He enjoys playing sports, celebrating the feast day of St. Peter and Carnival.

loan.use: to buy farming supplies and animal feed.

loan.name: Elman

texts.en:
Elman is 51 years old. He has 8 years of experience in the beef business. His wife is a housekeeper and Elman is the sole breadwinner in his family. Due to this way of life, this father works hard every day to support his family with the best quality of life he can afford.
His butcher shop supplies large amounts of meat to the population of his city. Elman buys cattle in the market and sells their fresh meat daily to his customers. Due to high demand, this man seeks a loan of 1,000 AZN to invest in more cattle so he can have enough product to meet his customers' demands.

loan.use: to purchase more beef to sell

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase two cattle and fodder

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase three cattle

loan.name: Natividad

texts.es:
Natividad tiene 52 aos, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos en el Cantn Guaranda Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 7 hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. GRUPO PUCARA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Pucara Parroquia Guanujo, cantn Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 22 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercializacin de venta de legumbres.
Natividad se dedica a la comercializacin de legumbres y frutas tienen terrenos alquilados con su esposo que es agricultor y siembran papas y maz.. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos y alimentacin de los animales. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es comprar terrenos para seguir trabajando.
Le gusta trabajar vendiendo las legumbres y ayudarle al esposo en la agricultura.
texts.en:
Natividad is 52 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children in Guaranda canton, in Bolvar province. She has seven children.
The Pucara Group community bank is located in Pucara community, in Guanujo parish, in Guaranda canton, 15 minutes from Cooperativa's offices. This bank has 22 members who work in farming, livestock raising and vegetable sales.
Natividad sells fruit and vegetables. She rents land together with her husband who is a farmer. They grow potatoes and corn. She makes her purchases in Guaranda market and makes her sales in the wholesale market in Guaranda.
Natividad is requesting this loan to buy supplies and feed for her animals. The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs. She faces challenges in her work such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather. Her dream is to buy land so that she can continue working.
Natividad enjoys working, selling her vegetables and helping her husband with their farming.

loan.use: to buy supplies and feed for her animals

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase three cattle and feed for them.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase three cattle.

loan.name: Maria Madgalena

texts.es: Mara es socia del banco Comunal Virgen de cocharcas, tiene 30 aos es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos de 9 y 2 aos de edad. Mara antes se dedicaba a la venta de cosmticos, pero lo cambio por la preparacin y la venta de harina de 7 semillas, esto aprendi de su hermana. Solicita un prstamo que lo invertir en la compra de cereales para la preparacin de 7 semillas. Est en FINCA Per, hace un ao ingres por la invitacin de su suegra, le gusta por que le prestan dinero con facilidad para poder trabajar y sus ahorros ganan intereses. Su sueo es poder ahorrar y tener una bodega en su domicilio.
texts.en:
Mara is a member of the Virgen de Cocharcas community bank. She is 30 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children aged 9 and 2. Mara used to make a living selling cosmetics but she changed her business to making and selling flour from seven types of seed. She learned the business from her sister.
Mara is requesting a loan to invest in buying cereals to prepare her seven types of seed. She has been a member of FINCA Peru for one year and joined via an invitation from her mother-in-law. She likes the community bank because they lend her money easily so that she can work and her savings make good interest. Her dream is to save and to open a grocery store in her own home.

loan.use: to buy cereals

loan.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan tiene 69 aos, vive en unin libre vive con la compaera y con el hijo que en el Cantn Guaranda Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 1 hijo.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. GRUPO PUCARA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Pucara Parroquia Guanujo, cantn Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 22 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercializacin de venta de legumbres.
Juan se dedica a la agricultura tiene dos cuadras de terreno en donde siembra papas trigo, cebada, arveja y zanahoria tiene 4 ovejas y dos cerdos. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos y alimentacin de los animales. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es seguir trabajando en la comunidad.
Le gusta salir a pasear y festejar las fiestas del carnaval.
texts.en:
Juan is 69 years old and lives with his partner and son. They live in Guaranda canton, in Bolvar province.
The Pucara Group community bank is located in Pucara community, in Guanujo parish, in Guaranda canton, 15 minutes from Cooperativa's offices. This bank has 22 members who work in farming, livestock raising and vegetable sales.
Juan is a farmer. He has just over three acres of land where he sows potatoes, wheat, barley, peas and carrots. He also has four sheep and two pigs. He makes his purchases in Guaranda market and his sales in the wholesale market in Guaranda.
Juan is requesting this loan to buy supplies and feed for his animals. The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs. He faces challenges in his work such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather. His dream is to continue working in his community.
Juan enjoys going out for walks and celebrating Carnaval.

loan.use: to buy supplies and feed for his animals

loan.name: Rafiq

texts.en:
Rafiq is 45 years old, married and has five children. Due to his familys financial situation, he did not have many opportunities to get higher education. Thats why, after finishing school, he tried to become independent and to find a way of earning in order to help his parents and now his own family.
Through the years, he tried various types of activities and finally he started his business selling cell phones. Since 2005, Rafiq has supported his family through his efforts. He believes that this business is profitable and the generated income allows him to support his family.
Currently, his business is doing well, but Rafiq needs to increase his stock of goods in order to serve the demands of his clientele. With this purpose in mind, Rafiq has requested a loan of 1,300 AZN.
He is grateful to all those supporting him and promises to repay the loan promptly.

loan.use: to purchase and diversify mobile phone inventories.

loan.name: Segundo Manuel

texts.es:
Segundo Manuel tiene 60 aos, es casado vive con la esposa y con un hijo de 17 aos que en el Cantn Guaranda Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 5 hijos casados.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. GRUPO PUCARA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Pucara Parroquia Guanujo, cantn Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 22 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercializacin de venta de legumbres.
Segundo se dedica al comercio de legumbres y a la agricultura tiene cinco cuadras de terreno, siembra maz, papas, arveja, habas tiene seis cabezas de ganado. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos y alimentacin de los animales. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es mejorar el negocio tener una buena venta.
Le gusta festejar las fiestas de San Pedro.
texts.en:
Segundo Manuel is 60 years old and married. He lives with his wife and 17 year-old son in Guaranda canton, in Bolvar province. He has five children who are married.
The Pucara Group community bank is located in Pucara community, in Guanujo parish, in Guaranda canton, 15 minutes from Cooperativa's offices. This bank has 22 members who work in farming, livestock raising and vegetable sales.
Segundo sells vegetables and farms. He has nearly 8 acres of land where he grows corn, potatoes, peas and beans. He also has six head of cattle. He makes his purchases in Guaranda market and his sales in the wholesale market in Guaranda.
Segundo is requesting this loan to buy supplies and feed for his animals. The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs. He faces challenges in his work such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather. His dream is to improve his business and to make good sales.
Segundo enjoys celebrating the San Pedro fiestas.

loan.use: to buy supplies and feed for his animals

loan.name: Durasan

texts.en:
Durasan is married and has four children.
Since 2006, he has owned a small business selling various home products including shampoo, soap, cleaning agents, office supplies, etc. Located in the central market and offering good prices, his store attracts many customers.
Durasan is a very responsible and disciplined person. He is not alone in his business; his father actively helps him.
He is now requesting a loan of 1,300 AZN to purchase additional inventory, hoping to thereby increase sales and develop his business further.

loan.use: to purchase additional inventory.

loan.name: Maria Laura

texts.es:
Mara Laura tiene 48 aos, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos en el Cantn Guaranda Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 5 hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. GRUPO PUCARA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Pucara Parroquia Guanujo, cantn Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 22 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercializacin de venta de legumbres.
Mara se dedica al comercio de legumbres y a la agricultura tiene 3 cuadras de terreno, siembra maz, papas, arveja, habas tiene 2 cabezas de ganado, 3 cerdos y 5 borregos.. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos y alimentacin de los animales. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es mejorar e incrementar el negocio y dar el estudio a los hijos.
Le gusta salir a pasear, comprar en la ciudad de Guaranda, festejar las fiestas de carnaval y de San Pedro.
texts.en:
Mara Laura is 48 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children in Guaranda canton, in Bolvar province. She has five children.
The Pucara Group community bank is located in Pucara community, in Guanujo parish, in Guaranda canton, 15 minutes from Cooperativa's offices. This bank has 22 members who work in farming, livestock raising and vegetable sales.
Mara sells vegetables and farms. She has 4.75 acres of land where she grows corn, potatoes, peas and beans. She also has 2 head of cattle, 3 pigs and 5 lambs. She makes her purchases in Guaranda market and her sales in the wholesale market in Guaranda.
Mara is requesting this loan to buy supplies and feed for her animals. The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs. She faces challenges in her work such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather. Her dream is to improve and increase her business, and to provide her children with an education.
Mara enjoys going for walks, making purchases in the city of Guaranda, and celebrating Carnaval and the San Pedro fiestas.

loan.use: to buy supplies and feed for her animals

loan.name: La Lucha Sigue Group

texts.es: El grupo la Lucha sigue lo conforman tres mujeres trabajadoras esforzadas y emprendedoras. La coordinadora del grupo es la seora Ftima de 31 aos quien se dedica a la venta de productos AVON. Ella inicio vendiendo el mnimo y poco fue creciendo ahora es asesora. Ftima es casada tiene dos nios de 8 y 4 aos y su meta es mejor su hogar. Las otras integrantes son la seora Rosalba de 32 aos quien tiene una tortillera desde hace 2 aos y desea poner una venta de comida, y la seora ngela de 62 aos se dedica al comercio de productos varios.
texts.en:
The 'La Lucha' group is made up of three hard-working, dedicated and entrepreneurial women. The group's coordinator is 31 year-old Ftima who sells Avon products. She started selling the minimum and gradually grew in the business. She is now a consultant.
Ftima is married and has two children aged 8 and 4. Her goal is to improve her household.
The other members of the group are 32 year-old Rosalba, who has owned a tortilla bakery for two years and would like to set up a business selling meals, and 62 year-old ngela who sells a variety of products.

loan.use: to buy cosmetics

loan.name: Malik

texts.en:
Malik runs a small business, selling household goods in Agsus busy central market. He is married and has one child.
He was not able find a good-paying job, so he decided to go into business for himself. He has now been self-employed in his current business for seven years and is the sole breadwinner for his family.
Malik is very determined and serious about his business. Maintaining a reasonable pricing policy and client-friendly service have always been priorities in Maliks work and have ensured the success of his business.
Malik is asking for a loan of 1,000 AZN to increase his assortment of goods. The loan will be beneficial for Maliks business and will also help him meet his household expenses and set aside some savings for future needs.

loan.use: to purchase more items to sell.

loan.name: Maria Olga

texts.es:
Mara Olga tiene 34 aos, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos en el Cantn Guaranda Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 5 hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. GRUPO PUCARA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Pucara Parroquia Guanujo, cantn Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 22 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercializacin de venta de legumbres.
Mara se dedica a la agricultura siembra en el terreno de los padres maz, habas, papas y trigo adems se dedica a la comercializacin de chanchos. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos y alimentacin de los animales. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es tener casa propia y comprar un terreno para seguir sembrando.
En los momentos libres le gusta descansar, pasear por el campo y hacer deporte con los hijos.
texts.en:
Mara Olga is 34 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children in Guaranda canton, in Bolvar province. She has five children.
The Pucara Group community bank is located in Pucara community, in Guanujo parish, in Guaranda canton, 15 minutes from Cooperativa's offices. This bank has 22 members who work in farming, livestock raising and vegetable sales.
Mara is a farmer who grows corn, beans, potatoes and wheat on her parents' land. She also sells pigs. She makes her purchases in Guaranda market and makes her sales in the wholesale market in Guaranda.
Mara is requesting this loan to buy supplies and feed for her animals. The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs. She faces challenges in her work such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather. Her dream is to own her own home and to buy a plot of land so that she can continue growing her crops.
In her free time, Mara enjoys resting, walking in the countryside and taking part in sports together with her children.

loan.use: to buy supplies and feed for her animals

loan.name: Rigoberto Javier

texts.es: El seor Rigoberto Javier tiene 37 aos de edad, es soltero pero tiene 3 hijos que dependen de el, Rigoberto vive en su casa ubicada en la colonia Morazan y se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene una pulperia en la cual vende todos los productos relacionados con la canasta basica familiar. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria para surtir su negocio y asi tener mayores ventas y mas ganancias, las cuales necesita para darles un buen estudio y una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. Su proyecto a corto plazo es tener un mercadito grande en donde pueda vender muchos productos.
texts.en:
Rigoberto Javier is 37 years old. He is single but has three dependent children. Rigoberto lives in his home which is located in Morazan neighborhood. His business is selling essential household products. He has a grocery store where he sells basic household products.
Rigoberto will use his loan to buy groceries with which to stock his business. This will allow him to make more sales and more profits. He needs these to provide his children with a good education and a better quality of life.
Rigoberto's short-term project is to own a large market where he can sell a lot of products.

loan.use: to buy beans, rice, sugar, salt, milk, soft drinks, juice, butter, oil, margarine, soap, soup, pasta, salsa, churros, eggs, tablets, condiments, candies, onions, bread, cookies, light bulbs and matches

loan.name: Rosa Delia

texts.es:
Rosa Delia tiene 42 aos, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos en el Cantn Guaranda Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 5 hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. GRUPO PUCARA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Pucara Parroquia Guanujo, cantn Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 22 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercializacin de venta de legumbres.
Rosa se dedica al comercio de compra y venta de legumbres. Adems tiene dos solares donde siembra maz y trigo. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos y alimentacin de los animales. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es mejorar el negocio y comprar un vehculo..
Le gusta hacer compras, salir con los hijos de paseo a la ciudad.
texts.en:
Rosa Delia is 42 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children in Guaranda canton, in Bolvar province. She has five children.
The Pucara Group community bank is located in Pucara community, in Guanujo parish, in Guaranda canton, 15 minutes from Cooperativa's offices. This bank has 22 members who work in farming, livestock raising and vegetable sales.
Rosa buys and sells vegetables. She also has two plots of land where she grows corn and wheat. She makes her purchases in Guaranda market and her sales in the wholesale market in Guaranda.
Rosa is requesting this loan to buy supplies and feed for her animals. The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs. She faces challenges in her work such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather. Her dreams are to improve her business and to buy a vehicle.
Rosa enjoys shopping and going out for walks in the city with her children.

loan.use: to buy supplies and feed for her animals

loan.name: Mujeres Unidas De Tobati Group

texts.es: Las mujeres del presente comit son del barrio San Jose de la ciudad de Caacup. La presidenta del comit es la seora Reina, vive con su marido y su pequeo hijo en la mencionada localidad. Ella trabaja en su despensa, vendiendo toda clase de productos de primera necesidad a sus vecinos para que puedan abastecer y cubrir sus necesidades bsicas, especialmente con verduras, frutas y panificados, elementos de todas canasta familiar. Es por eso que solicita el prstamo a Fundacin Paraguaya mediante Kiva, para que pueda adquirir mayor cantidad de estos productos que oferta en distintas variedades y calidades. Ella como tambin sus compaeras estn muy satisfechas con el apoyo econmico que les han brindado la Fundacin Paraguaya y Kiva en etapas pasadas, pues con cada crdito que han obtenido anteriormente las seoras estn aumentando sus pequeos negocios y as tambin sus ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida, y pretenden poder contar nuevamente en este periodo con el crdito. Actualmente estn en el ciclo N 5 con sus 11 integrantes.
texts.en:
The women in this committee are from San Jos neighborhood, in the city of Tobat, which is 16km from our Caacup regional office.
The committee's president is Reina, who lives with her husband and young son.
Reina works in a grocery store, selling all kinds of essential products to her neighbors so that they can stock up and cover their basic needs, especially with fruit, vegetables and baked goods (all items which make up the average family shopping basket).
Reina and her companions are very happy with the financial support that they are being provided with by Fundacin Paraguaya and Kiva. With each loan that they receive, the ladies are enlarging their small businesses, and also their incomes, so that they can enjoy a better quality of life.
The committee is currently in its fifth loan cycle and has 11 members.

loan.use: to buy baked goods, fruit, vegetables and drinks

loan.name: Segundo

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 58 aos, es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos en el Cantn Guaranda Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 9 hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. GRUPO PUCARA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Pucara Parroquia Guanujo, cantn Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 22 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercializacin de venta de legumbres.
Segundo se dedica al comercio de granos y gramneas y a la agricultura tiene cuatro cuadras de terreno, siembra papas, maz, trigo y cebada tiene cinco cuadras de ganado. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos y alimentacin de los animales. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es mejorar el negocio para un bien futuro a sus hijos.
Le gusta lavar el vehculo, participar en las fiestas del pueblo y ser colaborador.
texts.en:
Segundo is 58 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children in Guaranda canton, in Bolvar province. He has nine children.
The Pucara Group community bank is located in Pucara community, in Guanujo parish, in Guaranda canton, 15 minutes from Cooperativa's offices. This bank has 22 members who work in farming, livestock raising and vegetable sales.
Segundo sells grains and grasses. He also farms. He has over six acres of land where he sows potatoes, corn, wheat and barley. He has five head of cattle. He makes his purchases in Guaranda market and makes his sales in the wholesale market in Guaranda.
Segundo is requesting this loan to buy supplies and feed for his animals. The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs. He faces challenges in his work such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather. His dream is to improve his business so that he can provide a good future for his children.
Segundo enjoys washing his car and taking part in his village's fiestas.

loan.use: to buy supplies and feed for his animals

loan.name: Mara Margarita

texts.es:
Mara Margarita tiene 49 aos, es viuda vive con los hijos en el Cantn Guaranda Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 4 hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. GRUPO PUCARA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Pucara Parroquia Guanujo, cantn Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 22 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercializacin de venta de legumbres.
Mara se dedica al negocio de quesos y a la agricultura, tiene seis cuadras de terreno, siembra naranjilla, mora, adems tiene potreros y seis cabezas de ganado. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos y alimentacin de los animales. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es dar un buen estudio a los hijos y arreglar la vivienda.
Le gusta salir a pasear con los hijos y salir a comprar.
texts.en:
Mara Margarita is 49 years old. She is a widow and lives with her children in Guaranda canton, in Bolvar province. She has four children.
The Pucara Group community bank is located in Pucara community, in Guanujo parish, in Guaranda canton, 15 minutes from Cooperativa's offices. This bank has 22 members who work in farming, livestock raising and vegetable sales.
Mara sells cheese and farms. She has nine and a half acres of land where she grows naranjillas (a native fruit) and blackberries. She also owns pasture and six head of cattle. She makes her purchases in Guaranda market and her sales in the wholesale market in Guaranda.
Mara is requesting this loan to buy supplies and feed for her animals. The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs. She faces challenges in her work such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather. Her dream is to provide her children with a good education and to fix up her home.
Mara enjoys going for walks with her children and going out shopping.

loan.use: to buy supplies and feed for her animals

loan.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal PEROLNIYOC; La socia vive en el distrito de Urubamba en la provincia de Urubamba, departamento del Cusco.
La socia tiene 52 aos de edad y La socia es casada y tiene 8 hijos de los cuales 5 de ellos son independientes y 3 an estn en casa con el apoyo de la socia, ellos tiene 21, 18, 12; la socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con la compra y venta de productos secos (habas, granos de maz de todos los tipos para venderlos como semillas, papa, trigo, cebada, arvejas, moraya); la socia desea el crdito para comprar granos al por mayor, la socia tiene sus proveedores y sus clientes. La socia solicita el prstamo para compra productos secos para la venta.
La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crdito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the PEROLNIYOC community bank. She lives in Urubamba district, in Cusco department.
The borrower is 52 years old, married, and has eight children. Five of her children live independently and three still live at home with her support. They are 21, 18 and 12. The borrower divides her time between her household duties and her business buying and selling dry goods (beans, corn kernels, seeds, potatoes, wheat, barley, peas and 'moraya' (freeze-dried potato)). She would like this loan to buy grains wholesale. She already has suppliers and customers. She is requesting her loan to buy dry goods to sell.
The borrower appreciates the loan which she has been granted and is really grateful for it. It will allow her to grow her business and improve her quality of life. She pledges to make her repayments on time.

loan.use: to buy dry goods for sale

loan.name: Zoila

texts.es:
Zoila tiene 46 aos, es soltera vive con los hijos en el Cantn Guaranda Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 3 hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. GRUPO PUCARA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Pucara Parroquia Guanujo, cantn Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 22 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercializacin de venta de legumbres.
Zoila se dedica a la agricultura tiene 10 cuadras de terreno, siembra maz, mora, naranjilla tiene 10 cabezas de ganado vacuno. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos y alimentacin de los animales. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es comprar terreno para seguir sembrando comprar mas ganado y dar el estudio a los hijos.
Le gusta salir al pueblo con los hijos.
texts.en:
Zoila is 46 years old, single and lives with her three children in the canton of Guaranda in the province of Bolivar.
The members of the village bank Grupo Pucara meet in the community of Pucara in the parish of Guanjuo, Guaranda canton. It's about 15 minutes from the cooperative's office. There are 22 members that work in agriculture, animal husbandry and selling vegetables.
Zoila is a farmer with 10 blocks of land. She plants corn, blackberries, oranges and has 10 head of cattle. She makes purchases in the Guaranda market and sells them in the wholesale market there.
She asks for this loan to buy inputs and feed for the animals. With the support of this loan it will help her financially to meet her needs and manage challenges like pests and disease and weather variations. Her dream is to buy land to keep planting and to buy more cattle and for her children to go to school.
She likes to go into town with her kids.

loan.use: inputs and feed for the animals.

loan.name: Hilda Luisa

texts.es: Hilda es socia del Banco comunal Virgen de Cocharcas, tiene 47 aos, es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 23 y 19 aos de edad. Hilda se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir. El prstamo que solicita lo invertir en la compra de prendas de vestir para surtir su mercadera. Viaja a las ferias de Rumi Huasi los das mircoles. Est en FINCA Per desde el ao 1996. Le gusta por los crditos que le otorgan y porque puede ahorrar, con sus ahorros educ a sus hijos, construy su casa. Su sueo es que sus 2 hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en: Hilda is a member of the comunal bank, Virgen de Cocharcas. She is 47 years old, married, and has 2 children of ages 23 and 19. Hilda sells apparel and the loan she is soliciting will be vested towards the purchase of clothing to stock her merchandise. She travels to the Rumi Huasi fairs on Wednesdays. She has been with FINCA Peru since 1996, she likes it there due to the loans they give and because she can save. With her savings she put her kids through school and built her home. Her dream is for her two children to become professionals.

loan.use: to purchase trendy apparel.

loan.name: Balbina

texts.es: La Sra. Balbina est casada con el Sr. Luis, ellos tienen un hijo que ya est casado. La seora tiene una despensa bien surtida y de buena ubicacin ya que es la nica despensa en los alrededores. Ella se inici hace varios aos con muy poca mercadera, que poco a poco fue aumentando con el pasar de los aos. Hoy da ella tiene una despensa bien variada y buenos precios, con una clientela formada. Adems, su marido es una persona muy trabajadora y con su trabajo ayuda con los gastos del hogar, su profesin es ser guardia de seguridad. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable en sus compromisos, ha demostrado con sus historiales de pagos de crditos anteriores. Agradece a la fundacin y a Kiva por la oportunidad que le estn brindando para salir adelante, espera contar con el apoyo de estos nuevamente.
texts.en:
Balbina is married to Luis and they have a son who is already married. Balbina has a well-stocked store in a good location, since it is the only store in the area.
She started several years ago with very little merchandise, which gradually increased with every passing year. Today she has a store with a great variety of items at good prices with an established customer base. In addition, her husband is a very hard worker and his work helps with household expenses. His profession is being a security guard.
Balbina is very hardworking and responsible in her commitments. This has been shown with her history of previous loan payments. She thanks La Fundacin Paraguaya and Kiva for the opportunity you are offering her to move forward, and she hopes to have your support again.

loan.use: to buy sugar, rice, cereals, pasta, cleaning supplies, toiletries, snacks, etc.

loan.name: Fernanda

texts.es: Fernanda es socia del Banco Comunal Virgen de Cocharcas, tiene 63 aos, es casada y tiene 10 hijos. Fernanda tiene una tienda de abarrotes en general, siembra de cereales, papa, maz en Pomacocha Vizchongo, provincia de Vilcas Huaman. Est en FINCA Per desde hace 1 ao y medio, ingres por la invitacin de su nuera. Le gusta porque ayudan a las mujeres a trabajar a mejorar en lo personal y en su negocio. Est ahorrando ahora para tener mas capital para trabajar. Su sueo es que su negocio crezca ms.
texts.en:
Fernanda is a member of the Communal Bank Virgen de Cocharcas. She is 63 years old, married, and has 10 children. Fernanda has a grocery store. She also grows grain, potatoes, and corn in Pomacocha-Vizchongo, Province of Vilcas Huaman.

Fernanda has been with FINCA Peru for a year and a half after being invited to join by her daughter-in-law. She enjoys being a member because the other women have helped with her work and with improving her business and as a person.

Now she is saving so that she can have more operating capital. Her dream is to grow her business even more.

loan.use: to purchase rice, sugar, and oil in bulk.

loan.name: Rosa De Saron Group

texts.es: El grupo Rosa de Saron lo conforman Rosa Argentina, Elisabeth y Nstor Francisco, tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras. La coordinadora del grupo es la seora Rosa Argentina quien hace siete aos inicio vendiendo prendas de plata con tan solo seis anillos, dos pulseras y una cadena, en la actualidad ella en mercadera maneja aproximadamente 13,000 crdobas. La seora Rosa segn comento gracias al crdito su negocio ha ido creciendo y ha podido mejorar su hogar. Su meta es tener una tiendo e invertir el crdito en mercadera. Mientras la seora Elisabeth de 29 aos comercializa ropa (camisas, pantalones, blusasetc.), alquila nintendo y realiza bisutera, el sueo de ella es tener una tienda, y Nestor Francisco de 31 aos tiene un taxi desde hace seis aos y hace dos aos invirti en un carrito de hot dog donde vende comida rpida.
texts.en:
The group Rosa de Saron consists of Rosa Argentina, Elisabeth, and Nstor Franciso. All three of them are hardworking and enterprising individuals. The group coordinator is Sra. Rosa Argentina. She started selling silver jewelry seven years ago with only six rings, two bracelets, and a necklace. At the moment, she currently manages an inventory of merchandise worth approximately 13,000 NIO.

Thanks to the loans she has received, Sra. Rosa says that her business has grown and that she has been able to make improvements to her home. Her goal is to own a store, so she will invest her loan in merchandise.

In the meantime, Sra. Elizabeth is 29 years old and sells clothing (shirts, trousers, blouses, and other items). She also rents Nintendo games and makes trinkets. Her dream is to open a store.

Nestor Francisco is 31 years old and has owned a taxi for six years. Two years ago, he invested in a hot dog cart so that he could sell fast food.

loan.use: to purchase silver jewelry.

loan.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa es socia del Banco Comunal Imasumacc, tiene 30 aos es madre soltera con una hija de 15 aos de edad. Rosa se dedica la venta de peridicos y revista en la plaza Mayor de Ayacucho y a la siembra de papa, arvejas, maz en el anexo de Casaorcco. Solicita un prstamo el cual lo invertir en la compra de revistas, semillas, fertilizantes para la siembra de papa para la campaa pequea. Esta en FINCA Per desde el ao 2005, le gusta por el acceso a los crditos y sobre todo puede ahorrar. Ahora est ahorrando para la construccin de su casa y la educacin superior de su hija.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the Communal Bank Imasumacc. She is 30 years old and a single mother of a 15-year-old daughter. Rosa sells newspapers and magazines in the town square in Ayacucho. She also grows potatoes, peas, and corn in the annex of Casaorcco. Rosa is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of magazines, seeds, and fertilizers for growing potatoes during the short season.
She has been with FINCA Peru since 2005. Rosa enjoys having access to loans and always being able to save. Now she is saving toward the construction of her house and her daughters higher education.

loan.use: to purchase magazines for her news stand and seeds and fertilizers for growing potatoes.

loan.name: Oscar Humberto

texts.es: El seor Oscar Humberto tiene 50 aos de edad, esta casado y tiene 4 hijos, Oscar se dedica al negocio de transporte, posee dos trailers en el cual transporta granos basicos, cemento y hierro en todo Honduras. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de llantas para uno de sus camiones. Su sueo es tener su propia casa para darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos ya que viven en la casa de su madre. Su pasatiempo favorito es viajar en su camion.
texts.en:
Sr. Oscar Humberto is 50 years old, married, and has four children. He manages a transportation business and has two trailers that are used to transport grain, cement, and iron throughout Honduras.

His loan will be used to buy tires for one of his trucks. Oscar dreams of owning a home so that he can provide a better quality of life for his children. They currently live at his mothers house.

His favorite hobby is traveling in his truck.

loan.use: to purchase tires for his truck.

loan.name: Victoria Ursula

texts.es: Victoria es socia del Banco Comunal Imasumacc, es conviviente, tiene 35 aos, 2 hijos de 20 y 15 aos de edad. Victoria tiene una tienda de abarrotes en general tambin vende pollo, carne , verduras, frutas. Solicita un prstamo que lo invertir en la compra de arroz, azcar, fideos, harina, huevos, etc, para surtir su mercadera. Esta en FINCA Per hace 10 aos, le gusta porque puede ahorrar, con sus ahorros incremento su capital de trabajo. Su seo es que sus hijos sean profesional e incrementar sus negocio.
texts.en:
Victoria is a member of the Communal Bank Imasumacc. She is 35 years old, in a common law marriage, and has two children (ages 20 and 15). Victoria has a grocery store where she sells chicken, meat, vegetables, and fruits. She is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of rice, sugar, noodles, flour, eggs, and other products to restock her inventory.

She has been with FINCA Peru for ten years. Victoria enjoys being able to save and has used her savings to increase her operating capital. Her dreams include seeing her children become professionals and expanding her business.

loan.use: to purchase rice, sugar, noodles, flour, eggs, and other products.

loan.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal PEROLNIYOC; La socia vive en el distrito de Urubamba en la provincia de Urubamba, departamento del Cusco.
La socia tiene 48 aos de edad y La socia es casada y tiene 4 hijos de los cuales est con ella solo el menor de sus hijos de 16 aos de edad; la socia tiene sus negocios de compra y venta de maz y su tienda de abarrotes, la socia requiere el crdito en esta ocasin para comprar mercadera de primera necesidad que es arroz, azcar, fideos, harinas, aceite y todo al por mayor. La socia invertir su crdito en la compra de mercadera.
La socia valora y agradece el crdito que le otorgarn para as mejorar su calidad de vida, as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
This member is part of the Communal Bank Perolniyoc. She lives in the District and Province of Urubamba, Department of Cusco.

The member is 48 years old, married, and has four children. Only her youngest child, age 16, still lives with her. She has businesses of buying and selling corn and managing a grocery store. The loan she is requesting on this occasion will be used to buy basic necessities such as rice, sugar, noodles, flour, oil, and other products in bulk. Therefore, she intends to invest the loan for this purpose.

She values and appreciates the loan that has been provided so that she can improve her quality of life. In addition, she promises to complete her payments according to the stated terms.

loan.use: to purchase rice, sugar, noodles, flour, oil, and other products in bulk.

loan.name: Maria Rosa

texts.es:
Maria Rosa tiene 50 aos, es casada vive con el esposo y los hijos en el Cantn Guaranda Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 6 hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. GRUPO PUCARA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Pucara Parroquia Guanujo, cantn Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 22 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercializacin de venta de legumbres.
Mara se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadera tiene media cuadra de terreno en el sector y cinco cuadras en la ciudad de Ambato donde siembra habas, papas, zanahoria tiene 10cabezas de ganado. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos y alimentacin de los animales. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es seguir trabajando en la agricultura, dar el estudio a los hijos para que sean profesionales.
Le gusta ir los domingos a la iglesia.
texts.en:
Mara Rosa is 50 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children in the canton of Guaranda in Bolivar Province. She and her husband have six children.

The members of the Communal Bank Grupo Pucara meet in the community of Pucara, Guanujo Parish, Guaranda Canton. This area is located 15 minutes away from the office of Cooperativa San Jose. The 22 members of this group engage in agriculture, livestock breeding, and selling legumes.

Mara is a farmer and a livestock breeder. She has a half plot of land in the local area and five plots in the city of Ambato where she grows beans, potatoes, and carrots. Mara also has 10 heads of cattle. She buys her supplies at the market in Guaranda and sells her products at the wholesale market in the same city.

Mara is requesting a loan to buy supplies and feed for her animals. The support she is receiving through this loan will help meet her financial needs. Among the challenges she faces are pests, diseases, and changes in weather. Her dreams include continuing to work in agriculture and providing for her childrens education so that they can become professionals.

Mara enjoys going to church on Sundays.

loan.use: to purchase farming supplies and feed for her animals.

loan.name: Luz Velsa

texts.es: Luz es socia del Banco Comunal Imasumacc, tiene 48 aos es divorciada, tiene 4 hijos de 31, 23, 19 y 14 aos. Luz se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en general. El prstamo que solicita lo invertir en la compra de arroz, azcar, fideos, etc, para surtir su tienda. Est en FINCA Per hace tres aos ingreso por la invitacin de una socia. Le gusta porque apoyan a las mujeres con los crditos, les ensean a trabajar y pueden ahorrar. Con su prstamo se pudo comprar su carro para trabajar. Ahora est ahorrando para el mateminiento de su casa que se vio afectada por las constantes lluvias en Ayacucho. Su sueo es que su negocio siga prosperando y construir su casa.
texts.en:
Luz is a member of the Communal Bank Imasumacc. She is 48 years old, divorced, and has four children (ages 31, 23, 19, and 14). Luz has a business selling groceries. The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of rice, sugar, noodles, and other products so that she can restock her store.

Luz joined FINCA Peru three years ago after being invited by another member. She enjoys being part of the group because the other women have helped her with the loans, taught her how to work, and showed her how to save. With one of her loans, she was able to buy a car for her work. Now she is saving so that she can maintain her home, which has been affected by the constant rains in Ayacucho. Her dreams include seeing her business continue to prosper and proceeding with the construction of her house.

loan.use: to purchase rice, sugar, noodles, and other products for her store.

loan.name: Henry

texts.es: Henry es socio del Banco Comunal Imasumacc, tiene 35 aos, conviviente, es moto taxista, solicita un prstamo el cual lo invertir en el mantenimiento de su mototaxi. Est en Finca Per con este el cuartos ciclo ingreso por la invitacin de la promotora, le gusta por los crditos y se puede ahorrar. Con sus crdito pudo comprar artefactos para su domicilio. Ahora est ahorrando para comprarse un terreno.
texts.en:
Henry is a member of the Communal Bank Imasumacc. He is 35 years old, in a common law marriage, and works as motorcycle taxi driver. Henry is requesting a loan so that he can invest in the maintenance of his motorcycle taxi.

He has participated in four loan cycles with FINCA Peru after being invited to join by a promoter. Henry enjoys the loans and being able to save. With his loans, he has been able to buy furnishings for his home. Now he is saving to buy a plot of land.

loan.use: to pay for maintenance of his motorcycle taxi.

loan.name: God Is One Group

texts.en:
Pictured here are members of the God is One group from Waterloo, a small town near Freetown. They are small-business-people who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva, in order to seek a loan of SLL 1,800,000 for both of them in the group to share. With this loan, they will be able to add more goods to their businesses, attract more customers, make more sales and profit, and consequently improve their living conditions.
The leader of this group of entrepreneurs is Mabinty. Mabinty was born in the town of Port Loko in northern Sierra Leone about 35 years ago. She is married and has three children. Her husband is a monthly salaried worker and her children are attending primary and secondary schools respectively.
Mabinty has been selling clothes for 15 years now. With her share of this loan, she will buy a large quantity of clothes to add to her business.

loan.use: to buy a large quantity of clothes to add to her business.

loan.name: Angel Oswaldo

texts.es:
Angel Oswaldo tiene 45 aos, es casado vive con la esposa y los hijos en el Cantn Guaranda Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 5 hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. GRUPO PUCARA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Pucara Parroquia Guanujo, cantn Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 22 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercializacin de venta de legumbres.
Angel se dedica a la agricultura y ganadera tiene 18 cuadras de terreno, siembra papas, tiene potreros, adems 10 cabezas de ganado de vacas lecheras que las comercializa. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos y alimentacin de los animales. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es mejorar el negocio, comprar mas ganado y ayudar a los hijos con el estudio.
Le gusta pasear con la familia y festejar las fiestas del carnaval.
texts.en:
Angel Oswaldo is 45 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children in the canton of Guaranda in Bolivar Province. He and his wife have five children.

The members of the Communal Bank Grupo Pucara meet in the community of Pucara, Guanujo Parish, Guaranda Canton. This area is located 15 minutes away from the office of Cooperativa San Jose. The 22 members of this group engage in agriculture, livestock breeding, and selling legumes.

Angel is a farmer and livestock breeder. He has 18 plots of land designated for growing potatoes and providing open pasture. In addition, he has 10 dairy cows that he will take to market. He purchases his supplies at the market in Guaranda and then sells his products at the wholesale market in the same city.

Angel is requesting a loan to buy supplies and feed for his animals. The support he is receiving through this loan will help meet his financial needs. Among the challenges he faces are pests, diseases, and changes in weather. His dreams include improving his business, buying more cattle, and helping his children with their studies.

Angel enjoys spending time with his family and celebrating the carnival festivities.

loan.use: to purchase farming supplies and feed for his animals.

loan.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth es socia del Banco Comunal Imasumacc, tiene 50 aos, es madre soltera con un hijo de 25 aos. Elizabeth se dedica a la venta de plsticos y prendas de vestir. El prstamo que solicita lo invertir en la compra mercaderas para surtir. Est en FINCA Per hace 6 aos ingres por la invitacin de su hermana, le gusta FINCA porque le ayudo en el momento mas importante, pudo educar a su hijo le pago todos los gastos de la escuela policial. Su sueo es que su negocio siga prosperando y construir su casa.
texts.en: Elizabeth is a member of the Communal Bank "Imasumacc." She is 50 years old, and a single mother with a 25-year-old son. Elizabeth sells plastics and clothing. The loan she is requesting is to buy goods to stock her inventory. She joined FINCA Peru 6 years ago at the invitation of her sister. She likes FINCA because they helped her at a very important time in her life. She was able to educate her son and pay all expenses of the police school. Her dream is that her business continues to thrive and that she can build a home.

loan.use: to purchase various articles of clothing

loan.name: Carlos Gualberto

texts.es:
Carlos Gualberto tiene 36 aos, es casado vive con la esposa y los hijos en el Cantn Guaranda Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 5 hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. GRUPO PUCARA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Pucara Parroquia Guanujo, cantn Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 22 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercializacin de venta de legumbres.
Carlos se dedica a la agricultura y ganadera tiene solar, siembra papas, maz, arveja en terrenos arrendados tiene 5 borregos y 4 cerdos . Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos y alimentacin de los animales. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es mejorar el negocio.
Le gusta festejar las fiestas del carnaval.
texts.en:
Carlos Gualberto is 36 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children in the Cantn Guaranda Bolivar Province. He has 5 children.
The members of the V.R.C. Pucara Group are located in the neighborhood of Pucara Parroquia Guanujo at a distance of 15 minutes from the office of the cooperative. This group is comprised of 22 partners engaged in agriculture, livestock sales and marketing of vegetables.
Carlos works in agriculture and livestock. He has a plot of leased land where he plants potatoes, corn, and peas. He also has 5 sheep and 4 pigs. He purchases his goods in the Guaranda market and sells in the wholesale market in the same city.
Carlos is requesting a loan to purchase supplies and animal feed. This support would help financially meet their needs. He faces challenges such as pests and diseases and the variety of weather. His dream is to improve the business. He also likes to celebrate the festivities of carnival.

loan.use: to purchase supplies and animal feed.

loan.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal PEROLNIYOC; La socia vive en el distrito de Urubamba en la provincia de Urubamba, departamento del Cusco.
La socia tiene 35 aos de edad y La socia es separada y tiene 2 hijos de 15, 12 aos de edad; la socia tiene un restaurante turstico, ella administra y atiende el restaurante de manera directa, la socia requiere el crdito para invertir en el arreglo y as poder mejorar su restaurante, la socia arreglara el techo y las paredes luego pintaran el local, para comprar el material y el pago del obrero se requiere dinero y la socia desea el crdito para hacer estas inversiones y poder ir pagando las cuotas fraccionadas. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales y pintura para su restaurante.
La socia valora y agradece el crdito que le otorgarn para as mejorar su calidad de vida, as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the communal bank Perolniyoc [the name of a canyon]. She lives in the district of Urubamba, which is in the province of Urubamba, department of Cusco.
She is 35 years old and separated. She has two children, aged 15 and 12. She owns a tourist restaurant. She manages the restaurant and serves food herself. She applies for a loan to renovate and improve her restaurant. She will repair the roof and the walls, and then repaint the premises. She needs money to buy construction material and to pay for labor. She wants this loan to make these investments and she will repay the loan in installments.
She values and appreciates the awarded loan. Her quality of life will be improved. She is committed to repay the loan in installments on schedule.

loan.use: to buy construction material and paint in order to renovate her restaurant.

loan.name: Clida

texts.es: La seora Celida de 33 aos de edad, est casada y tiene tres hijos, se dedica a la comercializacin de todo tipo de prendas de vestir hace ms de 3 aos, empez gracias a la ayuda crediticia de su cnyuge. Actualmente cuenta con un negocio prspero, gracias a sus ingresos diarios puede solventar los gastos escolares de sus dos nias, una de 10 aos y otra de 13 aos. La venta de sus mercaderas lo realiza desde su casa, para lo cual cuenta con un saln bien amplio, vende prendas de vestir para caballeros, damas y nios como remeras, camisas, vestidos. Uno de sus mayores anhelos es de confeccionar sus propias prendas para posterior venta, ya que ella posee conocimiento sobre alta costura que aprendi de trabajos anteriores. Desde ya agradece a Fundacin Paraguaya por la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
Seora Clida, aged 33, is married and the mother of three children. She sells all kinds of clothes. She began her activity more than three years ago, thanks to financial support from her husband. Currently, she owns a prosperous business. The daily income from it enables her to pay the school fees for her two daughters, one of 10 years and one of 13.
Clida sells her merchandise in a large room in her house. She sells clothes for men, women and children, such as T-shirts, shirts, dresses and suits.
One of her greatest desires is to make her own clothes for sale, since she is quite knowledgeable about haute couture, after having learnt the skill at previous workplaces. She thanks the microfinance institution Fundacin Paraguaya for the provided opportunity.

loan.use: to buy clothes for men, women and children.

loan.name: Edda Del Socorro

texts.es: La seora Edda del Socorro es una mujer trabajadora esforzada y emprendedora quien se dedica a la venta de ropa usa desde hace 18 aos la cual distribuye en San Ramn, la Daliaen el departamento de Matagalpa de donde es originaria. Adems de este negocio en su casa de Managua los sbados vende nacatamales comida tpica a base de maz y cerdo, y los domingos vende sopas.
texts.en: Seora Edda del Socorro is a hard-working and courageous enterprising woman. For 18 years she has been selling second-hand clothes in San Ramn and La Dalia, located in her native department of Matagalpa. In addition to this business, she has two other activities at her home in Managua. On Saturdays she sells nacatamales, a typical food consisting of dough made from corn and a filling consisting of pork meat. And on Sundays she sells soup.

loan.use: to buy clothes, corn, pork meat, vegetables, bones and chickens.

loan.name: Sandra Grimaneza

texts.es:
Sandra Grimaneza tiene 23 aos, es soltera vive con los padres y un hijo en el Cantn Guaranda Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 1 hijo.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. GRUPO PUCARA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Pucara Parroquia Guanujo, cantn Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 22 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercializacin de venta de legumbres.
Sandra se dedica a la agricultura siembra maz y trigo y a la comercializacin de legumbres. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es mejorar el negocio y comprar una casa.
Le gusta dedicarse a su hijo.
texts.en:
Sandra Grimaneza is 23 years old and single. She lives with her parents and her son in the canton of Guaranda in the province of Bolvar. She has one son.
The member belongs to the rural communal bank "Grupo Pucara" located in Pucara, a neighborhood of the parish of Guanujo in the canton of Guaranda, which is 15 minutes away from the office of the microfinance institution Cooperativa San Jos. This group is composed of 22 members who work in agriculture, rear cattle and sell vegetables.
Sandra is a farmer. She grows corn and wheat, and she sells vegetables. She gets her supplies at the market in Guaranda and sells her goods at the wholesale market of the same city.
She applies for a loan to buy agricultural consumables. The loan will help her to pay for the required supplies. She faces challenges such as plagues, diseases and weather changes. Her dream is to improve her business and buy a house. She likes to devote herself to her son.

loan.use: to buy agricultural consumables.

loan.name: Laneh Kuru Group

texts.en:
