Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you members of the Laneh Kuru group. These are small-scale entrepreneurs who have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek a loan of SLL 1,500,000 for each in order to invest in their businesses.
Fatmata is the leader of this group. Fatmata is 35, married, and has five children. Three are in primary school and two are in secondary school.
Fatmata sells cooking utensils spoons, knives, plates, pots, etc., and has been doing this business for 22 years now. With the help of this loan, Fatmata will invest in her business by buying different kinds of cooking utensils in large quantity to add to her business.

loan.use: to buy kitchen utensils in large quantity to add to her business.

loan.name: Jessica Viviana

texts.es:
Jessica Viviana tiene 21 aos, vive en Unin Libre vive con l con viviente en el Cantn Guaranda Provincia de Bolvar. No Tiene hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. GRUPO PUCARA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Pucara Parroquia Guanujo, cantn Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 22 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercializacin de venta de legumbres.
Jessica se dedica comercializacin de legumbres. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es tener casa propia.
Le gusta descansar y festejar las fiestas.
texts.en:
Jessica Viviana, aged 23, lives in a common-law marriage in the canton of Guaranda in the province of Bolvar. She has no children.
The member belongs to the rural communal bank "Grupo Pucara" located in Pucara, a neighborhood of the parish of Guanujo in the canton of Guaranda, which is 15 minutes away from the office of the microfinance institution Cooperativa San Jos. This group is composed of 22 members who work in agriculture, rear cattle and sell vegetables.
Jessica sells vegetables. She gets her supplies at the market in Guaranda and sells her goods at the wholesale market of the same city.
She applies for a loan to buy agricultural consumables. The loan will help her to pay for the required supplies. She faces challenges such as plagues, diseases and weather changes. Her dream is to have her own house. She likes to rest and go to fiestas.

loan.use: to buy agricultural consumables.

loan.name: Gloria Del Carmen

texts.es: La seora Gloria del Carmen es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora de 55 aos. Ella tiene una pulpera la cual inicio hace siete aos vendiendo fresco y comida, con sus ganancias y los prstamo fue surtiendo su venta primero compr golosinas, chiveras, gaseosa, luego invirti en granos bsicos actualmente vende hasta accesorios de celular. Ella con el crdito comprar mercadera para seguir surtiendo su pulpera. Esta clienta inicio con Adim en crdito grupal en el Grupo Ciudadanos del Reino y ahora inicia su crdito individual.
texts.en:
Seora Gloria del Carmen, aged 55, is a hard-working and enterprising woman. She owns a small grocery store, which she opened seven years ago and where she sells refreshments and food. In the beginning she used her earnings and loans to buy candy, milk products and soda; later she invested in staple grains. Currently, she also sells accessories to cell phones.
She will use her loan to buy goods to stock up her store. Gloria del Carmen became a client of the microfinance institution ADIM as a member of the Group "Ciudadanos del Reino" (Citizens of the Kingdom). This is her first individual loan.

loan.use: to stock up her grocery store with staple grains and accessories to cell phones.

loan.name: Franklin Rolando

texts.es:
Franklin Rolando tiene 22 aos, es soltero vive con los padres en el Cantn Guaranda Provincia de Bolvar. No Tiene hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. GRUPO PUCARA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Pucara Parroquia Guanujo, cantn Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 22 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercializacin de venta de legumbres.
Franklin se dedica comercializacin de legumbres. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es comprar una casa, tener terrenos para sembrar.
Le gusta hacer deporte y bailar en las fiestas
texts.en:
Franklin Rolando is 22 years old and single. He lives with his parents in the canton of Guaranda in the province of Bolvar. He has no children.
The member belongs to the rural communal bank "Grupo Pucara" located in Pucara, a neighborhood of the parish of Guanujo in the canton of Guaranda, which is 15 minutes away from the office of the microfinance institution Cooperativa San Jos. This group is composed of 22 members who work in agriculture, rear cattle and sell vegetables.
Franklin Rolando sells vegetables. He gets his supplies at the market in Guaranda and sells his goods at the wholesale market of the same city.
He applies for a loan to buy agricultural consumables. The loan will help him to pay for the required supplies. He faces challenges such as plagues, diseases and weather changes. His dream is to buy a house and own a few fields to sow. He likes to practice sports and dance at parties.

loan.use: to buy agricultural consumables.

loan.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal PEROLNIYOC; La socia vive en el distrito D. Urubamba en la provincia D. Urubamba, departamento del Cusco.
La socia tiene 52 aos D. edad y La socia es viuda y tiene 3 hijos D. los cuales ella vive con dos D. ellos D. 29, 25 aos D. edad; la socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con la compra y venta D. animales menores ella se dedica a la crianza y engorD. D. animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, la socia suele comprar en las ferias los animales menores los cuales cra y engorda y luego los venD.. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra D. animales menores.
La socia valora y agradece el crdito que le otorgarn para as mejorar su calidad D. vida, as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the communal bank Perolniyoc [the name of a canyon]. She lives in the district of Urubamba, which is in the province of Urubamba, department of Cusco.
She is 52 years old, widowed and the mother of three children. She lives with two of them, aged 29 and 25. She alternates her activities between household chores and buying and selling small animals. She breeds and fattens small animals, such as guinea pigs and chickens, which she usually buys at the traD. fairs. After having fattened them, she sells them. She applies for a loan to invest in the purchase of small animals.
She values and appreciates the awarded loan. Her quality of life will be improved. She is committed to repay the loan in installments on schedule.

loan.use: to invest in the purchase of small animals.

loan.name: Lola Mara

texts.es:
Lola Maria tiene 44 aos, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos en el Cantn Guaranda Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 5 hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. GRUPO PUCARA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Pucara Parroquia Guanujo, cantn Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 22 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercializacin de venta de legumbres.
Lola se dedica a la agricultura tiene un solar, casa propia, siembra maz, papas, trigo, cebada, tiene dos cerdos adems se dedica a la venta de legumbres. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es, tener terrenos para sembrar y comprar un vehculo para el negocio.
Le gusta tener limpia la casa.
texts.en:
Lola Mara is 44 years old and married. She lives with her husband and the children in the canton of Guaranda in the province of Bolvar. She has five children.
The member belongs to the rural communal bank "Grupo Pucara" located in Pucara, a neighborhood of the parish of Guanujo in the canton of Guaranda, which is 15 minutes away from the office of the microfinance institution Cooperativa San Jos. This group is composed of 22 members who work in agriculture, rear cattle and sell vegetables.
Lola is a farmer. She has a plot of land and her own house. She grows corn, potatoes, wheat and barley. She has two pigs and she also sells vegetables. She gets her supplies at the market in Guaranda and sells her goods at the wholesale market of the same city.
She applies for a loan to buy agricultural consumables. The loan will help her to pay for the required supplies. She faces challenges such as plagues, diseases and weather changes. Her dream is to own a few fields to sow and to buy a car for her business. She likes to clean the house.

loan.use: to buy agricultural consumables.

loan.name: Jesutogbe 3 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe JESUTOGBE 3 est form de dix personnes qui habitent toutes dans la mme agglomration. La reprsentante de ce groupe, nomme Zansi Christine, est celle dont la main est leve sur la photo. Zansi Christine est une veuve ayant sa charge cinq enfants, tous scolariss. Depuis vingt sept ans, Zansi Christine vit seule Tchonvi avec ses cinq enfants et assure seule leurs diffrentes charges. Pour y arriver, Zansi Christine prpare divers repas (riz, pte de mas, accompagn de sauce, etc.), quelle vend son domicile. Zansi Christine sapprovisionne Dantokpa, march international du Bnin. Cest la premire fois que Zansi Christine et son groupe sollicite de crdit auprs de ALID. Ce crdit leur servira renforcer leur activit afin de mieux rpondre la demande de leur clientle.
texts.en:
The group JESUTOGBE 3 is comprised of ten people who all live in the same town. The groups representative, by the name of Zansi Christine, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. Zansi Christine is a widow who supportsfive children, who have all had schooling. For 27 years, she has lived alone in Tchonvi with her five children, and she ensures by herself that their various expenses are covered. To do so, she makes a variety of meals (rice, corn mash, with sauce, etc.) that she sells out of her house. She gets her supplies from Dantokpa, the international market of Benin.
This is the first time that Zansi Christine and her group has requested a loan from ALID. This loan will serve to bolster their businesses in order to respond better to the demands of their customers.

loan.use: to buy corn, rice, and sauce condiments

loan.name: We Go Try Group

texts.en:
Meet the members of the We Go Try group from Waterloo, a small town in western Sierra Leone. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org, to apply for a loan of SLL 3,400,000 for the entire group. With the help of this loan they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve their living conditions.
Hawanatu is the leader of this group. The 39-year-old woman is single and has three children who are attending primary and secondary schools. Hawanatu has been a businesswoman for 15 years now. She sells food such as rice, pepper, onions, oil, etc. With her share of this loan, she will buy the above-mentioned items at wholesale to add to her current stock.

loan.use: to buy rice, pepper, onions, oil, etc., at wholesale to add to her current stock.

loan.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN GUADALUPE-CUSCO; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco
La socia es la Sra. M.; ella tiene 45 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de fotocopiadora donde realiza trabajos de fotocopias y tipeos y tambin la socia trabaja en una librera desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el servicio de fotocopiadora. La socia solicita el prstamo para el mantenimiento de la maquina fotocopiadora y para comprar papeles.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
M. is a member of the communal bank "Virgen Guadalupe Cusco" (Our Lady of Guadalupe Cusco). This bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.
Seora M. is 45 years old, lives in a common-law marriage and is the mother of two children. She alternates her daily activities between her photocopy business, where she makes photocopies and provides typing services, and her job at a bookstore, where she works from 8 am to 8 pm. M. wants to expand and improve her photocopy business. She applies for a loan to service the photocopier and buy paper.
M. thanks for the loan and promises to comply with the repayment schedule.

loan.use: to service her photocopier and buy paper.

loan.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal PEROLNIYOC; La socia vive en el distrito de Urubamba en la provincia de Urubamba, departamento del Cusco.
La socia tiene 42 aos de edad y La socia es casada y tiene 4 hijos de los cuales ella vive con dos de ellos de 16, 11 aos de edad; la socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con la compra y venta de animales mayores, la socia compra y vende toros, vacas; la socia desea invertir en la copra de 2 toros pequeos para criarlos y engordarlos y despus de esto venderlos. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de animales mayores, la socia comprara dos toros.
La socia valora y agradece el crdito que le otorgarn para as mejorar su calidad de vida, as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en: This member belongs to, " PEROLNIYOC"; she lives in the district of Urubamba in the province of Urubamba and department of Cusco. This member is 42 years old, married, and has 4 children, 2 of whom she still lives with, of ages 11 and 16. She alternates her household activities with the purchase of older animals; she buys and sells bulls and cows. She wishes to purchase 2 younger bulls in order to raise them and fatten them up to later sell. This member solicits the loan to invest in the puchase of older animals, she would be buying 2 bulls. This member values and is thankful for the loan given to her in order to improve her quality of life; at the same time she commits to fulfilling her payments withing the allotted time.

loan.use: to purchase older animals, this member would purchase 2 bulls.

loan.name: Aurelio Martin

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN GUADALUPE-CUSCO; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Aurelio Martin; el tiene 24 aos de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de transporte, el tiene un carro que realiza servicio de taxi en las diferentes calles de la ciudad de Cusco, el socio trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo el socio quiere ahorrar para estudiar alguna profesin, el socio quiere mejorar el servicio de taxi que realiza. El socio solicita el prstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro y para comprar algunos repuestos.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "VIRGEN GUADALUPE-CUSCO", which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.
Mr. Aurelio Martin, age 24, is single and works as a taxi driver. He uses his own vehicle to provide services throughout the city of Cusco from 6:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. With the income from this business he plans to save to study for a professional career. He wants to improve the taxi service and is requesting a loan to buy repair parts and pay for maintenance.
He is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loan.use: To buy auto repair parts and pay for maintenance.

loan.name: Segundina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN GUADALUPE-CUSCO; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Segundina; ella tiene 50 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el restaurant, ella vende desayunos y tambin almuerzos, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, tambin la socia vende chicha (bebida a base de maz), la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el servicio de negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como carne, verduras y pollo.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "VIRGEN GUADALUPE-CUSCO" which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.
Mrs. Segundina, age 50, has a live-in partner and two children. She alternates her daily activities with running a restaurant where she offers breakfast and lunch. Her work hours are from 8:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. She also sells "chicha" (a corn-based drink). She wants to expand and improve her restaurant business and is requesting a loan to buy cooking ingredients such as meat, vegetables and chicken.
She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loan.use: To buy cooking ingredients such as meat, vegetables and chicken.

loan.name: Good Friend Group

texts.en:
Aminata is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. With the help of this loan, Aminata and her group member will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions.
Aminata was born in Russel village about 45 years ago. She is married to a trader and the couple has seven children who are attending primary and secondary schools.
Aminata sells building materials and has been doing this business for six years now. She will use her share of the loan (SLL 1,800,000) to buy building materials such as paints, nails, hammers, shovels, etc., in large quantity to add to her stock.

loan.use: to buy building materials such as paints, nails, hammers, shovels, etc., in large quantity to add to her stock.

loan.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr: Les dix femmes du groupe Benkadi sont maries majoritairement dans des familles monogames avec en moyenne 32 ans et 5 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans le quartier Hamdallaye de Sgou (4me Rgion administrative du Mali) et se sont connues travers des liens de voisinage et de leurs activits gnratrices de revenus au march Chteau de Sgou. Les membres du groupe font le commerce de grains de crales (riz et arachide), de lait, de bananes, des mangues, de savons et dhabits. Dans le but daugmenter leur fonds de commerce pour certaines et dentreprendre de nouvelles activits gnratrices de revenu pour dautres, les membres du groupe ont adhr au programme crdit de Soro Yiriwaso et sont leur 1er cycle de prt solidaire. Madame Bayta a une grande rputation dans la vente des produits de beaut. Elle compte utiliser son prt pour acheter 4 douzaines de cartons de crmes pour la peau. Elle se ravitaille en gros au grand march de Bamako en ces produits et les revend en dtails au comptant et crdit domicile, en ambulant et au march Chteau une clientle compose majoritairement de femmes. Madame Bayta espre raliser avec ce prt un bnfice mensuel moyen de 20.000FCFA qui sera utilis pour tre rinvesti dans lactivit et prendre en charge les petits besoins du foyer. A linstar des autres membres du groupe, elle a pour objectif daugmenter le volume de son activit dans ce partenariat avec Soro Yiriwaso.
texts.en:
The ten women of the Benkadi group are in their majority married in monogamous families. They are on average 32 years old with five children. They all live in the Hamdallaye neighborhood of Segou (Mali's fourth administrative region) and got to know each other through neighborhood contacts and their income-generating activities at the 'Chteau de Sgou' market. The group members retail grains and cereals (rice and peanut), milk, bananas, mangoes, soap and clothing. In order to build up their stock for some, and to launch new income-generating activities for others, the group members have joined Soro Yiriwaso's lending program. This is their first solidarity loan cycle.
Mrs. Bayta has a great reputation in the retail of cosmetics. She plans on using her loan to purchase four dozen boxes of skincare products. She get her supplies wholesale from Bamako's big market, and retails for cash or credit from home, door-to-door and on the Chteau market, mostly to female consumers. With this loan, Mrs. Bayta hopes to generate an average monthly benefit of 20,000 CFA, which will reinvested in the business and used to take care of her household's secondary needs. Like the other group members, her objective is to increase her level of activity through this partnership with Soro Yiriwaso.

loan.use: to purchase cosmetics.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy rice, palm oil, groundnuts, fish, etc., in order to produce more cooked rice for sale.

loan.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy forma parte del Banco comunal Villa el Estero perteneciente a la ciudad de Concepcin. Ella se dedica a la venta de artculos de paquetera, especficamente perfumes, cosmticos y ropa interior. Este negocio lo realiza puerta a puerta, se dirige directamente a la casa de sus clientes, ya que adems brinda facilidades de pago. Se dedica a ste rubro desde hace 8 aos y comenz vendiendo cosmticos por catlogo. Adems Nancy trabaja en una casa particular cuidando personas de la tercera edad. Por lo que su horario lo distribuye de acuerdo a su trabajo dependiente y su negocio. Sin embargo igual aprovecha de ofrecer sus productos en su trabajo. Su mercadera la compra en distribuidoras, ya que los precios son a bajo costo, por ende ms convenientes. Con ste prstamo comprar artculos para su negocio, especficamente cosmticos, camisetas, calcetines, perfumes y bufandas. Su meta es establecer su negocio instalndose en un local, para abastecerlo con mayor variedad de productos y as obtener mejores ganancias. Nancy vive junto a su marido y sus dos hijos de 16 y 8 aos de edad. Sus sueos son obtener su casa propia, para brindarle a su familia una mayor comodidad, para esto ya postul al subsidio habitacional y contina ahorrando. Nancy est muy agradecida del prstamo y facilidades de pago que brinda Fondo Esperanza, ya que ha sido un gran apoyo para su negocio. Adems disfruta mucho de las reuniones que tiene junto a su grupo, ya que son muy amenas. Concepcin, est asentada en la desembocadura del ro Biobo, uno de los ms grandes del pas, al sur de Chile, en la regin del Biobo. Ha tenido una importante funcin en nuestra historia, siendo sede de importantes batallas y asentamiento relevante, especialmente durante la Guerra de Arauco, por estar en la frontera con territorio mapuche. Actualmente la ciudad posee un importante desarrollo econmico y demogrfico, llegando a ser considerada como uno de los ncleos urbanos, demogrfico, administrativo, financiero y comercial ms relevantes de Chile, despus de Santiago y Valparaso.
texts.en:
Nancy belongs to the communal bank "Villa el Estero" which is in the city of Concepcin. She sells items such as perfumes, cosmetics and underwear on a door-to-door basis and offers easy payment terms. She has been in business for eight years and began selling by catalogue. Nancy also works for a family as an elderly care giver and divides her time between her job and her business. She buys her products through distributors for lower cost and more convenience.
She plans to use the loan to set up a shop and stock it with a variety of products to increase her earnings. She enjoys the meetings with her group.
Concepcin is located near the basin of the Biobio River, one of the largest in the country, in southern Chile. Bordering on Mapuche territory, it is an important location in our history because of the battles and relevant settlement, especially during the Arauco War. The city currently has a significant economic and demographic development and is considered to be one of the most relevant urban, demographic, administrative, financial and commercial centers in Chile, after Santiago and Valparaiso.

loan.use: To buy inventory for retail sales, such as cosmetics, t-shirts, socks, perfumes and scarves.

loan.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr: Maries majoritairement dans de familles monogames, les huit femmes du groupe Benkadi ont en moyenne 39 ans et 5 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans le quartier Angoulme de Sgou (4me Rgion administrative du Mali) et se sont connues travers des liens de parent et de leurs activits gnratrices de revenus dans le march Mdine de Sgou. Les membres du groupe font le commerce de charbon de bois, de bois de chauffe, de chaussures, de pagnes brods et dchalotes. Dans le but daugmenter leur fonds de commerce les membres du groupe ont dcid de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont leur 1er cycle de prt solidaire. Madame Fatoumata compte utiliser son prt pour acheter, 200 kg dchalotes avec les forains de Niono au grand march de Sgou. La revente se fait en dtail au comptant et crdit domicile et au march Mdine une clientle compose dhommes et de femmes. Madame Fatoumata espre raliser avec ce prt un bnfice mensuel moyen de 17.000FCFA qui sera utilis pour tre rinvesti dans lactivit et prendre en charge les soins de sant des enfants. Elle a pour objectif limage des autres membres du groupe de devenir grossiste dans lactivit quelle mne.
texts.en:
The eight women from the Benkadi group are on average 39 years old and have on average 5 children. They are married and for the most part in monogamous families. They all live in the Angouleme quarter of Segou (fourth administrative region of Mali). They know one another through ties of kinship, and their income generating activities at Segous Medine market. The members of the group sell wood coal, firewood, shoes, embroidered pagnes [colorful wrap around fabric] and shallots.
In order to increase their working capital the members of the group decided to work with Soro Yiriwaso. This is their first group loan.
Mrs. Fatoumata wants to use her loan to buy 200 kg of shallots from Niono's itinerant merchants at the Grand Market of Segou. She sells retail for cash or on credit from her house or at the Medine market to customers who are both men and women.
Mrs. Fatoumata hopes to make an average monthly profit of 17,000 Francs CFA and will use it to be reinvested in her activity and to cover the health expenses of her children. Her goal, just like the other group members, is to become a wholesaler in her line of business.

loan.use: to purchase shallots

loan.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal PEROLNIYOC; La socia vive en el distrito de Urubamba en la provincia de Urubamba, departamento del Cusco.
La socia tiene 42 aos de edad y La socia es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 21, 15, 5 aos de edad; La socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con un pequeo negocio que ella misma puso, la socia es docente de profesin pero este ao no la contrataron y ella decidi elaborar tortas para la venta y en casa acondiciono un espacio para dedicarse a la elaboracin de tortas, la socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales e insumos para la elaboracin de tortas.
La socia valora y agradece el crdito que le otorgarn para as mejorar su calidad de vida, as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "PEROLNIYOC" and lives in the district and province of Urubamba in the department of Cusco.
She is 42 years and married with three children, ages 21, 15 and 5. She alternates her daily activities as a homemaker with a small business she set up. She is a teacher by profession but was not hired this year so decided to make and sell cakes. She adapted her house to include a working area and now is requesting a loan to buy materials and ingredients to make the cakes.
She is grateful for the loan which will help her improve her quality of life, and committed to paying it back on time.

loan.use: To buy materials and ingredients to make cakes.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy plastic bowls, cotton cloths, slippers, etc., in large quantities

loan.name: Dakan Group

texts.fr: Maries majoritairement dans des familles monogames, les sept femmes du groupe Dakan ont en moyenne 36 ans, 6 enfants et vivent toutes dans le quartier Angoulme de la ville de Sgou (4me Rgion administrative du Mali). Elles se sont connues travers des liens de mariage, parent et de leurs activits gnratrices de revenus dans le march Mdine de Sgou. Les membres du groupe font le commerce de charbon de bois, de bois e chauffe, dhabits, de la friperie, du riz et du pain. Dans le but de se ravitailler au comptant, les membres du groupe ont intgr Soro Yiriwaso avec qui elles sont leur 9me cycle de prt solidaire. Tous les prts prcdents ont t correctement rembourss Madame Fatoumata compte utiliser son prt pour acheter, deux ballons dhabits de la friperie au grand march de Sgou.. La revente se fait en dtail, au comptant et crdit, domicile, en ambulant dans les diffrents quartiers et de faon fixe au march Mdine, une clientle compose dhommes et de femmes. Madame Fatoumata espre raliser avec ce prt un bnfice mensuel moyen de 29.000FCFA qui sera utilis pour tre rinvesti dans lactivit et prendre en charge les petits besoins du foyer. Elle a pour objectif douvrir un magasin de vente dhabits de la friperie.
texts.en:
The majority married in monogamous families, the seven women of the Dakan group are on average 36 years old with six children. They live in the Angoulme district of the city of Sgou (fourth administrative region of Mali). They are acquainted through marriage, kinship, and business associations at the Mdine market in Sgou. The group's members do business in charcoal, firewood, clothing (new and used), rice, and bread.
In order to pay for supplies in cash, the group members joined Soro Yiriwaso; they are on their ninth group loan. The previous loans have been fully repaid.
Madame Fatoumata plans to use her loan to buy two bales of used clothing at the big market in Sgou. She resells door-to-door, as an itinerant vendor, and at a stall in the Mdine market; her customers are both male and female, and she sells for cash and credit.
Madame Fatoumata hopes to make an average monthly profit of 29,000 CFA with this loan. This will be reinvested in the business and used for occasional household expenses. Her goal is to open a second-hand clothing shop.

loan.use: to buy used clothing.

loan.name: Andrey

texts.es:
Andrey, tiene la edad de 26 aos, est Casado y vive con su hijo y su esposa. El pretende con el crdito comprar una moto para trasladarse al tabajo. El tiene un trabajo fijo como guarda de seguridad privada por las noches, por el horario que maneja, tambin puede trabajar ratos en construccin, lo que la moto le economiza mucho tiempo para trasladarse de un lugar a otro y a su casa.
Andrey quiere crecer en lo econmico y darles una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo y su esposa. Es el primer prstamo que recibide de FUDECOSUR. El no haba tenido antes otros prstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el prstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho ms baja.
texts.en:
Andrey, age 26, is married and lives with his wife and son. He is requesting a loan to buy a motorcycle for transportation to his workplace. He works as a private security guard at night and when his schedule permit, he also is active in the construction sector. The motorcycle will help him save time getting from one place to another or home.
Andrey wants to grow economically and give his wife and son the best quality of life. This is his first loan through FUDECOSUR. He has never taken out any state bank loans, and FUDECOSUR is giving him better payment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loan.use: To buy a motorcycle.

loan.name: San Antonio Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal SAN ANTONIO; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Ana Maria; ella es casada y tiene 44 aos y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de venta de ropa, ella vende pantalones, polos, blusas y chompas en forma independiente y tambin la socia trabaja como preventista, la socia lleva la ropa a diferentes lugares para vender la ropa, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar pantalones, blusas, chompas y polos al por mayor.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de ferretera, venta de artesana, negocio de venta de productos de belleza, negocio de venta de repuestos de carro.
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These borrowers belong to the "San Antonio" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province, in Cusco department.
Ana Maria is 44 years old, married, and has two children. She has a business selling clothes. She is self employed and sells pants, polo shirts, blouses and sweaters. She also works as pre-sales agent. She takes the clothes to different places to sell them. Through this business, she gets her children ahead in life. Ana Maria would like to expand her clothes business. She is requesting a loan to buy pants, blouses, sweaters and polo shirts wholesale.
The other members of this group run a hardware store, sell handicrafts, sell beauty products and sell car parts.
Ana Maria is grateful to those who will take part in her dream in this way and pledges to make her repayments according to schedule.

loan.use: to buy pants, blouses, sweaters and polo shirts wholesale

loan.name: Cleofe

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MADRES TRABAJADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Cleofe; ella tiene 39 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de frutas, ella vende naranjas, manzanas, platanos, uvas y entre otras frutas, la socia vende en el mercado de Huancaro desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de frutas.La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar frutas al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Cleofe is a member of the 'Madres Trabajadoras' community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.
Cleofe is 39 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her fruit business. She sells oranges, apples, bananas, grapes and other fruit. Cleofe sells her produce in Huancaro market, from 6.00am to 6.00pm. Through her business she gets her children ahead in life. She would like to expand and improve her fruit business. She is requesting this loan to buy fruit wholesale.
Cleofe is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loan.use: to buy fruit wholesale

loan.name: Tiacaque Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "Tiacaque" este nombre fuen elejido por que las seoras viven en la comunidad de Tiacaque que significa lugar donde nace agua entre peascos. Est ubicado en el estado de Mxico y esta comunidad se caracteriza por que hay un centro turistico en la localidad donde hay una enorme presa de agua y la mayoria de los habitantes se dedican a la crianza de borregos. El grupo est conformado por 13 integrantes y es la tercera vez que solicitan un prestamo. Una de las integrantes del grupo se llama Adriana M. Tiene 25 aos, estudi hasta la secundaria, es ama de casa y se dedica a la crianza de animales, principalmente a la cria de borregos, comenta que la crianza de animales es lo que le agrada ya que es una actividad principal en la comunidad y tiene 3 aos criando animales. Ella tiene un hijo de 3 aos de edad. Para ella es la tercera vez que ha entrado en prestamos para fortalecer su negocio y quedando agradecida por la oportunida. Su dedicacin en su negocio ha permitido que sus animales sean reconocidos por los clientes al momento de venderlos ya que la carne es de buena calidad, el prestamo le ayudar a comprar alimento y pastura para sus borregos ya que es lo primordial para que los animales crescan rapidamente y asi poder venderlos. Suea que algun dia pueda incrementar el inventario de sus animales teniendo un corral con 50 cabezas de borregos y poner un local donde venda tacos de barbacoa y obtener mayores ganancias, tambien para contribuir a que sus hijos tengan una mayor educacion y tengan una profesion a futuro.
texts.en:
This group is called 'Tiacaque'. They chose this name because the ladies all live in the community of Tiacaque which means 'place where water is born between rocky outcrops'. The group is located in the State of Mexico and their community is noted for the fact that it has a tourist site where there is an enormous reservoir. Most of the town's inhabitants raise lambs for a living.
The group has 13 members and this is the third time that they have requested a loan. One of the members is called Adriana M. She is 25 years old and studied up to high school. She is a homemaker and also raises animals, mainly lambs. She says that raising animals is something she enjoys. It is the main business activity in her community and she has been raising animals for three years. Adriana has a 3 year-old son. This is the third time that she has taken a loan to strengthen her business and she is grateful for the opportunity. Her dedication to her business has enabled her animals to become well known by her customers because their meat is good quality. This loan will help her to buy feed and fodder for her lambs since this is essential if her animals are to grow quickly and be sold.
Adriana dreams that some day she will be able to increase her inventory of animals, owning 50 head of lambs and setting up premises where she can sell 'tacos de barbacoa' (spicy shredded-beef tacos) and make more profits. She also wants to help her children receive a good education and have a profession in the future.

loan.use: to invest in her business raising lambs

loan.name: Aida

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MADRES TRABAJADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Aida; ella tiene 43 aos de edad y es soltera y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de gas y tambin tiene una tienda de abarrotes donde vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azcar, fideos y leche y tambin la socia vende cerveza desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y venta de gas. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar productos de tiendas de abarrotes y para comprar gas.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Aida is a member of the "MADRES TRABAJADORAS" ("Working Mothers") communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, province of Cusco, department of Cusco.
She is 43 years old, single with 2 children. On top of her daily activities she has a gas selling business and also runs a grocery store selling staples such as rice, sugar, noodles and milk as well as beer. She sells from 5:00 am to 7:00 pm, She would like to expand and improve her grocery store and the gas selling business. She is requesting a loan to buy groceries and gas.
She is happy with the loan and committed to repaying it as agreed.

loan.use: to buy groceries and gas.

loan.name: Jocelinda

texts.es: Jocelinda, de 25 aos, es una mujer ambiciosa y luchadora, vive con sus padres y su hermana Lisbet de 22 aos, en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Palcamayo. Desde hace 5 aos que prepara pan, en un inicio lo distribua en los diferentes puntos de venta de su localidad pero ahora tiene su propia panadera, que adems de vender pan, vende tambin tortas y pasteles. Con ello creci su negocio y sus ganancias, y eso le favoreci mucho para poder ayudar con los gastos de estudios universitarios de su hermana que deseaba estudiar enfermera. Pero para continuar con el apoyo a su familia, tuvo que incursionar en la agricultura, ayudando a sus padres en la siembra de arveja, papa y hortalizas; y durante el fin de semana, ella va a supervisar los cultivos y a negociar lo que ha cosechado en el mercado central de su ciudad; logrando enviar hortalizas a la capital. Lo que ms le gusta a Jocelinda es ayudar a su familia, pues su mayor deseo es ver a su hermana realizada y a sus padres tranquilos. Ahora quiere comprar productos para implementar su panadera, asimismo adquirir su propio terreno y de esa manera poder cultivar mayor cantidad de hortalizas, para cumplir con la demanda que le genera los compradores mayoristas y para ellos tendr que contratar peones para que le ayuden en el cuidado de sus futuros cultivos. Ella pertenece al banco comunal Patrn San Cristbal, y este es el segundo crdito con MFP, donde est segura que su banco comunal es muy respetado en su localidad. Jocelinda, con el crdito solicitado comprar semilla de espinaca, varios sacos de abono orgnico, para su prxima cosecha. Asimismo sacos de harina y manteca para realizar los ricos panes y pasteles que prepara.
texts.en: Jocelinda, 25 years old, is an ambitious and hard-working woman. She lives with her parents and her sister, Lisbet, who is 22, in their own house located in the Palcamayo area. For five years she has prepared bread, initially distributed in the different outlets in her area but now she has her own bread shop where, in addition to selling bread, she also sells cakes and pastries. With that her business and earnings have grown and this helped her a lot to be able to help with the university education expenses of her sister, who wished to study nursing. However, to continue to support her family, she had to enter into agriculture, helping her parents in planting peas, potatoes and vegetables. And on weekends, she supervises the crops and negotiates what has been harvested in the city's central market, sending vegetables to make money. What Jocelinda likes most is helping her family. Her greatest wish is to see her sister successful and her parents calm. Now she wishes to buy products for her bakery, as well as acquire her own land and, in this way, be able to farm a greater quantity of vegetables to meet the demand that the wholesale buyers generate and for that she will have to hire workers to help her to take care of future crops. She belongs to the "Patrn San Cristbal" community bank and this is the second loan with MFP, where she is sure that her community bank is very respected in her area. Jocelinda, with the loan requested, will purchase spinach seeds and various bags of organic fertilizer, for her next harvest, as well as bags of flour and butter to make the delicious bread and cakes that she prepares.

loan.use: to purchase spinach seeds and bags of fertilizer. She will also buy bags of flour for the preparation of bread and cakes.

loan.name: Valentina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MADRES TRABAJADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Valentina; ella tiene 59 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte y tambin se dedica al negocio de servicio de llamadas de forma ambulatoria en las calles de la ciudad de Cusco y su esposo maneja el carro que hace servicio de taxi, por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de transporte y servicio de llamadas. La socia solicita el prstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro y pagar las lneas de sus celulares.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "Madres Trabajadores" ("working mothers") community bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province and department of Cusco.
The member is Valentina. She is 59 years old and lives with her partner and has two children. The member alternates her daily activities between a transportation business and also a business providing a calling service of a wandering nature in the streets of the city of Cusco and her husband drives the car that performs a taxi service. Through these businesses, the member gets her children ahead. She wishes to expand the transportation business and calling service. She is requesting a loan to maintain her car and to pay for the cell phone lines.
The member is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loan.use: to maintain her car and to pay for her cell phone lines.

loan.name: Yovana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MADRES TRABAJADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Yovana; ella tiene 40 aos de edad y es soltera y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de servicios de llamadas telefnicas, ella tiene celulares y presta servicio de llamadas en las diferentes calles de la ciudad de Cusco, ella trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, por medio de este pequeo trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere terminar de construir su casa. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar materiales de construccin como yeso, cemento y arena para hacer el acabado de su casa.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "Madres Trabajadoras" (working mothers) community bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province and department of Cusco.
The member is Yovana. She is 40 years old and is single and has three children. She alternates her daily activities with telephone call services. She has cell phones and loans calling service in different streets in the city of Cusco. She works from 5AM until 10PM. Through this small job, this member gets her children ahead. She wants to finish building her house. She is requesting the loan in order to buy construction materials such as plaster, cement and sand to finish her house.
The member is happy for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loan.use: to purchase construction materials such as plaster, cement and sand to finish her house.

loan.name: Karen

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MADRES TRABAJADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Karen; ella tiene 20 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ocas (es un tubrculo parecido a la papa),ella los prepara al horno y los vende en forma ambulatoria en el mercado de la ciudad de Cusco, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ocas al horno. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar ocas al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the WORKING MOTHERS cooperative bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the Cusco province.
The member is Karen; she is 20 years old, partnered, and has 1 son. She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling ocas (a tuber similar to a potato). She prepares them in an oven, and sells them in the Cusco citys market. She works from 8:00 am until 5:00 pm. By means of this business, she helps her family get ahead. She would like to expand her business selling oven-roasted ocas. She requests a loan to buy ocas at wholesale.
She is glad for the opportunity to get a loan, and commits to making her payments on schedule.

loan.use: buy ocas (a tuber similar to a potato) at wholesale.

loan.name: Flamingos I Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "Flamingos" y se ubica en la cacomunidad en el estado de Puebla en Mxico. El grupo esta conformado por 11 integrantes y es la primera vez que solicitan un prestamo. La seora Florina es una integrante del grupo se dedica a la venta de marranos que inicio hace 10 aos. Solicita el prestamo para comprar ms marranos para criar y posteriormente vender. Ella estudio hasta el tercer ao de primaria, esta casada y tiene en total 3 hijos. Al momento de solicitar este prestamo se siente entusiasmada por la oportunidad que le brindan de crecer en su negocio y superarse. Quiere este prestamo para comprar ms animales que ya tiene comprometidos y con esto tener mayor ganancias y as brindarles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y la oportunidad de ofrecerles educacin con lo cual puedan tener un mejor futuro y cumplir sus metas que se propongan. Observaciones la seora que no se alcanza a ver bien en la fotografia se llama Alejandra
texts.en:
This group is called Flamingoes and is located in the state of Puebla in Mexico. The group is comprised of 11 members, and this is the first time they request a loan. Florina is one of the members; she dedicates herself to selling hogs, a business she started 10 years ago.
She requests this loan to buy more animals to raise and later sell. She studied up to the third grade, is married and has 3 children. At the time of making this request for a loan, she is enthusiastic about the opportunity it gives her to grow her business and succeed.
She would like this loan to buy more animals since she already has commitments for them. This brings her more income, which will allow her to provide a better standard of living for her children and to offer them an education so they can enjoy brighter futures and meet any goals they set for themselves. Note that the woman who is difficult to see in the picture is named Alejandra.

loan.use: buy hogs to raise.

loan.name: Sofia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MADRES TRABAJADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Sofia; ella tiene 42 aos de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ocas (es un tubrculo parecido a la papa) y tambin vende pltanos al horno, ella vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m por medio de estos pequeos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de ocas y pltanos al horno. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar pltanos y ocas para preparar al horno.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the WORKING MOTHERS cooperative bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the Cusco province.
The member is Sofia; she is 42 years old and single. She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling ocas (a tuber similar to a potato) and also sells baked bananas. She works as a street vendor from 9:00 am until 4:00 pm and, by means of this business, she helps her children get ahead. She would like to expand and improve her business selling baked ocas and bananas. She requests this loan to buy bananas and ocas to prepare in the oven.
She is very glad to have access to a loan, and commits to making her payments on schedule.

loan.use: buy bananas and ocas (a tuber similar to a potato) to bake in the oven.

loan.name: Jose

texts.es: Jos, de 22 aos; es un hombre soltero y trabajador. Vive en compaa de su padre Adn, su mam Armanda y su hermanito Jean. Juntos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Palcamayo. Hace ms de 2 aos que se dedica a la agricultura, pues sus padres necesitaban de su apoyo y sobre todo su vitalidad, desde entonces siembra espinaca, arveja y flor de gladiolo sobre terrenos propios y alquilados. Este joven adems de la fortaleza que tiene para ejecutar este trabajo, tambin es negociante, por lo que cada temporada se va a la capital de pas para comercializar sus productos, obteniendo una considerable ganancia. Adems cuenta que en sus tiempos libres, trabaja como pen en otros terrenos agrcolas, No puedo estar sin hacer nada, afirma. Por ello cada vez que puede ahorra lo necesario para comprarse sus propios terrenos agrcolas e independizarse de sus padres, a quienes agradece las enseanzas que le brindaron y promete ofrecerles una vejez sana y muy feliz. l pertenece al banco comunal Patrn San Cristbal, y este es el primer crdito con MFP, donde espera obtener muchos xitos con su asociacin. Jos, dentro de estos das sembrar espinaca; por ello con el crdito solicitado comprar semilla y varios sacos de abono orgnico para su fertilizacin.
texts.en:
Jos is 22 years old, and a single, hard-working young man. He lives with his father, Adn, his mother, Armanda, and his little brother, Jean. They live together in their own house, located in the Palcamayo area.
He has dedicated himself to farming for more than 2 years, as his parents needed his support and, most of all, his vitality. Since then, he has planted spinach, peas and gladiolas on lands they own and some they rent. This young man, in addition to the strength he has for carrying out this work, is also a merchant. Each season, he goes to the countrys capital city to sell his products, obtaining substantial profits. In addition, when he has free time, he works as a laborer on agricultural lands. I cant spend time doing nothing, he affirms.
For this reason, each time he can, he saves the necessary amount to buy himself some land to become independent from his parents. He is very thankful to them for all they have taught him, and promises to offer them a healthy and happy life in their old age.
He belongs to the Patrn San Cristbal cooperative bank. This is his first loan with MFP, where he hopes to have many successes with their association. During these days, Jos will plant spinach; for this reason, he will use the loan he is requesting to buy seeds and various sacks of organic fertilizer for his crop.

loan.use: buy spinach seeds and sacks of organic fertilizer.

loan.name: Juan Ramn

texts.es: El seor Ramn de 27 aos de edad, es soltero y cuenta con un lavadero y gomera propios en el predio de la casa de sus padres. Gracias a la ayuda econmica de su padre, quien es empleado de una empresa de transporte, y de su madre, quien posee un pequeo copetn, pudieron adquirir todo lo necesario para montar el pequeo taller y lavadero. Actualmente necesita de un nuevo compresor de aire ya que el que posee est bastante deteriorado por el uso realizado en estos ltimos tres aos. Agradece a Fundacin Paraguaya por la confianza otorgada y comenta que con el compresor nuevo estara cumpliendo mejor con su numerosa clientela.
texts.en:
Ramn is 27 years old, single, and has his own laundry and tire workshop at his parents house. Thanks to the financial support from his father, who works for a transportation enterprise, and his mother, who has a small snack bar, they were able to acquire the necessities for starting the small workshop and laundry.
Currently, he needs a new air compressor, as the one he currently has is very deteriorated due to all the use it has had over the past three years.
He thanks the Paraguaya Foundation for their confidence in him, and comments that the new air compressor would allow him to better serve his many customers.

loan.use: buy a new air compressor.

loan.name: Analffy

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal MADRES TRABAJADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Analffy; el tiene 45 aos de edad y es casado y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, el socio vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azcar, leche y fideos y tambin el socio trabaja como mecanico,el arregla motosierras,por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y mejorar el negocio de motosierras. El socio solicita el prstamo para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes y algunos materiales para arreglar la motosierra.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "Madres Trabajadores" ("working mothers") community bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province and department of Cusco.
The member is Analffy. He is 45 years old and is married and has three children. He alternates his daily activities with his grocery store business. The member sells basic necessity products like rice, sugar, milk and noodles and also works as a mechanic. He fixes chainsaws. Through these businesses he gets his children ahead. The member wishes to expand and improve the grocery store and improve his chainsaw business. He is requesting the loan to purchase products for the shop and some materials to fix the chainsaw.
The member is happy about the loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loan.use: To purchase products for his grocery store and some materials to fix his chainsaw.

loan.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal MADRES TRABAJADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Agustn; el tiene 55 aos de edad y es casado y tiene 6 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de carpintera metalica y tambin es maestro de construccion,el hace estos trabajos en forma independiente construyendo algunas casas y haciendo trabajos de carpintera metalica como puertas, ventanas y estructuras metalicas,el socio quiere refaccionar y mejorar su casa. El socio solicita el prstamo para comprar materiales de construccin como pintura, cemento y arena.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Agustin is a member of the "MADRES TRABAJADORAS" ("Working Mothers") communal bank. The bank is Located in the district of Cusco, province of Cusco, department of Cusco.
He is 55 years old, married with 6 children. Alongside his daily activities he runs a metalwork business and he also works as master builder. He works independently, building some houses and doing metalwork jobs such as doors, windows and metal structures. He would like to renovate and improve his home. He is requesting the loan to buy building materials such as paint, concrete and sand.
The partner is happy for the loan and committed to repaying it as agreed.

loan.use: to buy building materiasl such as paint, concrete and sand.

loan.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal MADRES TRABAJADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio tiene 35 aos de edad y es casado y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, el realiza servicio de turismo y tambin servicio de taxi, el socio trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, el tambin lleva turistas a distintos lugares como Ollantaytambo, Chinchero y Machupicchu, el socio quiere mejorar el servicio de turismo. El socio solicita el prstamo para mantenimiento de su carro para comprar algunos repuestos de carro.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "Madres Trabajadoras" ("working mothers") community bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province and department of Cusco.
The member is 35 years old and is married and has one child. The member alternates his daily activities with the transportation business. He provides a tourism service and also a taxi service. He works from 7AM until 6PM. He also takes tourists to different places like Ollantaytambo, Chinchero and Machupicchu. The member wishes to improve his tourism service. The member requests the loan to maintain his car and to buy some car parts.
The member is happy for the loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loan.use: To maintain his car and to buy some car parts.

loan.name: Andres Dario

texts.es: Andres es un joven de 19 aos que desde los 16, inicio su vida laboral trabajando con unos amigos como ayudante en un almacn de repuesto y lujos para carros en el barrio 7 de Agosto en la ciudad Bogot; Posterior a esta experiencia con recursos propios emprendi hace un ao y medio su propio negocio de instalacin de alarmas, bloqueos, radios y venta de cajas de sonido para carros; l vive con sus padres y su hija de 4 meses que est a su cargo y es su mayor motivacin para con su negocio construir un futuro prometedor, que la lleve a alcanzar el xito de manera conjunta. En su negocio vende alarmas para autos, alarmas y bloqueo central, radio e instalacin, as mismo fabrica parlantes y cajones de sonidos para carros. Su poco capital de trabajo lo obliga a hacer compras en pequeas cantidades y con mucha frecuencia porque despus de vender el artculo, con ese mismo dinero surte y reemplaza el articulo que vendi. Esta es una de las razones por las cuales recurre a su credikiva, que es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprar cajas de maderas, alarmas, parlantes, bloqueos automticos, radios y herramientas para mejorar la oferta de su taller, donde ofrece el servicio de instalacin de equipos, sonidos para autos y fabrica tambien parlantes. Su sueo es posicionarse en el mercado, dndose a conocer por el servicio de buena calidad que ofrece y por los productos que vende en su almacn, porque en la actualidad surtirlo es su mayor desafo, as como el no tener una vivienda propia. Mientras Andres construye sus sueos persiste en su trabajo responsable y disciplinado para lograrlo.
texts.en:
Andres is a young man of 19 years who, since he was 16, began his career working with some friends as a helper in a car parts and lights store in the 7 de Agosto neighborhood in the city of Bogot. After this experience, with his own resources, he started his own business installing alarms, locks, radios and selling sound boxes for cars a year and a half ago. He lives with his parents and his 4-month-old daughter who is in his care and is his greatest motivation to build a promising future with his business that leads to success together.
In his business, he sells car alarms, alarms and central locking, radio and installation, as well as making speakers and sound boxes for cars. His little working capital obliges him to make purchases in small quantities and with a lot of frequency because after selling the item, with that same money, he stocks and replaces the item he sold. This is one of the reasons why he uses crediKiva, which is the first loan that he made with Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, and with which he will buy wooden boxes, alarms, speakers, automatic locks, radios and tools to improve the offerings of his shop, where he offers the service of installing equipment, car audio systems and makes speakers as well. He dream is to position himself in the market, becoming known for the good quality service that he offers and for the products that he sells in his store since, currently, stocking is his greatest challenge, as well as not having his own home. While Andres builds his dreams, he persists in his work in a responsible and disciplined manner to achieve them.

loan.use: To buy wooden boxes, alarms, speakers, automatic locks, radios and tools to improve his shop's offer.

loan.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MADRES TRABAJADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia tiene 56 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de costurera y tambin vende chompas, la socia cose pantalones, blusas y faldas y tambin teje las chompas y lo vende en forma independiente, por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar y ampliar el negocio de costurera y venta de chompas. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar materiales como hilos y lanas para coser y tejer las chompas y pantalones.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the 'Madres Trabajadoras' community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.
The borrower is 56 years old, lives with her partner, and has three children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her dressmaking business. She also sells sweaters. She sews pants, blouses and skirts and also knits sweaters which she sells independently. Through these businesses, she gets her children ahead in life. The borrower would like to improve and expand her dressmaking business and her sweater business. she is requesting this loan to buy materials such as threads and yarn with which to sew and knit sweaters and pants. She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loan.use: to buy materials such as threads and yarn to sew and knit sweaters and pants

loan.name: Iris Ii Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "Iris ll" porque es el nombre de la hija de la seora Amanda quien es la presidenta del grupo y se ubican en Puebla en Mxico. El grupo esta conformado por 8 integrantes y es la primera vez que solicitan un prestamo. La seora Amanda se dedica a la compra/venta de ropa en su domicilio que inicio hace 2 aos. Solicita el prestamo para comprar ropa de temporada que ya le pidieron sus clientas, tiene 29 aos, estudio hasta el sexto ao de primaria, ella vive en union libre y tiene en total 2 hijos. Al momento de solicitar este prestamo se siente entusiasmada al ofrecerles esta oportunidad. Con esto desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida para ella y su familia. La seora Carmen V. es otra integrante de este grupo. Tiene 57 aos de edad, no tiene estudios, es legalmente casada y tiene una hija. Ella se dedica a la costura que inicio hace 5 aos. Solicita el prestamo para comprar tela e hilos que le hacen falta. Sus clientes son de la misma localidad. Al momento de solicitar este prestamo se siente entusiasmada ya que se surtira de tela e hilos para seguir haciendo crecer su negocio. Tambien espera tener mas clientes y mejorar sus ganancias para brindarle una mejor calidad de vida para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
This group is called "Iris ll" because it is the name of Amanda's daughter (Amanda is the group's president). It is located in Puebla, in Mexico.
This group has eight members and this is the first time that they have requested a loan. Amanda works buying and selling clothes from her home. She started her business two years ago. She is requesting this loan to buy seasonal clothes that her customers have already requested. She is 29 years old, studied up to the sixth year of elementary school, lives with her partner, and has two children. At the time of requesting this loan she feels enthusiastic that her group has been offered this opportunity. She hopes that it will enable her to provide her family with a better quality of life.
Carmen V. is another member of the group. She is 57 years old, didn't attend school, is married, and has one daughter. She has been running a sewing business for five years and is requesting this loan to buy fabric and threads that she needs. Her customers are from the same town. At the time of requesting this loan she feels enthusiastic as she will be able to stock up on fabric and thread so that she can continue growing her business. She hopes to attract more customers and improve her profits so that she can provide her family with a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy seasonal clothes

loan.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan de 35 aos, es soltero, tiene casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios bsicos (agua,luz y desage), ubicada en una zona rural del departamento de Lambayeque. Este distrito se caracteriza por que sus pobladores desarrollan la actividad agricola, ganadera y turismo.
Juan se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves corral como gallinas y pavos, ganado ovino (ovejas) y caprino (cabras), sus corrales de crianza se encuentran en la parte externa de su casa. A sus animales los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales, una vez que estos han llegado a su desarrollo ptimo los ofrece a la venta a los pobladores y en los diferentes mercados de Lambayeque, la venta de sus animales le permite tener ingresos para poder solventar sus gastos personales.
Con el prstamo que le piensan dar va a comprar ms animales y alimentos para los mismos, y as pueda seguir incrementando sus ventas y tener unamejor calidad de vida. Por eso ha visto conveniente solicitar dicho prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles. Juan es una persona que quiere superarse en la vida siendo responsable y empeosa en todo lo que hace y siempre con elobjetivoque su negocio crezca cada vez ms para pagar su crdito y seguir mejorando cada da.
texts.en:
Juan is 35 years old, single, and he has a house of his own. It is not equipped with basic services (water, electricity, or sewage services). It is located in a rural region in the department of Lambayeque. This district is known for its population who are involved in agriculture, farming, and tourism activities.
Juan raises and sells poultry, such as chicken and turkeys, sheep, and goats from corrals. They are located in the external part of his property. He feeds them balanced feed and natural grasses. Once they have reached an optimal level in their development he offers them for sale to the locals and at the different markets in Lambayeque. The livestock sales help him earn an income to cover his personal expenses.
With the loan that he requests he will purchase more livestock and feed to keep increasing his sales and to achieve a better quality of life. He has seen it convenient to request a loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 2000 nuevos soles. Juan is a person who wants to excel in life, being a responsible and earnest person in everything he does. He has always had an objective to keep increasing his business to be able to repay his loan and to advance more every day.

loan.use: to purchase more livestock and their feed.

loan.name: Marica Lorena

texts.es:
Marcia es una mujer trabajadora que tiene muchas aspiraciones en su vida por eso es vendedora de ropa y artculos segn la temporada.
Ella y su esposo se dedican al comercial de mercadera y ropa para poder mantener a sus tres hijos. Trabajan en conjunto porque tienen que viajar a otras provincias para tener un resultado favorable en sus ventas ya que en las provincias se vende ms la mercadera. Venden camisas, pantalones, zapatos.
Tienes muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere seguir trabajando pero por ahora quiere adecuar su casa para darle una buena vida a sus hijos. Por eso quiere con el prstamo comprar cemento, arena, bloques. En el futuro quiere continuar con el negocio familiar.
texts.en:
Marcia is a hard-working woman who has a lot of aspirations in life. Her business is selling clothes and other goods according to the season.
Marcia and her husband sell merchandise and clothes so that they can support their three children. They work together because they have to travel to other provinces in order to make good sales since their merchandise sells better in the provinces. They sell shirts, pants and shoes.
Marcia has a lot of aspirations for her business and would like to continue working. However, right now she would like to do some work on her house so that she can provide her children with a good life. She would like to use her loan to buy cement, sand and blocks. In the future, she would like to continue with her family business.

loan.use: to buy cement, stone and sand

loan.name: Epifanio

texts.es: Epifanio, de 45 aos, natural de la ciudad de Quimbiri, convive con Juana de 48 aos padres de 04 hijos, quienes conforman la felicidad de su hogar y viven en su propia casa en la comunidad de Vista Alegre Baja. Epifanio es un hombre trabajador, se dedica con mucho esmero a la labor que realiza. Su trabajo consiste en labrar la tierra, es campesino y cuenta con 04 hectreas de terreno en donde cultiva cacao, caf y barbasco plantas que con mucho esfuerzo consigui tornarlas muy productivas. Son 20 aos de trabajo continuo por lo que lo ha convertido en una persona con mucha experiencia. Sin embargo sabe que este trabajo es arduo, as es que debe contratar jornaleros cuando es temporada de cosecha y limpieza de sus campos. La cantidad de frutos que recolecta son llevados a las empresas acopiadoras, en donde le remuneran muy bien por cada kilogramo que vende. El problema de su trabajo radica en no poder combatir con los insectos quienes se encargan de daar los frutos de las plantas. Pero ahora lo que ms prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras ya que no cuenta con espacios para seguir sembrando. Este es su quinto crdito con MFP y se compromete seguir aportando sus cuotas puntualmente como en los anteriores crditos, agradece a los socios de su banco comunal por elegirle como presidente de la junta directiva. Con el crdito solicitado comprar plantas de cacao para luego sembrarlos de manera tecnificada.
texts.en:
Epifanio is 45 years old and from the city of Quimbiri. He lives with his partner, 48 year-old Juana, and the couple have four children who bring happiness to their home. They live in their own home, in the community of Vista Alegre Baja.
Epifanio is a hard-working man who puts a lot of care into the work that he does. He is a farmer. He owns four hectares of land where he grows cacao, coffee and barbasco plants which, through a lot of effort, he has managed to make very productive. He has been working for twenty years and so has a lot of experience. However, he knows that the work is hard and he hires day laborers when it is the season to harvest and weed his fields. He takes the fruit that he harvests to middlemen who pay him very well for every kilogram of produce that he sells. The problem in his work lies in not being able to fight the pests which damage the fruit on his plants. However, his main priority right now is buying new land as he doesn't have enough space to continue sowing.
This is Epifanio's fifth loan from MFP and he pledges to continue making his repayments on time as he did with his previous loans. He is grateful to the other members of his community bank for electing him as president of the board of directors. He will use the loan he has requested to buy cacao plants which he will then sow using modern technology.

loan.use: to buy cacao plants

loan.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes es socia del Banco Comunal Estrella, es casada, tiene tres hijos de 24, 23, 19 aos, Mercedes se dedica a la venta de verduras, frutas, carne en un triciclo por las calles del distrito de San Juan Bautista. El prstamo que solicita lo invertir en la compra de verduras, frutas, carne, para surtir su mercadera. Mercedes comenz con ste negocio hace 7 aos, porque su esposo no le ayudaba y tenia que mantener a sus hijos. Ingres a FINCA Per, por la invitacin de una socia, le gusta porque le ensearon a valorarse a trabajar, le dan prstamos para trabajar, pasa bonitos momentos con sus compaeras del banco estando en FINCA educo a su hija que termino enfermera tcnica. Su sueo es que su negocio siga prosperando y vender en su casa, construir el segundo piso de sus casa.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a member of the Estrella community bank. She is married and has three children aged 24, 23 and 19. Mercedes sells fruit, vegetables and meat from a three-wheeled vehicle in the streets of San Juan Bautista district. She will invest the loan that she has requested in buying fruit, vegetables and meat with which to stock her business. Mercedes started this business seven years ago because her husband didn't help her and she needed to support her children.
Mercedes joined FINCA Peru through an invitation from an existing borrower. She likes it because they have taught her to value work and given her loans so that she can work. She enjoys spending time with the other members of her community bank and she has managed to educate her daughter who has finished a nursing course. Mercedes' dream is for her business to continue prospering and to be able to sell from home. She would also like to build a second level on her house.

loan.use: to buy fruit and vegetables

loan.name: Doris

texts.es: Doris es socia del Banco Comunal Estrella, casada con 28 aos y tres hijos de 11, 10, 3 aos de edad. Doris se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en general, pollo, carne, verduras, frutas. El prstamo que solicita lo invertir en la compra de arroz, azcar, fideos, harina, verduras, frutas, para surtir su mercadera. Comenz con ste negocio hace ms de un ao. Ingreso a FINCA Per, por la invitacin de una amiga, est en tres ciclos, le gusta por la facilidad de crditos y puede ahorrar, ahora est ahorrando para tener ms capital de trabajo. Su sueo es que su negocio crezca, poder construir el tercer piso de su casa y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Doris is a member of the "Estrella" (Star) Communal Bank. She is married, 28 years old, and has three children ages 11, 10 and 3.
Doris sells groceries like chicken, beef, vegetables and fruit. The loan she is asking for will be used to buy rice, sugar, pasta, flour, vegetables and fruit to stock her store. She began this business more than a year ago.
Doris joined FINCA Per because a friend invited her. She is in her third loan cycle, and she likes it because the loans are easy to deal with and she can save up money. Right now she is saving to have more working capital.
Her dream is that her business will grow, she will be able to build a third floor onto her house and her children will become professionals.

loan.use: to buy rice, sugar, pasta, flour, vegetables and fruit.

loan.name: Angelica

texts.es: Anglica es socia del Banco Comunal Estrella, tiene 25 aos es soltera, es de profesin tcnica en enfermera. Se dedica a la venta de verduras en el mercado 12 de Abril. El prstamo que solicita lo invertir en la compra de verduras para surtir su mercadera. Antes trabaja con su mam y decidi independizarse y le va bien. Su sueo es que su negocio siga creciendo y tener su casa propia.
