Con la ayuda del prstamo desea comprarse una impresora y materiales para hacer sus manualidades. E incrementar sus ganancias. En un futuro desea crecer en su negocio y abrir una papelera para vender sus trabajos y darle lo mejor a su hijo.
texts.en:
Paola, 36, lives in an urban zone in El Suburbio, Guayaquil. Shes a widow and has a 17-year-old son who is going to the university. She makes crafts and teaches crafts at home.
She started out learning how to draw figures at home and one day that there was a gathering at home she made the decorations for the occasion and liked it. They decided to have her make figures or decorations so she went into making items out of Foamex (flexible polyurethane used in crafts) and all kinds of crafts for parties. She starts her work day at around 9am and goes until the class finishes, which might be an hour or two.
With help from the loan she wants to buy a printer and supplies she uses in her crafts making to increase her profits. In the future she wants her business to grow and to open a stationery shop to sell her work and provide her son with the best.

loan.use: to buy a printer and crafts making supplies.

loan.name: Suzana Elizabeth

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Unin Y Desarrollo se rene cada quince das en la ciudadela las Orqudeas de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por la calidez de su gente y por su empuje para salir adelante.
En este lugar conocimos a la seora Suzana, tiene 28 aos de edad y mantiene una relacin de unin libre de la cual tiene un hijo de dos aos. El marido es comerciante. Est en el Banco Comunal hace cinco ciclos y le gusta porque los intereses son ms bajos que en otras instituciones de crdito adems por la facilidad para acceder a estos crditos.
Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, zapatos y sandalias, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y tambin vende en su casa, nos cuenta que le realizan pedidos sus clientes ya que la mercadera que ella vende es trada desde Colombia y a sus clientes les encanta ya que es de muy buena calidad y porque da muchas facilidades de pago. Trabaja todos los das, deja a crdito y cobra cada quince das. Su mercadera la va a comprar a Colombia cada vez que necesita. Tiene cinco aos que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
Este crdito es para viajar a Colombia a comprar ropa, zapatos y sadalias ya que tiene bastantes encargos.
Su sueo es tener casa propia pues donde vive es alquilado.
texts.en:
The Unin y Desarrollo (Union and Development) communal bank meets every two weeks in Portoviejos Orqudeas neighborhood, a place known for the warmth of its residents and their drive to get ahead.
We met Suzana, 28, here. She is in a common law relationship and has a 2-year-old son. Her husbands a merchant. Shes been in the communal bank for five cycles and likes it because interest is lower than in other financial institutions and also because of the ease of acquiring loans.
She sells all kinds of clothes, shoes and sandals. She sells door to door and also at home. She tells us that customers place orders since the merchandise she sells comes from Colombia and her customers are delighted because its very good quality and because she gives them many payment options. She works every day, sells on credit and collects bi-weekly. She goes to Colombia to buy the merchandise each time she needs to. Shes been in this line of work for five years and does very well.
This loan is to travel to Colombia to buy clothes, shoes and sandals because she already has several pending orders. Her dream is to have a house of her own because where she lives now is rented.

loan.use: to buy clothes, shoes and sandals.

loan.name: Bertha

texts.es: La seora Bertha es una cliente antigua desde el ao 2004 estuvo en grupo "leo" trabajo 12 secuencias en el grupo demostrando puntualidad y responsabilidad en el pago de sus cuotas. Actualmente se independizo del grupo y solicita un crdito individual. La cliente vive cerca a su negocio que esta ubicado en la zona villa victoria. Ella esta muy contenta de que se le haya elegido para el programa Kiva debido a que siente beneficiada de gran manera con el prstamo que se le otorga, ella se dedica a la venta de comida con ambiente propio y se levanta muy temprano para preparar los alimentos y poderlos vender a los choferes y transentes de la misma zona. La seora es separada y con los ingresos de su negocio solventa a sus tres hijos. Ahora el crdito lo destinar para comprar productos de abarrotes para su negocio. Y as mejorar sus ingresos, es un apersona muy trabajadora agradecida con la institucin por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Bertha is a longtime client who has been working in the communal bank "Leo" since 2004. This group has been through 12 loan cycles and has demonstrated punctuality and responsibility in making its payments. Now Bertha is separating from the group and requesting an individual loan. She lives close to her business, which is located in the neighborhood Villa Victoria. Bertha is very pleased to have been chosen for the Kiva program, because she feels that she will benefit greatly from the loan that will be granted. She has a business selling food in her own place; she gets up very early to prepare the food, so that she can sell it to the drivers and passers-by in the same neighborhood. Bertha is separated, and with the income from her business she covers the expenses for her 3 children. This loan will be used to buy grocery products for her business so that she can increase her income. She is a very hardworking person who is grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loan.use: to buy grocery products for her business

loan.name: Sartasiani Group

texts.es:
La A.C. SARTASIANI iniciar su cuarto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Villa Exaltacin, est compuesta por ocho integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Irene. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de refrescos, venta de queso, elaboracin de todo tipo de costura, construccin, venta de ropa interior, profesora, taxista, elaboracin de calzados.
La seora Irene, indica que hace un ao y seis meses que compone Pro Mujer y que ingreso por invitacin de su hija. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de ropa interior, que viene trabajando desde que inicio en nuestra institucin, ya que anteriormente tena otro negocio, pero su hermana le inform del trabajo con esta mercadera.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar su mercadera (compra de ropa interior), este material lo compra de la cuidad de la calle Tumusla (calle comercial de la ciudad de La paz) y los vender de forma ambulante tres veces a la semana. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella vive en unin libre y tiene siete hijos.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gustan los dems servicios y la metodologa.
En la fotografa no parase la seora Silvia, por razones culturales
texts.en:
The group "A.C. Sartasinani" will start its 4th loan cycle with Pro Mujuer. This group is meets in the Villa Exaltacion central office of Pro Mujer, and is made up of 8 members. The group is led by its board of directors, which is headed by Irene. The members of this group have a variety of different businesses, including: the sale of soft drinks, the sale of cheese, dressmaking, construction, the sale of undergarments, and shoe production. The group also includes a teacher and a taxi driver.
Irene tells us that it's been a year and a half since she joined Pro Mujer at the invitation of her daughter. Now she has a business selling undergarments that she has been working in since she started with our institution. Previously, she had a different business, but her daughter suggested that she work with this type of merchandise.
The loan that she will get now will be used to increase her merchandise (to buy undergarments.) She will buy this merchandise on Tumusla street (a commercial street in the city of La Paz), and she will sell the merchandise in an itinerant manner 3 days a week. This type of work will allow her to generate resources to help support her family, as she lives in a common-law marriage and has 7 children.
When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responded that she likes the services and the methodologies of the institution.
In the photograph the member Silvia is not seen for cultural reasons.

loan.use: to buy merchandise (clothing)

loan.name: Jose

texts.es: Jose es vecino viven en la comunidad de Cimarrn de Cartago. Es una persona muy simptica conocido por su don de gente y liderazgo. Jose es agricultor de granos bsicos principalmente, pero ha decidido probar con un nuevo producto en la zona. Es por eso que desea un prstamo de 594000 (quinientos noventa y cuatro mil colones) para la compra de semilla de banano, para empezar a sembrar su banano en su finquita. El est seguro de que la cosecha va estar buena, por el clima esperado y mejora aun por los precios en el mercado El es socio de la Empresa de Crdito comunal Nuevas Esperanzas para Cimarrn una de las 110 empresas socias de EDESA en Costa Rica.
texts.en:
Jos lives in the community of Cimarrn de Cartago. He is a very likeable person whos known for his sociability and leadership.
Jos farms basic grains mainly. But hes decided to try a new product in the zone. Because of this he needs a 594000 (five-hundred ninety-four thousand colones) loan to buy banana seeds to start planting bananas on his farm. He is sure that the harvest will be good because of the expected weather and even more so because of current market prices.
Hes a member of the Nuevas Esperanzas para Cimarrn (New Hopes for Cimarrn) communal bank, one of EDESAs 110 social enterprises in Costa Rica.

loan.use: to buy banana seeds.

loan.name: Raquel

texts.es: Raquel, de 34 aos, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Agapito de 29 aos y sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Vendiendo zapatos, Raquel a sabido progresar en su vida, los novedosos modelos que vende, la han convertido en una vendedora muy solicitada entre las vecinas del Asentamiento Humano Pachacutec, sus clientes siempre se van muy contentos y satisfechos, adems que reciben una buena atencin. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus vecinas y enterarse de las cosas que suceden en su barrio, lleva 2 aos en este negocio y considera que lo ms difcil es tener que caminar todos los das en busca de clientes. En el futuro le gustara tener una tienda donde pueda vender una mayor cantidad de zapatos. Este es el tercer crdito con MFP, ella no tiene dudas en poder pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, ya que confa mucho en su negocio. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprar ms zapatos, para as poder incrementar la cantidad que vende normalmente.
texts.en:
Raquel, 34, is a very gracious, hard working woman. She lives in her own house with her husband, Agapito, 29, and their three beloved children for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life. Selling shoes Raquel has known how to make progress in life. The up-to-date models she sells have turned her into a very sought after seller among the neighbors in Pachacutec. Her customers always leave happy and satisfied having received, in addition, good service.
What she enjoys the most about her work is chatting with her customers and learning about everything thats going on in her neighborhood. Shes been in business for two years and considers the most difficult part having to walk every day in search of customers. In the future shed like to have a store where she can sell larger amounts of shoes.
This is her 3rd loan with MFP. She has no doubt that she will repay her loan installments on time because she has a lot of faith in her business. She will use the requested 1000 new soles to buy more shoes to increase the amount she usually sells.

loan.use: to stock up on more shoes.

loan.name: Flerida Mallita

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Unin Y Desarrollo se rene cada quince das en la ciudadela las Orqudeas de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por la calidez de su gente y por su empuje para salir adelante.
La seora Flerida es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta por las facilidades para conseguir los crditos y por los beneficios que brinda la institucin. Tiene 36 aos de edad, est casada pero aun no ha podido tener hijos. Su esposo es empleado pblico.
Es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos se dedica a la venta de ropa por catalogo y productos de Yanbal, Avon y Esika (productos de belleza, cosmticos, perfumera y accesorios para damas). Trabaja todos los das unas tres horas diarias, nos cuenta que ella visita a sus clientes en las tardes o noches cuando llegan de sus trabajos lo que le facilita sus ventas, deja sus productos a crdito y cobra cada semana. Sus productos los recibe en su casa y lo que es ropa en el centro en una distribuidora. Lleva cuatro aos dedicada a esta actividad y le ha ido muy bien.
Este crdito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosmticos y ropa de todo tipo.
Sus sueos son seguir adelante en su negocio y que se lleven a cabo todo sus proyectos futuros.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank, Unity and Development, meets every two weeks in the Orqudeas neighborhood in the city of Portoviejo. It is a place known for the warmth of its people and for their drive to get ahead.

Mrs. Flerida is a founding member of the communal bank and she likes it because of the ease of acquiring loans and the benefits the foundation gives her. Mrs. Flerida is 36 years old and married but hasnt been able to have any children; her husband is a public servant.

She is a housewife and to have her own income she sells clothing via catalogue and Yanbal, Avon and Esika products (beauty products, makeup, perfumes and accessories for women). Mrs. Flerida works everyday about 3 hours and says that her customers visit her in the afternoons or evenings when they get out of work which helps her sales. She leaves her products on credit and collects each week. Mrs. Flerida receives her products at home and the clothing at a distributor, she has worked for four years in this field and has done very well.

The loan is to buy perfumes, creams, makeup and all types of clothing.

Mrs. Fleridas dreams include succeeding in her business and that she will be able to do all of her future projects.

loan.use: buy perfumes, creams, makeup and all types of clothing.

loan.name: Diokere Endam Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de solidarit DIOKORE ENDAM est cr le 31/05/2007.IL est compos de 13 femmes issues du mme quartier.la plupart des membres font du petit commerce.
Madame AIDA en position debout et l'extrme droite de la photo est la responsable du groupe.Elle est marie et mre de 05 enfants qui sont lves,elle est ge de 40 ans.
Elle fait un petit commerce de tissus thioup et wax.Elle pratique cette activit depuis 04 ans.
Elle a eu faire la mme activit lors du financement prcdent.
Avec ce prt elle va acheter des tissus et thioup.
Son objectif est de soutenir son mari dans la prise en charge de la scolarit des enfants tout en augmentant son niveau d'pargne dans le BV.
texts.en:
The DIOKORE ENDAM solidarity group was created May 31, 2007. It is composed of 13 women, who hail from the same neighborhood. Most members are active in retail.
Mrs. AIDA, who is standing all the way to the right of the picture, is the group's leader. She is married and a mother of five children who go to school. She is 40 years old.
She retails thioup and wax fabrics (West-African dyed fabrics). She has been active in this business for four years. She was in the same business for the previous loan.
With this loan, she is going to purchase fabrics and thioup. Her objective is to support her husband in taking care of the children's school expenses and to increase her level of savings in the "Banc Villageois" (loan group).

loan.use: to puchase "thioup" and "wax" fabrics.

loan.name: Marlene

texts.es: Marlene, de 43 aos, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a sus 2 queridos hijos Yony de 18 y Lesly de 15 aos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Recorriendo las calles del distrito de Ancon, Marlene realiza su trabajo, ella se dedica a la venta de cosmticos y es una vendedora muy convincente, motivo por el cual sus productos se venden muy rpido y tiene que renovarlos constantemente. Siente que su trabajo es muy rentable, ya que gracias a l, puede brindarles a sus hijos los estudios que se merecen. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es aconsejar a sus clientes sobre los productos que mejor actuaran sobre su piel, lleva 10 aos realizando esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil es tener que caminar todo el da en busca de clientes. Con el tiempo, desea poner una tienda, donde pueda vender con ms comodidad sus productos de belleza. Este es el segundo crdito con MFP y est muy feliz de poder obtenerlo, manifiesta que invertir todo el dinero en su negocio, ya que quiere mejorar su vida. En su banco comunal es una socia muy alegre. Con los mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprar ms productos de belleza, para as poder ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad de donde elegir.
texts.en: Marlene is 43 years old; she is a humble and hardworking woman. She lives in her own home with her 2 loving children, Yony who is 18 years old and Lesly who is 15, Sonia would like to give them a better quality of life. Marlene works traveling through the streets of Ancon as she sells makeup and is a very good saleswoman which is why her products are sold quickly and has to keep restocking her products constantly. Marlene feels that her work is very profitable since thanks to it she is able to give her children the education they deserve. What she enjoys most about her work is giving advice to her customers about the products that will help their skin. Marlene has worked for 10 years in this field and says that the most difficult aspect of her job is walking around all day looking for customers. In the future she would like to set up a store where she can sell her products with more convenience. This is her second loan with MFP and is very happy to be able to get it and says that she will use all of it for her business since she wants to improve her life. She is a very happy-go-lucky member of her communal bank. With the fifteen hundred nuevos soles, she will buy more beauty products to be able to give her customers a greater variety of products for them to choose from.

loan.use: buy more beauty products.

loan.name: San Gregorio De Yucay Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal SAN GREGORIO D. YUCAY; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito D. Yucay, perteneciente a la provincia D. Urubamba y departamento D. Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Martha; ella es conviviente y tiene 27 aos y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio D. venta D. pinturas y artesana, ella pinta cuadros tpicos D. la ciudad D. la ciudad del Cusco y tambin venD. artesana como chompas,collares,chalinas y aretes, ella venD. en las distintas ferias que se dan en los distritos D. Pisaq y Ollantaytambo, la socia trabaja desD. las 7:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m,por medio D. estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio D. venta D. pinturas y artesana. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar materiales para pintar pinceles, temperas y lpices.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio D. restaurant, venta D. verduras, negocio D. venta D. chocolates, negocio D. venta D. artesania.
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the San Gregorio D. Yucay Communal Bank located in the district of Yucay, province of Urubamba, department of Cusco.

The member is Mrs. Martha; she is 27 years old and lives with her partner and 2 children. She sells her paintings of typical scenes from the city of Cusco and handicrafts like sweaters, necklaces, shawls and earrings. She sells her items in different markets that are in the districts of Pisaq y Ollantaytambo and works from 7:00 a.m.to 4:00 p.m. Through her businesses she is able to give her children a better future. Mrs. Martha would like to expand and improve her painting and craft business. She needs the loan to buy painting materials like brushes, paints and pencils.

The other members of the communal bank have a restaurant, a vegetable stall, a chocolate stall, and a handicraft business.

The member is grateful to those who are a part of making her dream a reality and is committed to meet her payment quotas on the time.

loan.use: buy painting materials like brushes, paints and pencils.

loan.name: Tessito Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarit est cr le 04 mai 2010. Il est compos de 23 femmes qui sont toutes du mme village. La plus part d'entre elles mnent le petit commerce.
Madame Sira debout droite de la photo et levant la main est responsable du groupe. Elle est ge de 61 ans. Elle est marie et mre de 04 enfants.
Elle est dtentrice d'une boutique o elle vend divers produits tels du riz, du mil, du mas, du savon etc.
Son nouveau crdit lui permettra de financer son activit de vente de produits divers.
Son objectif est de participer la prise en charge de la famille par exemple la nourriture et la sant tout en renforant son niveau d'pargne.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created May 4, 2010. It comprises 23 women, all from the same village. Most of them are active in retail.
Mrs. Sira, who stands to the right of the picture with her hand raised, is the group's leader. She is 61 years old. She is married and the mother of four children.
She owns a shop where she sells various products such as rice, millet, corn, soap, etc.
Her new loan will allow her to finance her retail activity.
Her objective is to participate in supporting the famiL., for instance relating to food and healthcare, while also increasing her savings.

loan.use: to purchase millet, corn, rice, soap, etc.

loan.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: La Sra. Mara tiene 43 aos de edad vive en Barrio Los Pinos con el Sr Ricardo (conyugue) tiene 5 hijos los cuales 3 de sus hijos son mayores de edad y 2 que todava estn a su cargo, la Sra. es propietaria de un taller mecnico ambos trabajan ah desde hace 10 aos. El crdito que solicito la Sra. Es para capital de trabajo (compra de repuesto, empaquetadura de culata, rodamiento, y otros) quedo muy agradecida con la institucin por la oportunidad que se le brindo al otorgarle su primer crdito "manifest".
texts.en: Mrs. Mara is 43 years old; she lives in the Los Pinos neighborhood with Mr. Ricardo, her partner. They have 5 children 3 who are adults and 2 are still under her care. Mrs. Mara owns a car repair workshop and she has worked with her husband in it for some 10 years. The loan is for work capital, to buy spare parts, head gaskets, ball bearings and other items. Mrs. Mara is very grateful to the institution for the opportunity given to her through this first loan, she said.

loan.use: buy spare parts, head gaskets, ball bearings and other items.

loan.name: Luz

texts.es: Luz, de 36 aos es una mujer muy humilde y alegre, vive en su casa propia junto a sus 2 queridos hijos Edwin de 10 y Andrea de 4 aos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. En el terminal de buses de la empresa de transportes Titanes en el cono norte de la ciudad de Lima, se encuentra el kiosco de golosinas de Luz, su negocio es muy concurrido ya que los chferes siempre aprovechan para comer algo entre cada viaje y al estar bien ubicado es el kiosco donde la mayora de pasajeros compra algo para el camino. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es atender a sus clientes y conversar con ellos. Anhela con el tiempo poner un negocio de comida. Este es el cuarto crdito con MFP y al igual como hizo en sus primeros crdito desea pagar sus cuotas a tiempo, ya que sabe que sino meter en problemas a su banco comunal en donde es muy respetada por lo responsable que es. Con los mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprar ms golosinas para implementar mejor su kiosco y as ofrecerle una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes.
texts.en: Luz is 36 years old; she is a very humble and happy-go-lucky woman. She lives in her own home with her 2 loving children, Edwin who is 10 years old and Andrea who is 4, Luz would like to give them a better quality of life. She has a candy stall at the bus station near the transportation company Titanes in the northern area of the city of Lima. Luzs business is very well-known since the chauffeurs always take time to eat something between their trips and her kiosk is well located and most of the passengers buy something for their trip. What Luz enjoys most about her work is taking care of her customers and getting to know them, she dreams of being able to have her own restaurant. This is her fourth loan with MFP and as she has done with her previous loans she will pay her quotas on time since she knows that she will get in trouble with her communal bank where Luz is a very respected member because of her responsible nature. With the fifteen hundred nuevos soles, she will buy more candy to stock her kiosk and give her customers a greater variety of products.

loan.use: buy candy to stock her kiosk.

loan.name: Mara

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SAN JOSE DE URUBAMBA; La socia vive en el distrito de Urubamba en la provincia de Urubamba, departamento del Cusco.
La socia Mara tiene 42 aos de edad y La socia es soltera y tiene 1 hijo de 20 aos de edad; la socia se dedica al comercio minorista, la socia compra y vende animales menores; ella cra aves de corral, cuyes y chanchos; la socia desea invertir el crdito en la compra de chanchos, cuyes, patos y gallinitas; la socia cra los animales y luego de que alcanzan la madurez los vende, la socia desea invertir el crdito en la compra de animales menores para la venta.
La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crdito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the San Jose de Urubamba Communal Bank, located in the district of Urubamba, province of Urubamba, department of Cusco.

Mrs. Mara is 42 years old, single and has a 20 year old son. She is in retail and buys and sells small animals like fowl, cuyes (a hamster-like animal), and pigs. The member would like to use the loan to buy pigs, cuyes, ducks and chickens to sell at a later date. Mrs. Mara breeds the animals and when they mature she sells them.

The member is exceedingly thankful for the loan given to her since this will allow her business to grow and it will improve her quality of life, she is committed to meet with her payment quotas at the time stipulated.

loan.use: buy small animals to sell at a later date.

loan.name: Antonieta Yanet

texts.es:
Yanet naci en la ciudad de Lima del departamento del Lima, ella tiene 40 aos, tiene su pareja y fruto de esta unin tiene dos hijos.
Yanet es un ama de casa y alterna sus actividades del hogar con diferentes actividades como por ejemplo; ella ayuda a su esposo Alex en el negocio de la tapicera, ella vende comida y reparte en los centros comerciales de venta de artesana, ella tambin vende CD y DVD. Desde el ao 2009 ella vende comida y le va muy bien gracias al empeo que pone en su negocio.
Ha solicitado Yanet a la Asociacin Arariwa un crdito de 100 nuevos soles para adquirir mercadera como por ejemplo CD y DVD. Con los ingresos de la venta de sus productos cubrira las cuotas del crdito brindado.
Yanet es una persona muy conocida por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y una buena madre al querer brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia. Yanet tiene como sueo tener su propia tienda.
texts.en:
Yanet, age 40, was born in the city of Lima in the Department of Lima. She and her partner have two children.

Yanet is a homemaker and divides her time among the household chores and different activities such as helping her husband Alex with his upholstery business, selling food and distributing it at shopping centers, selling crafts, and selling CDs and DVDs. Since 2009, she has been selling food and has done very well as a result of the effort she puts into her business.

Yanet is requesting a loan from Asociacin Arariwa in the amount of 100 PEN so that she can acquire merchandise, such as CDs and DVDs. With the earnings from the sale of these products, she will be able to cover her loan payments.

Yanet is a person who is well-known for being a hardworking and responsible woman, as well as a good mother who wants to provide a better future for her children and a better quality of life for her family. She has dreams of having her own store.

loan.use: to purchase music and video discs.

loan.name: Ricardo

texts.es: Ricardo, de 36 aos, es un hombre muy amable y sencillo, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Arminda de 27 aos y sus 2 queridas hijas Briyit de 7 y Yunz de 4 aos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo al que Ricardo se dedica es la panadera, su labor comienza muy temprano, aproximadamente a las 4 y 30 de la maana, listo para amasar la masa y hacer los panes que disfrutan los moradores del centro de la ciudad de Lima. l es un panadero muy hbil y es que desde muy pequeo aprendi este oficio de su padre. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es hacer pan y lo hace con mucho esmero, lleva 6 aos en este trabajo y considera que lo ms difcil es tener que levantarse todos los das temprano, ya que para l no existen fines de semana, ni feriados. En adelante, anhela poner una tienda donde pueda vender el mismo el pan que hornea. Este es el tercer crdito con MFP y no quiere dejar de pagar por falta de dinero, as que esta dispuesto a ahorrar da a da para poder pagarlo, l es muy responsable y respetuoso. Con los mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprar nuevas latas y estantes para los panes, adems de llevar a arreglar su horno.
texts.en:
Ricardo, age 36, is a friendly and modest man. He lives in his own home with his wife Arminda, age 27, and their two beloved daughters, Briyit and Yunz (ages 7 and 4 respectively), for whom he wants to provide a better quality of life. Ricardo has a bakery and begins his work very early at approximately 4:30am. His duties include kneading the dough and preparing the bread that is enjoyed by the residents of central Lima. Ricardo is a talented baker and learned his trade as a young man from his father. What he enjoys most about his work is making the bread and preparing it with great care. He has been in this business for six years and considers the most difficult part to be waking up early every day since he also works on weekends and holidays. In the future, he hopes to open a store where he can sell his baked goods.

This is his third loan with MFP. Ricardo does not want to miss any of his payments, so he is willing save each day so that he can meet his obligations. He is very responsible and respectful. The loan of 1500 PEN that he requested will be used to buy new baking pans and shelves for displaying the bread. He also needs to repair his oven.

loan.use: to purchase baking pans and shelving for displaying bread and to pay for repairs to his oven.

loan.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
Maria Luisa naci en la ciudad de Lima del departamento del Lima, ella tiene 25 aos, tiene su pareja y fruto de esta unin tiene dos hijos.
Maria Luisa es un ama de casa y alterna sus actividades del hogar con la venta de artesana, ella tiene un puesto de venta propio en el centro comercial Inka. Desde el ao 2005 se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeo que pone en su trabajo. Ella nos cuenta que el puesto de venta era de su mama y ahora ella es quien se encarga del puesto y es donde vende sus productos.
Ha solicitado Maria Luisa a la Asociacin Arariwa un crdito de 1,000 nuevos soles para adquirir mercadera como por ejemplo chalinas, chompas, polos, etc. Con los ingresos de la venta de sus productos cubrira las cuotas del crdito brindado.
Maria Luisa es una persona muy conocida por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y una buena madre al querer brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia. Maria Luisa tiene como sueo comprarse una casa.
texts.en:
Maria Luisa was born in the city of Lima in the Department of Lima. She is 25 years old and has two children with her partner.

Maria Luisia is a homemaker and divides her time between her household activities and selling handicrafts. She has a vending post at the Inka shopping center. Maria Luisa has been in business since 2005 and has done very well as a result of her efforts. She says that her vending post belonged to her mother but now she has taken over and sells her products there.

Maria Luisa is requesting a loan from Asociacion Arariwa in the amount of 1000 PEN so that she can acquire merchandise such as scarves, sweaters, polo shirts, and other items. The earnings from the sale of her products will be used to repay her loan.

Maria Luisa is a person who is well-known for being a hardworking and responsible woman, as well as a good mother who wants to provide a better future for her children and an improved quality of life for her family. She also dreams of buying a house.

loan.use: to buy scarves, sweaters, polo shirts, and other items.

loan.name: Victor Desiderio

texts.es:
Victor de 65 aos, es un hombre trabajador que se levanta todos los das a laborar en su taxi recorriendo las calles de Guayaquil. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su taxi ya que le ayuda a solventar los gastos de su familia.
Trabaja todo el da desde muy temprano recorriendo las calles de Guayaquil ya que est asociado a una cooperativa que le ayuda a tener clientes por telfono. Quiere continuar trabajando por eso quiere el prstamo para arreglar su carro y otra parte para construir mejor su casa. En el futuro quiere mejorar sus ingresos comprando otro taxi.
texts.en:
Victor is 65 years old. This hardworking gentleman wakes up early every day for his job driving his taxi through the streets of Guayaquil. As a taxi driver, he has many aspirations to resolve his familys expenses.

Victor works all day driving through the streets of Guayaquil, starting in the early morning hours. He is part of a cooperative that accepts customer requests for taxis over the telephone. Victor wants to continue working, so he will use the loan to repair his automobile. Part of the loan will be used to build his house. In the future, he wants to improve his earnings so that he can buy another taxi.

loan.use: to pay for vehicle repairs and to purchase materials for building his house.

loan.name: Leonor Gioconda

texts.es:
Leonor naci en la provincia de Cusco del departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 35 aos, es casada y fruto de esta unin tiene tres hijos.
Leonor es un ama de casa y alterna sus actividades del hogar con la elaboracin de artesana, ella nos cuenta que la familia de su esposo tiene como actividad a la artesana entonces ella tambin ingreso al negocio. Ahora, ella tiene un pequeo puesto de venta en el centro arqueolgico de Sacsayhuaman. Desde el ao 1998 se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeo que pone en su trabajo.
Ha solicitado Leonor a la Asociacin Arariwa un crdito de 1,000 nuevos soles para adquirir materiales como por ejemplo lana y tejidos. Con los ingresos de la venta de sus productos cubrira las cuotas del crdito brindado.
Leonor es una persona muy conocida por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y una buena madre al querer brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia. Leonor tiene como sueo comprarse una casa.
texts.en:
Leonor was born in the Province and Department of Cusco. She is 35 years old, married, and has three children.

Leonor is a homemaker and divides her time between her household activities and making crafts. She says that her husbands family has a craft business and she began working there. Now she has a small vending post at the Sacsayhuaman archaeological site. Leonor has had this business since 1998 and has done very well as a result of her efforts.

Leonor is requesting a loan from Asociacin Arariwa in the amount of 1000 PEN to buy materials such as wool and woven fabrics. The income she generates from the sale of her products will be used to repay her loan.

Leonor is a person who is well-known for being a hardworking and responsible woman, as well as a good mother who wants to provide a better future for her children and an improved quality of life for her family. She also dreams of buying a house.

loan.use: to purchase wool and woven fabrics.

loan.name: Elida Gertrudys

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal 21 De Noviembre se rene cada quince das en el Cantn Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesana que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar conocimos a la seora Elida, tiene 35 aos de edad, est casada y de esta relacin tienen dos hijos de 15 y 11 aos, ambos estudian en colegio y escuela. Su esposo es guardia de seguridad. Est en el Banco Comunal desde el segundo ciclo y le gusta porque los crditos le sirven a ella para seguir adelante, en el banco ocupa el cargo de fiscal de reglamento.
Ella tiene una tienda de comestibles en su casa, vende todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad, como arroz, azcar, aceites, detergentes, etc. Tambin vende productos de Yanbal (artculos de belleza, cosmticos perfumera y accesorios para damas) en su tienda o sale a vender puerta a puerta, trabaja todos los das y sus hijos le ayudan cuando estn desocupados, los productos los recibe en su local. Tiene ocho aos que tiene su tienda y poco a poco la ha ido aumentando.
Este crdito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad.
Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada da ms.
texts.en:
The November 21st Communal Bank meets every 15 days in the canton of Montecristi. This area is known for its rich pre-colonial culture. The local handicrafts have received recognition on a national and international level. This place is also known for its famous Panama hats.

It is here that one can meet Sra. Elida. She is 35 years old, married, and has two children (ages 15 and 11). Both of them attend high school and elementary school respectively. Her husband works as a security guard. Elida is participating in her second loan cycle with the Communal Bank. She likes the fact that the loans have helped her get ahead. Elida is the group treasurer and in charge of overseeing the finances.

She has a store in her home where she sells all types of basic necessities such as rice, sugar, oil, detergents, and other items. Elida also sells merchandise produced by Yanbal (a company that makes beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and womens accessories) in her store and door-to-door. She works every day and her children help her whenever they are not busy. Her products are shipped to her store. Elida has managed her store for eight years and it has grown gradually over time.

This loan will be used to restock her store. She will buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, cured meats, and other basic necessities. Her goals are to move her business forward and to see her store grow each day.

loan.use: to purchase rice, sugar, oil, detergents, cured meats, and other basic necessities.

loan.name: Las Cultivadoras Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama las "Las Cultivadoras", y se ubica en Mxico. El grupo esta conformado por 9 integrantes y es la septima vez que piden un prestamo. La seora Guadalupe es la tesorera del grupo. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa que inicio hace 6 aos. Solicita el prestamo para comprar pantalones y playeras que vende en su comunidad las cuales ya tiene comprometidas. Ella tiene 63 aos, estudio hasta el tercer ao de primaria, es soltera y no tiene ningun dependiente economico. Al momento de solicitar este prestamo se siente entusiasmada por obtener la oportunidad de solicitar un prestamo y seguir adelante para hacer crecer su negocio y ser conocida por toda la comunidad.
Quiere este prestamo para compra de mercancia y con esto tener mas clientes y obtener una mejor calidad de vida y apoyar a su familia en los gastos economicos, tambien espera lograr sus sueos y ser una mujer exitosa.
texts.en:
This group is called Las Cultivadoras (The Cultivators) and is located in the State of Puebla in Mexico. There are nine members and they are requesting a loan for the seventh time. Sra. Guadalupe is the group treasurer. She started selling clothes six years ago. Guadalupe is requesting a loan to buy trousers and t-shirts to sell in her community since she has already received orders. She is 63 years old and has a third grade education. Guadalupe is single and has no financial dependents. Upon submitting her loan request, she was excited about having the opportunity to obtain a loan and move forward with growing her business. She is known throughout the entire community.
By using this loan to buy merchandise, Guadalupe will be able to attract more customers, achieve a better quality of life, and support her family financially with the expenses. She also wants to fulfill her dreams and become a successful woman.

loan.use: to purchase trousers and t-shirts.

loan.name: Ruth

texts.es:
Ruth naci en la ciudad de Cusco departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 35 aos y est casada y fruto de esta unin tiene cuatro hijos.
Ruth es profesional y en sus horas libres se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, ella y su esposo Efran tiene un negocio de venta de Computadoras.
Ha solicitado Ruth a la Asociacin Arariwa un crdito de 1000 nuevos soles para hacer una maestra y para pagar la mercadera de los cosmticos. Con los ingresos de la venta de sus productos cubrira las cuotas del crdito brindado.
Ruth es una persona muy conocida por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y una buena madre al querer brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia. Ruth tiene como sueo tener su propia casa y terminar una maestra.
texts.en:
Ruth was born in the city of Cusco in the Department of Cusco. She is 35 years old, married, and has four children.

Ruth is a professional and sells beauty products in her free time. She and her husband Efran have a business selling computers.

Ruth is requesting a loan from Asociacin Araiwa in the amount of 1000 PEN so that she can pursue a Masters degree and pay for a shipment of cosmetics. The income she earns from selling her products enables her to cover her loan payments.

Ruth is well-known for being a hardworking and responsible woman, as well as a good mother who wants to provide a better future for her children and an improved quality of life for her family. Her dreams are to have a house of her own and to finish her Masters degree.

loan.use: to purchase cosmetics and pay for an advanced degree.

loan.name: Mercedes Susy

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SAN JOSE DE URUBAMBA; La socia vive en el distrito de Urubamba en la provincia de Urubamba, departamento del Cusco.
La socia Mercedes tiene 25 aos de edad y La socia es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos de 9, 3, 8 meses de edad; la socia se dedica principalmente al cuidado de sus hijos y cuando ellos duermen o tiene un tiempo libre la socia trabaja elaborando artesana, la socia es una mujer muy trabajadora y se dedica a elaborar arte en tela, la socia realiza bellos telares de colores intensos con paisajes tpicos del ande, la socia desea el crdito para poder comprar una mquina de tejer y as se le facilite el trabajo que actualmente lo viene haciendo a mano, la socia comprara lanas y telar para la elaboracin de sus telares. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de mquina de tejer, lanas.
La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crdito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a member of the Communal Bank San Jose de Urubamba. She lives in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

Mercedes is 25 years old, in a common law marriage, and has three children (ages 9, 3, and 8 months). She spends most of her time taking care of her children. While they are asleep or when she has free time, she focuses on making handicrafts. This hardworking woman makes beautiful fabrics with the vivid colors of traditional Andean landscapes. Mercedes wants to use her loan to buy a loom so that she can easily perform the work she currently does by hand. She will also buy wool for making her woven fabrics. Therefore, she needs the funds to invest for this purpose.

Mercedes values and appreciates endlessly the loan that has been provided to her since it will allow her to grow her business and improve her quality of life. She also promises to complete her payments according to the stated terms.

loan.use: to purchase a loom and wool for weaving.

loan.name: Nidia Liz

texts.es:
Nidia Liz naci en la ciudad de Cusco departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 36 aos.
Nidia Liz se dedica a la venta de artesana y tiene varios locales donde vende sus productos, ella mayormente vende chompas, tejidos y platera. Sus productos son requeridos por turistas nacionales e internacionales.
Ha solicitado Nidia Liz a la Asociacin Arariwa un crdito de 2,000 nuevos soles para adquirir mercadera como por ejemplo chompas, chalinas, otras cosas ms. Con los ingresos de la venta de sus productos cubrira las cuotas del crdito brindado.
Nidia Liz es una persona muy conocida por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y una buena madre al querer brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Nidia Liz, age 36, was born in the city of Cusco, Department of Cusco.

She sells handicrafts and has several locations where she offers her products. Nidia Luz sells mostly sweaters, woven cloth, and silverware. Her products sell well among domestic and international tourists.

She is requesting a loan from Asociacin Arariwa in the amount of 2000 PEN so that she can acquire merchandise such as sweaters, scarves, and other items. With the income she generates from the sale of her products, she is able to cover her loan payments.

Nidia Liz is a person who is well-known for being a hardworking and responsible woman, as well as a good mother who wants to provide a better future for her children. She also wants to improve the quality of life for her family.

loan.use: to purchase sweaters, scarves, and other handcrafted products.

loan.name: Emilia Elizabeth

texts.es:
Emilia naci en la provincia de Anta del departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 38 aos, es casada y fruto de esta unin tiene tres hijos.
Emilia es un ama de casa y alterna sus actividades del hogar con la elaboracin de pinturas, ella nos cuenta que junto con sus hermanos Juan, Julio y Trinidad trabajan de forma organizada, Sus hermanos elaboran las pinturas y Emilia vende a diferentes centros comerciales de venta de artesana y en otras ocasiones vende en su domicilio. Ya son varios aos que se dedican a este negocio y les va muy bien gracias al empeo que ponen en su trabajo.
Ha solicitado Emilia a la Asociacin Arariwa un crdito de 1,500 nuevos soles para adquirir materiales como por ejemplo marcos de madera, bastidores, tela, oleos, purpurina y pintura. Con los ingresos de la venta de sus productos cubrira las cuotas del crdito brindado.
Emilia es una persona muy conocida por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y una buena madre al querer brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia. Emilia tiene como sueo comprarse una casa.
texts.en:
Emilia was born in the province of Anta in the department of Cusco. She is 38 years old, married and has three children. She is a homemaker who alternates her daily activity with making paints. She works with her brothers Juan, Julio and Trinidad in a very organized fashion. Her brothers make the paint and Emilia sells it at shopping centers that offer handicrafts. Sometimes she sells from home. They have been in this business for several years and it has been successful because of the hard work they put into it.
Emilia has requested a loan of 1,500 PEN through the Arariwa Association to buy materials such as wooden frames, stretchers, fabric, oil paints, glitter and paint. With the income from sales she will be able to pay back the loan.
She is known as a very hard-working, responsible woman and a good mother who wants to give her children a good future while improving the family's lifestyle. Her dream is to buy a house.

loan.use: To buy supplies such as wooden frames, stretchers, fabric, oil paints, glitter and paint.

loan.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio naci en el distrito de Santiago de la ciudad del Cusco, l tiene 32 aos, es casado y fruto de esta unin tiene un nico hijo.
Julio es un padre de familia que vive con sus hijos en su casa propia que cuenta con todos los servicios bsicos (agua, luz y desage) en el departamento del Cusco. Esta zona se caracteriza por su actividad comercial y el turismo.
Julio es chef profesional y su suegro Mosises le motivo para que pueda abrir un negocio entonces Julio abri un pequeo restaurante que lo llam particularmente La Paella. Ya son 10 aos que se dedican a este negocio y les va muy bien gracias al empeo que ponen en su trabajo.
Ha solicitado Julio a Asociacin Arariwa un crdito de 1,500 nuevos soles para adquirir insumos como por ejemplo arroz, azcar, fideos y otras cosas. Con los ingresos de la venta de sus productos cubrira las cuotas del crdito brindado.
Julio es una persona muy conocida por ser un hombre trabajador, responsable y un buen padre al querer brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia. Julio tiene como sueo abrir una cadena de restaurantes en el centro de la ciudad del Cusco.
texts.en:
Julio was born in the district of Santiago in the city of Cusco. He is 32 years old, married and has a son. Julio lives with his family in his own house which has all the basic utilities (running water, electricity and a sewage system) and is located in the department of Cusco. This area is characterized by its commercial and tourist activity.
Julio is a professional chef and his father-in-law, Moises, encouraged him to set up a business. Julio then opened a small restaurant called "La Paella" and has been in business for ten years. It is successful thanks to his hard work.
He has requested a loan of 1,500 PEN through the Arariwa Association to buy goods such as rice, sugar, pasta and other items. With the income from sales of his products he will be able to pay back the loan.
Julio is well known for being a responsible, hard worker and a good father who wants to give his children the best possible future while improving his family's lifestyle. Julio's dream is to open a chain of restaurants in downtown Cusco.

loan.use: To buy goods such as rice, sugar, pasta and other items.

loan.name: Elmer

texts.es: Vctor, de 27 aos es un hombre muy trabajador y amable, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Adelina de 27 aos y lo que ms desea es trabajar muy duro para mejorar su calidad de vida. Todos los das Vctor se levanta muy temprano para cumplir con su labor, l es uno de los pocos panaderos del Asentamiento Humano Pachacutec de la ciudad de Lima, es por eso que su negocio es muy concurrido. El pan que prepara es muy sabroso y nutritivo, ya que pone mucho empeo en elaborarlos. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es hornear los panes, lleva 3 aos realizando esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil es tener que levantarse en la madrugada para preparar la masa, pero es parte del sacrificio que demanda su trabajo. Para el futuro, espera hacer crecer su negocio y as mejorar sus ingresos econmicos. Este es el quinto crdito con MFP y se siente muy feliz por haberlo obtenido, ya que sabe que le ser de mucha ayuda para hacer progresar su negocio. Con los mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprar ms ingredientes para elaborar una mayor cantidad de panes.
texts.en:
Victor, 27 years old, is a hard-working and friendly man. He lives in his own home together with his wife Adelina, also 27, and what he wants more than anything is to work hard to improve his quality of life. Every day Victor gets up very early to work. He is one of only a few bakers in the settlement of Pachacutec outside of the city of Lima. For this reason his business is very popular. His bread is very tasty and nutritious since he puts a lot of effort into making it.
What he likes most about his job is baking the bread. He has been doing this for 3 years and thinks that the hardest part is getting up very early to make the dough, but this is part of the sacrifice that his job demands. In the future, he hopes to grow his business and thereby improve his income.
This is his fifth loan with MFP and he is happy to have gotten it, since he knows that it will help in the progression of his business. With the 1,500 nuevos soles that he asked for, he will buy more ingredients to make more bread.

loan.use: to buy more ingredients for making bread.

loan.name: Hermenegilda

texts.es:
Hermenegilda naci en la ciudad de Mollepata distrito de Anta a 10 minutos de la ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene 49 aos, es casada y fruto de esta unin tiene tres hijos.
Hermenegilda es una madre de familia que vive con sus hijos en su casa propia que cuenta con todos los servicios bsicos (agua, luz y desage) en el departamento del Cusco. Esta zona se caracteriza por su actividad comercial y el turismo.
Hermenegilda es ama de casa y alterna sus actividades de su casa con la atencin de su tienda de abarrotes, ella acomodo una habitacin que d hacia la calle para implementar la tienda. Ya son 8 aos que se dedican a este negocio y les va muy bien gracias al empeo que ponen en su trabajo.
Ha solicitado Hermenegilda a la Asociacin Arariwa un crdito de 2,000 nuevos soles para adquirir comestibles como por ejemplo arroz, azcar, fideos y otras cosas. Con los ingresos de la venta de sus productos cubrira las cuotas del crdito brindado.
Hermenegilda es una persona muy conocida por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y una buena madre al querer brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia. Hermenegilda tiene como sueo abrir una tienda de ventas en el centro de la ciudad del Cusco.
texts.en:
Hermenegilda was born in the city of Mollepata, district of Anta, 10 minutes away from the city of Cusco. She is 49 years old, married and has three children with her husband.
Hermenegilda is a mother who lives with her children in her own home, which has all the basic services (water, electricity and sewage), in the department of Cusco. The area area is renowned for its business activity and tourism.
Hermenegilda is a housewife. As well as her housework she runs a grocery store. To install the store she made alterations to a street-facing room. They have been in this line of business for 8 years already, and it's doing very well thanks to their hard work.
Hermenegilda has requested to Arariwa Association a loan of 2,000 soles to buy food such as rice, sugar, noodles and other things. With the proceeds from the sale of the products she will cover the repayment of the loan.
Hermenegilda is well-known for being a hard-working, responsible woman and a good mother who wants to give her children a better future by improving her family's quality of life. Hermenegilda's dream is to open a retail store in the center of the city of Cusco.

loan.use: to buy food such as rice, sugar, noodles and other things.

loan.name: Marciana

texts.es:
La Sra. Marciana, pertenece al Banco Comunal Virgen D. las Mercedes, Distrito D. Juanjui, Departamento D. San Martn. Es viuda, tiene 73 aos y tiene 6 hijos todos ya cuentan con familia propia.
DesD. muy joven tena inclinacin por los negocios es as que se inicia, hace 30 aos, con un pequeo capital D. S/. 400.00, en el negocio D. venta D. abarrotes y productos D. primera necesidad.
Con este prstamo D. S/. 1000.00, comprar productos como: cocoa, aceite, leche en cajas, insumos para el aseo personal y limpieza del hogar, gaseosas en paquetes y otros productos para mantener contenta a su clientela.
Marciana es una mujer luchadora, est muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por ayudar a mujeres como ella a tener oportunidades D. poder hacer realidad sus metas.
texts.en:
Mrs. Marciana belongs to the Virgen D. las Mercedes Community Bank, which is in the district of Juanjui in the deparment of San Martn. She is a widow, is 73 years old, and has six children with families of their own.
From a young age, she had an inclination for business. When she was 30 years old, she started a business with a small loan of S/. 400, and she sold groceries and other necessary products.
With this loan of S/. 1000, she will buy products including cocoa, oil, boxed milk, supplies for personal use and house-cleaning, sodas, and other products to keep her clients happy.
Marciana is a hard-working and persistent woman. She is very thankful for the Manuela Ramos Movement for helping women like her to have opportunities to achieve their goals.

loan.use: to buy products including cocoa, oil, boxed milk, supplies for personal use and house-cleaning, sodas, and other products

loan.name: Rita

texts.es:
Rita naci en la ciudad de Cusco, ella tiene 35 aos, es casada y fruto de esta unin tiene cuatro hijos.
Rita es una madre de familia que vive con sus hijos en su casa propia que cuenta con todos los servicios bsicos (agua, luz y desage) en la ciudad del Cusco del departamento del Cusco. Esta zona se caracteriza por su actividad comercial y el turismo.
Rita es ama de casa y alterna sus actividades de su casa con la elaboracin de artesana, ella junto con su esposo tienen un taller de pintura en su domicilio. Ya son 12 aos que se dedican a este negocio y les va muy bien gracias al empeo que ponen en su trabajo.
Ha solicitado Rita a Asociacin Arariwa un crdito de 1,500 nuevos soles para adquirir materiales como por ejemplo marcos cubiertos con pan de oro, bastidores, oleos y marcos de solo madera. Con los ingresos de la venta de sus productos cubrira las cuotas del crdito brindado.
Rita es una persona muy conocida por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y una buena madre al querer brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia. Rita tiene como sueo abrir una tienda de ventas en el centro de la ciudad del Cusco.
texts.en:
Rita was born in the city of Cusco. She is 35 years old, married and has four children with her husband.
Rita is a mother who lives with her children in her own home, which has all the basic services (water, electricity and sewage), in the city of Cusco, Department of Cuzco. The area is renowned for its business activity and tourism.
Rita is a housewife. As well as her housework she makes crafts. With her husband she has a paint workshop at home. They have been in this line of business for 12 years and it is doing very well thanks to their hard work.
Rita has requested a loan of 1,500 soles to Arariwa Association. The loan is to buy materials such as frames covered with gold leaf, canvases, oil paint and plain wooden frames. With the proceeds from the sale of the products she will cover the fees of the loan.
Rita is well known for being a hard working and responsible woman and a good mother who wants to give her children a better future by improving her family's quality of life. Rita's dream is to open a retail store in the center of the city of Cusco.

loan.use: to buy materials such as frames covered with gold leaf, canvases, oil paint and plain wooden frames.

loan.name: Yony

texts.es:
Yony naci en la ciudad de Quillabamba (Apuricma, Per), ella tiene 45 aos y tiene su pareja y fruto de esta unin tiene cuatro hijos.
Yony es una madre de familia que vive con sus hijos en su casa propia que cuenta con todos los servicios bsicos (agua, luz y desage) en la ciudad del Cusco del departamento del Cusco. Esta zona se caracteriza por su actividad comercial y el turismo.
Yony es ama de casa y alterna sus actividades de su casa con su profesin y como profesora trabaja en el magisterio, ella tambin se dedica a la elaboracin de artesana de tipo manualidades como por ejemplo hace muecas y es proveedora de diferentes centros comercial de venta de artesana.
Ha solicitado Yony a Asociacin Arariwa un crdito de 1000 nuevos soles para adquirir materiales como por ejemplo telas y otras cosas ms. Con los ingresos de la venta de sus productos cubrira las cuotas del crdito brindado.
Yony es una persona muy conocida por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y una buena madre al querer brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Yony was born in the city of Quillabamba (Apuricma, Peru). She is 45 years old, has a partner, and has four children from her relationship.
Yony is a mother who lives with her children in her own home which has all basic services (water, electricity and sewerage), in the city of Cusco, in Cusco department. This area is noted for its commercial activity and tourism.
Yony divides her time between her daily household activities and her job as a teacher. She also makes handicrafts such as dolls. She is a supplier for different shopping malls that sell handicrafts.
Yony has requested a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Asociacin Arariwa which she will use to acquire materials such as fabrics and other products. She will make her loan repayments with the profits she makes from the sale of her products.
Yony is a person who is very well known for being a hard-working, responsible woman and a good mother who wants to provide her children with a better future and improve her family's quality of life.

loan.use: to acquire materials such as fabric, etc.

loan.name: Claridad Group

texts.es:
La A.C. CLARIDAD iniciar su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Santiago II, est compuesta por once integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Carola. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de DVD, auxiliar de secretara, tienda, costura, venta de dulces, venta de comida, tienda, comercio, tejido, librera, costura.
La seora Carola, indica que este es el segundo ao que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitacin de su mam. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta costura de deportivos, que inicio hace 2 aos atrs y que aprendi de su hermana.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar su capital (compra de tela), que compraran por mayor de la ceja y los vendern da por medio por las maanas y por las tardes con la ayuda de su hermana. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitacin
texts.en:
The "Claridad", or "Clarity" Communal Bank is about to begin it's first loan cycle with [field partner] Pro Mujer. It is part of the Centro Santiago II Group, composed of 11 mmbers and headed by a board of directors lead by Seora Carola. The group members are building a variety of bussinesses, and among them we have: DVD sales, secretarial support, a shop, selling sweets, selling food, dressmaking, weaving, sales, and a bookstore.
Seora Carola says that this is her second year of working with Pro Mujer, having come in at the invitation of her mother, At present she has a business making and selling sportswear, which she started 2 years back and which she learned from her sister.
The loan she is seeking is to increase her working capital by buying cloth, which she buys wholesale in La Ceja and sells at retail each morning and afternoon, with the help of her sister. This type of work enables her to generate income to support her family as much as possible, as she is married adn has 4 children.
When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she states that she likes the training they give.

loan.use: to buy fabric

loan.name: Jorge Rene

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal 21 De Noviembre se rene cada quince das en el Cantn Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesana que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
Don Jorge es socio fundador del Banco comunal y le gusta todo del banco, los crditos y las charlas. Tiene 28 aos de edad, est casado pero aun no ha tenido hijos. Su esposa est estudiando y es ama de casa.
El se dedica al comercio, vende artculos para el hogar como licuadoras, planchas, ventiladores, etc. Tambin vende vveres. El se desplaza a otras ciudades en un carro que de vez en cuando le prestan y a veces recorre la ciudad a pie, deja a crdito y cobra cada semana, pero solo deja a personas confiables. Nos cuenta que lleva ocho aos en este tipo de negocios y que sus productos los compra en una distribuidora en Manta donde le dan a buen precio.
Este crdito es para comprar artculos para el hogar como planchas, licuadoras, ventiladores, vveres, etc.
Su sueo es seguir adelante en su trabajo para tener algo que ofrecer a su familia.
texts.en:
The Banco Comunal 21 De Noviembre (November 21 Communal Bank) meets every fortnight in the Montecristi Canton, a place renowned for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its arts and crafts, celebrated both at national and international level. It is also the homeland of the famous Toquilla straw hats.
Jorge is a founding member of the communal bank, and he likes everything about it, the loans and the chitchat. He is 28 years old, he is married but he still has no children. His wife is a student and a housewife.
He engages in trade, selling home products such as blenders, irons, fans and so on. He also sells provisions. Sometimes he borrows a car and travels to other towns, some other times he does his city on foot. He sells on credit and collects cash during the week-ends, but he only sells to reliable people. He told us he has been engaged in this activity for 8 years, and that he buys his products in the town of Manta from a supplier who sells at a fair price.
The loan he is requesting will be used to buy home products such as irons, blenders, fans and provisions among other products.
He dreams of keeping on running his activity in order to have something to offer to his family.

loan.use: To buy blenders, irons, fans and provisions.

loan.name: Jorge Ernesto

texts.es:
Jorge es soltero de 23 aos de edad, vive en casa de sus padres, la cual es propia y cuenta con todos los servicio ( agua, luz y desage) en el distrito de Olmos, ubicado a una hora del departamento de Lamabayeque. Los pobladores de ste distrito se dedican a la agricultura, ganadera y tiene festividades religiosas que forma parte de las costumbres de los pobladores.
Jorge labora como chofer de su mototaxi (transporte que se utiliza para movilizarse en distancias cortas, con un cupo mximo de 3 personas) desde hace 2 aos aproximadamente, est actividad lo realiza en su mismo distrito, apesar de la competencia, el trata en lo posible desde muy temprano movilizar una buena cantidad de pasajeros a sus diferentes destinos, y as tener mayor cantidad de ingresos para solventar sus gastos y necesidades.
El crdito que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 500 nuevos soles y su destino ser para el mantenimiento y cambio de algunos repuestos que necesita su mototaxi para poder seguir trabajando y mejorar su calidad de vida. Jorge es un hombre muy responsable y conocido en Olmos por ser trabajador y con muchas ganas de salir adelante.
texts.en:
Jorge, 23, is single living in his parents house which they own and has all basic utilities (water, electricity and sewage) in Olmos located an hour from Lambayeque Department. Residents of this district are in farming and livestock raising and have religious festivities that are part of the customs of the residents.
Jorge has worked as a mototaxi driver (transportation used for short distances; can carry a maximum of 3 passengers) for two years approximately. He carries out this activity in his own district. Despite competition he does his best, starting very early ,to take a good number of passengers to their various destinations so that he can earn higher income to meet his needs and expenses.
The loan hes asked Edpyme Alternativa for is in the amount of 500 new soles that he will use to service and replace some parts that the mototaxi needs to continue operating and to improve his quality of life. Jorge is a very responsible man and known in Olmos for being hard working with a strong desire to get ahead.

loan.use: to service and replace some parts on his mototaxi.

loan.name: Liz Erika

texts.es:
La Sra. Liz Erika pertenece al Banco Comunal Virgen de las Mercedes, Distrito de Juanjui, Provincia de Mariscal Cceres. Es conviviente, tiene 28 aos y tiene tres hijos varones que estudian en el nivel inicial y primario.
La idea del negocio que actualmente desarrolla nace en coordinacin con su pareja quien tiene un taller de mecnica de motos que requiere el acondicionamiento de un lavadero para la atencin, es as que deciden compartir el negocio, l se encargara de la reparacin y ella de lavar las motos y carros.
Con este prstamo de S/. 2,200.00, comprar franelas, mangueras, detergente aromatizantes para camionetas, carros, autos, motocicletas lineales y motocarros.
Liz Erika, es una mujer creativa y emprendedora, actualmente atienden en un local pequeo, su sueo es tener su local ms grande en donde pueda ofrecer un servicio de mayor calidad a su clientela. Est muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por ayudar a mujeres como ella a tener oportunidades de poder mejorar sus ingresos y dar una mejor calidad de vida a sus familias.
texts.en:
Liz Erika is a member of the Virgen de las Mercedes community bank in Juanjui district, in Mariscal Cceres province. She is 28 years old, and has three sons who are in elementary school.
The idea for the business that Liz is currently engaged came from her husband's business. Her husband has a motorcycle garage that needed a space fitting out for washing vehicles so that he could provide this service to his customers. Therefore, the couple decided to share the business: her husband would be in charge of fixing the motorcycles and cars and she would wash them.
Liz will use this loan for 2,200 Peruvian soles to buy cloths, hoses and perfumed deodorants for trucks, cars, motorcycles and three-wheeler vans.
Liz is a creative and entrepreneurial woman. She currently works in a small location and her dream is to expand it so that she can provide a better-quality service to her customers. She is very grateful to Movimiento Manuela Ramos for helping women such as herself by providing opportunities to increase their incomes and provide their families with a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy cloths, hoses, detergents, etc.

loan.name: Virginia Nores

texts.es:
Virginia de 23 aosde edad,es soltera, viven en casa de sus padres, la cula cuenta con slo servicio de luz,ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Illimo,se encuentra a 45 minutos del departamento de Lambayeque. La actividad que realizan sus pobladores es agricultura, ganadera y artesana.
Desde hace varios aos Virgina se dedica a la venta de comida y gaseosas, que ella misma prepara, su negocio lo a instalado en la casa de sus padres, esto le permite tener ingresos diarios para poder ayudar a su hermana a solventar los gastos de la casa.
A solicitado un prstamo Virginia a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para la compra de insumos para seguir preparando comida que vende y tambin para comprar gaseosas para el consumo de sus clientes. Al tener los insumos necesarios podr brindar otros platos y as puede incrementar su clientela como sus ingresos y tener mejoras en su desarrollo personal para pagar su crdito y para que su negocio le vaya bien. Virginia es una mujer con muchas ganas de salir adelante en su negocio, con el objetivo que en un futuro pueda tener su propio restaurante.
texts.en:
Virginia, 23, is single living in her parents house, which only has electricity, and is located in the rural part of Illimo District which is 45 minutes from Lambayeque Department. Its residents are farmers, raise livestock and are artisans.
For several years, Virginia has been selling meals and soft drinks that she herself prepares. Her business is installed in her parents house which allows her to earn daily income to help her sister meet household expenses.
Virginia has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan to buy ingredients to continue preparing the food she sells and also to buy soft drinks for her customers daily consumption. Having the necessary ingredients will make it possible for her to offer other dishes to increase her clientele and her income and thus have improvements in her personal development to repay her loan and so that the business will do well.
Virginia very much wants to get ahead with her business; her future goal is to have a restaurant of her own.

loan.use: to buy ingredients for her meals and soft drinks for her business.

loan.name: Hulda Azucena

texts.es:
La Sra. Hulda, pertenece al Banco Comunal El Abiseo del Distrito de Juanjui, Departamento de San Martn. Es soltera, tiene 01 hijo y cursa la primaria.
Motivada por sus padres se inicia en el negocio de venta de zapatos y ropa de cama. Al sufrir un accidente de trnsito, decide cambiar de actividad por la venta de cosmticos inicindose con un capital de S / 400.00 nuevos soles. Este negocio le da la oportunidad de generar sus propios ingresos y como mujer sentirse realizada.
Con este prstamo de S/. 2000.00 comprar productos de belleza para su stock como, perfumes para damas y caballeros, cremas, polvos compactos, talcos, tanto para adultos como para bebes, lpices labiales y esmaltes de uas, para as satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.
Hulda se siente muy contenta y quiere continuar trabajando para la realizacin de sus ideas y est muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por la confianza depositada en ella.
texts.en:
Seora Hulda belongs to the communal bank "El Abiseo" [the name of a river] in the district of Juanju, department of San Martn. She is single and the mother of one son, who attends elementary school.
Her parents encouraged her to open a store selling shoes and bed linen. After having suffered a road accident she decided to change her activity to the sale of cosmetics with a start capital of 400 nuevos soles. This business gives her the opportunity to earn her own money and to be fulfilled in her life as a woman.
She will use this loan of 2000 nuevos soles to buy beauty products for her inventory, such as perfumes for ladies and gentlemen, creams, face powder, talcum powder for adults and babies, lipsticks and nail polish in order to satisfy the needs of her customers.
Hulda is very happy and wants to continue working to realize her ideas. She thanks the microfinance institution Movimiento Manuela Ramos for its trust in her.

loan.use: to buy beauty products, such as perfumes, creams, face powder, talcum powder, lipsticks and nail polish.

loan.name: Andres

texts.es:
Andres de 28 aos de edad, es soltero, tiene casa propia que cuenta con los servicio slo de agua en el casero Yencala Leon, zona rural del departamento de Lambayeque. Los pobladores de esta zona se dedican a la agricultura, ganadera y turismo (festividades religiosas que forma parte de las costumbres de los pobladores).
Andres labora manejando su mototaxi (transporte que se utiliza para movilizarse en distancias cortas, con un cupo mximo de 3 personas) desde hace 2 aos aproximadamente, est actividad lo realiza en su mismo distrito, pero tambin tiene unas tierras de cultivo donde siembra alfalfa y vende, altenre su mototaxi puede ir a ver sus tierras ms seguido y tambin le sive para llevar su alfalfa a los diferentes mercados para venderlo, ya que lo utilizan como alimento para el ganado ovino,vacuno, cuyes, etc. Ambas actividades le permite tener ms ingresos para cubrir sus gastos personales.
El crdito que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 1000 nuevos soles y su destino ser para el mantenimiento de su mototaxi y de sus cultivos de alfalfa, esto ayudar a que ambas actividades estn en buen estado y pueda brindar un mejor servicioy tener un mejor producto (alfalfa), todo es con la finalidad de tener un mejor nivel de vida. Andres es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable que lo nico que quiere es salir adelante y tener un poco ms de comodidades para vivir.
texts.en:
Andrs, 28, is single. He has a house of his own that only has water located in the hamlet of Yencala Len, a rural part of Lambayeque Department. Residents of this area are farmers, raise livestock and are in tourism (religious festivals that are part of the residents customs).
Andrs has worked driving his mototaxi (mode of transportation used for short distances; can carry a maximum of 3 passengers) for the last two years approximately. He carries out this activity in his own district but he also has farmland where he grows alfalfa to sell. Having a mototaxi makes it possible for him to go inspect his fields more frequently and to also be able to transport his alfalfa to the various markets to sell since its used as feed for cattle, sheep, guinea pigs, etc. Both activities make it possible for him to earn more income to cover his personal expenses.
He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan to service his mototaxi and to provide care for his alfalfa crops. This will help to have both activities in good condition so that he can offer improved service and have a better product (alfalfa). All of this is aimed at having a better standard of living.
Andrs is a very hard working, responsible person who only wants to get ahead and have a bit more comfort in life.

loan.use: to service his mototaxi and to provide maintenance to his farmland.

loan.name: Delicia

texts.es:
La Sra. Delicia pertenece al Banco Comunal El Abiseo del Distrito de Juanjui, Departamento de San Martn. Es soltera, tiene 47 aos y tiene 03 hijos que an estudian.
Ante la necesidad de generar sus propios ingresos inicia su negocio con la venta de zapatos, que muchas veces los venda al crdito el mismo que no era pagado a tiempo por lo que perdi gran parte de su capital y contando tan solo con un capital de S/. 300.00 decide cambiar de negocio y en la actualidad se dedica a la elaboracin de chupetes (helados de hielo), refrescos y gaseosas.
Con este prstamo de S/. 1500.00 nuevos soles comprar frutas de la regin y esencias naturales para la elaboracin de chupetes, refrescos y con el dinero restante comprar agua mineral con gas y sin gas, gaseosas de los diferentes sabores y tamaos para continuar dando una mejor atencin a sus clientes.
La Sra. Delicia es una mujer fuerte y tiene como sueo contar con su negocio de refrigerios, est muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por ayudar a mujeres como ella que desean superarse.
texts.en:
Delicia is a member of "El Abiseo" Communal Bank, located in the Juanjui district and in the San Martn department. She is single, she is 47 years old and she has 3 children who still go to school.
