Needing to have her own income, she started a retailing activity by selling shoes. She mostly sold on credit, but since this was seldom repaid on time she lost a good share of her capital. Therefore, counting only on a working capital of 300.00 PEN she decided changing activity, and right now she engages in selling chupetes (iced lollipops) she herself prepares as well as soft drinks and fizzy drinks.
This loan of 1500.00 PEN will be used to buy regional fruit and natural flavors to prepare chupetes and soft drinks, and with the remaining capital she will buy sparkling and still mineral water, as well as fizzy drinks of different flavors and sizes to continue attending her customers with the best care.
Delicia is a strong woman who dreams of counting on her cool drinks activity. She is deeply thankful to the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for helping women like her who wish to excel in life.

loan.use: To buy regional fruits and natural flavors, mineral water and fizzy drinks.

loan.name: Mara Josefina

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal 21 De Noviembre se rene cada quince das en el Cantn Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesana, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
La seora Mara es socia fundadora del Banco comunal, es la fiscal de pagos y le gusta por las facilidades para conseguir los crditos y por los beneficios que da la institucin. Tiene 42 aos de edad, est separada y de esa relacin tiene 3 hijos dos de los cuales ya son mayores de edad e independientes y uno de 10 aos que estudian en escuela.
Ella se desempea como profesora en una escuela de la localidad, pero tambin se dedica al comercio, vende zapatos y productos Avon y Oriflame (productos de belleza, cosmticos, perfumera y accesorios para damas). Trabaja todos los das en las maanas en su escuela y por las noches visita a sus clientes para ofrecer sus productos, nos cuenta que tambin vende en su escuela a sus compaeras y a madres de familia que son sus clientes, deja sus productos a crdito y cobra cada semana. Sus productos los recibe en su casa y los zapatos los va a comprar a Quito. Tiene cuatro aos que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
Este crdito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosmticos y zapatos.
Su sueo es tener un gran local.
texts.en:
The Banco Comunal 21 De Noviembre (November 21 Communal Bank) meets every fortnight in the Montecristi Canton, a place renowned for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its arts and crafts, celebrated both at national and international level. It is also the homeland of the famous Toquilla straw hats.
Meet Mara, a founding member of the communal bank who is also its Payment Supervisor. She likes being a member of her communal bank because it is easy to obtain loans and for the benefits provided by the institution. She is 42 years old and she is separated from her husband, with whom she has had 3 children: two are adults and economically independents, one is 10 years old and goes to school.
She is a professor in a school of her community, but at the same time she engages in trade selling shoes, Avon and Oriflame products (both Avon and Oriflame produce and sell beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and accessories for women). She works in the school every morning and at night she visits her customers to offer them her products. She told us that she also sells in her school, as she has customers among her colleagues and the students' mothers. She sells her products on credit and collects the cash every week-end. She goes to Quito to buy the shoes, while the beauty products are delivered to her at home. She has been engaging in this activity for four years and it is going very well for her.
The loan she is requesting will be used to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics and shoes.
She dreams of running a big shop.

loan.use: To buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics and shoes.

loan.name: Alicia

texts.es: Alicia tiene 47 aos, vive con su esposo y su hijo en su casa propia. Hace ms de 25 aos se dedica a la venta de comida en un restaurante campestre que ha construido en su misma casa. Su gran habilidad y vocacin en la cocina ha logrado atraer a su ms exigente clientela que cada da acude a su establecimiento para su consumo. Ella prepara diferentes platos tpicos de su regin y eso le ha favorecido mucho en el trabajo, asimismo cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo y sus hijos, quienes se encargan de atender a su clientela. Los das que ms trabajo tiene son pocas festivas y eso le genera ms ganancias. El tiempo de experiencia le ha permitido ver la rentabilidad de su negocio para sostenerse econmicamente. Su deseo para el futuro es mejorar la infraestructura de su establecimiento. Es su crdito nmero 10 que tiene con MFP, considera que en todo este tiempo de trabajo dentro de un banco comunal le ha servido para aprender ms sobre el uso del dinero para invertirlo en el crecimiento de su negocio, es muy responsable con sus pagos y agradece a todas las personas que sern gestoras del prstamo que solicita ya que le ser muy til en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crdito que solicita, lo invertir en materiales de construccin para mejorar la infraestructura de su local.
texts.en:
Alicia is 47 years old and lives with her husband and son in her own home. For 25 years, she has been selling meals in a countryside restaurant which she built in her own home. Alicia's great skill and vocation for cooking have meant that she has managed to attract very demanding customers who come to her establishment to eat every day. She prepares different traditional, regional dishes and this has favored her a lot in her work. She has the support of her husband and son who take charge of serving the customers.
Alicia's busiest days come during holiday periods and make her more profits. Alicia's years of experience have enabled her to make her business profitable so that she can support herself financially. Her wish for the future is to improve her establishment's infrastructure.
This is Alicia's tenth loan from MFP and she considers that working with a community bank over all this time has served her well as she has learned more about using money to invest in the growth of her business. She is very responsible in making her repayments and is grateful to everybody who will contribute to the loan that she is requesting since it will be very useful to her in making progress in her business. She will invest the loan she has requested in construction supplies so that she can improve the infrastructure of her premises.

loan.use: to buy construction supplies to improve the infrastructure of her business

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to paint and remodel her home

loan.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es:
Mara es una madre de familia de 33 aos, vive con sus hijos y su madre,tiene casa propia que cuenta con servicio slo de luz, ubicada en el casero La Payesa que pertenece al distrito de Tcume a una hora del departamento de Lambayeque. Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadera, artesana y turismo.
Mara se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino (ovejas) desde hace 3 aos, su corral donde se encuentran sus ovejas estn en la parte posterior de su casa. A sus animales los cra con alimentos balanceados como con pastos naturales y una vez que tengan el peso y el tamao ptimo los ofrece en el mercado de las distintas ciudades. Con el dinero que va adquirir por la venta de sus ovejas, podr atender las necesidades diarias de su hogar y familia.
A solicitado un prstamo Mara a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles mediante Capital Semilla para comprar ms animales y alimentos balanceados para sus animales asegurando un buen crecimiento y engorde de los mismos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Mara es conocida en la zona por ser una persona trabajadora, que con mucho empeo desea quesu negociocada vez crezca para poderles dar otras oportunidades a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mara, 33, is a mother living with her children and her mother. She has a house of her own that only has electricity located in Payesa which is part of Tcume District and is located an hour from Lambayeque Department. This zone is dedicated to farming, cattle raising, crafts and tourism.
Mara has been raising sheep for the last three years. The corral where her sheep are is in her back yard. She raises her animals with balanced feed like natural grasses and once they reach optimum size and weight she sells them in markets in various cities. With money she gets from the sale of her sheep she will be able to meet her daily household and family expenses.
She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan through the Seed Capital program to buy more animals and balanced feed for them thus assuring good growth and weight gain for them and a better quality of life for her family.
Mara is well known in the area for being a hard working person who with much dedication hopes to see her business grow in order to be able to provide her children with other opportunities.

loan.use: to buy animals and their respective feed.

loan.name: Juan

texts.es: El seor Juan es una persona muy responsable desde hace varios aos se pensiono por la edad y para tener un ingreso extra trabajo como empleado en el municipio limpiando las calles de la ciudad labor que realiza con mucho gusto. En este momento se ve en la necesidad de hacer algunos cambios en lo que es su vivienda para protegerla de las inclemencias del tiempo. La casa donde el vive es humilde pero comenta que no necesita algo mas ya que el vive solo desde que su esposa falleci y ese es el lugar donde el se siente cmodo. Para realizar su proyecto necesita comprar material y pagar la mano de obra.
texts.en:
Juan is a very responsible person who retired due to his age several years ago. In order to make additional income, he works as a municipal employee, cleaning the streets. He does this work happily.
Right now, Juan needs to do some work on his home in order to protect it from the inclemency of the weather. His home is humble but he tells us that it is all he needs because he lives alone, following the death of his wife, and this is where he feels comfortable. In order to carry out his project, he needs to buy materials and pay labor costs.

loan.use: to finish some building work

loan.name: Araceli

texts.es:
La Sra. Araceli pertenece al Banco Comunal El Abiseo del Distrito de Juanjui, Departamento de San Martn. Es Soltera, tiene 02 hijosque estudian en el nivel inicial y secundaria respectivamente.
La idea del negocio nace hace 9 aos con la ayuda de una amiga quien la motiva a iniciarse en la venta de cosmticos, buscando con ello generar sus propios ingresos y as apoyar en la economa de su hogar. Su prstamo inicial fue de S / 100.00 nuevos soles.
Con este prstamo de S/. 2,000.00, comprar cosmticos tales como lpiz labial, talcos de cuerpo, perfumes, colonias, shampoo, cremas faciales, de esta manera podr contar conproductos variados que le permitirn atender a sus clientes que son bsicamente amigos, familiares y trabajadores de diversas instituciones pblicas y privadas.
Araceli es una mujer trabajadora, se siente muy contenta por la realizacin de sus ideas y est muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por ayudar a mujeres como ella a tener oportunidades de desarrollarse.
texts.en:
Araceli is a member of 'El Abiseo' community bank which is located in Juanjui district, in San Martn department. She is single and has two children: one is in elementary school and the other is in high school.
Araceli had the idea of starting her business nine years ago. A friend motivated her to start selling cosmetics so that she could make her own income and thereby support her household financially. Her initial loan was for 100 Peruvian soles.
With this loan for 2,000 soles, Araceli will buy cosmetics such as lipsticks, talcum powder, perfume, cologne, shampoo and face creams. This will enable her to have a variety of products in stock which will allow her to serve her customers who are basically friends, family members and people who work in different public and private institutions.
Araceli is a hard-working woman who feels very happy to be realizing her goals and she is very grateful to Movimiento Manuela Ramos for helping women such as herself to benefit from opportunities to develop.

loan.use: to buy cosmetics: lipsticks, talcum powder, perfume, cologne, etc.

loan.name: Fridda Alicia

texts.es: Fridda madre soltera tiene una hija ya mayor de edad, desde hace un tiempo tiene el proyecto de finalizar la construccin completa de su vivienda, por la zona donde habita requiere de seguridad. Necesita las paredes de divisin de su terreno con los otros cercanos. Mujer emprendedora tiene su propio negocio venta de productos de casa comerciales y variedades inicio con fondos propios y en cantidades pequeas. El prstamo comprara materiales de construccin cemento, arena, camisa, estribu, pierdas canteras, piedrn, bloques, reglones entre otros para construir la pared lateral de la vivienda obteniendo proteccin, seguridad y tranquilidad. Agradece a la financiera por su ayuda al desarrollo.
texts.en:
Fridda is a single mother with a grown-up daughter. For some time she has had a project of completely finishing off building work to her home because the area where she lives is one that requires security. She needs walls to divide her plot of land from others nearby. Fridda is an entrepreneurial woman who owns her own business selling household products and other assorted goods. She started out with her own funds and small quantities.
Fridda will use her loan to buy construction supplies: cement, sand, sheathing, supports, quarry stone, gravel, blocks, etc. so that she can build a side wall for her house, thereby obtaining protection, security and peace of mind. She is grateful to the financial institution for their help.

loan.use: to buy materials to build a wall

loan.name: Carmen Anabel

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal 21 De Noviembre se rene cada quince das en el Cantn Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesana, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar conocimos a la seora Carmen, tiene 36 aos de edad y mantiene una relacin de unin libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 18, 15 y 5 aos, los dos menores estudian en colegio y en jardn de infantes. Su marido es carpintero.
Ella junto a su esposo tienen un taller de tapicera y costura en el cual se dedica a tapizar muebles y carros, nos cuenta que mientras su marido se encarga de tapizar ella se encarga de elaborar cortinas para autobuses, cojines y almohadas pequeas. Trabajan todos los das y sus trabajos son reconocidos en toda la provincia ya que tambin realizan trabajos en otros cantones hasta donde se trasladan para realizar sus obras. Llevan en este negocio 17 aos y siempre se han tenido buena clientela a pesar de la competencia.
Este crdito es para comprar materia prima para elaborar sus productos como telas, tapices, hilos, cierres, esponjas, etc. Est en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio y le gusta por el beneficio que recibe del banco.
Sus metas son incrementar ms su negocio y seguir progresando cada dia ms.
texts.en:
Every two weeks, the '21 de Noviembre' community bank meet in Montecristi canton which is known for its rich pre-colonial architecture and also for its handicrafts which are well-known both at home and abroad. It is the home of the famous Panama hat.
Here we meet 36 year-old Carmen who lives with her common-law husband and has three children aged 18, 15 and 5. Her two youngest are attending high school and kindergarten. Her husband is a carpenter.
Carmen and her husband have an upholstery and sewing workshop where they upholster furniture and vehicles. She tells us that while her husband takes charge of the upholstering, she makes curtains, cushions and small pillows for buses. They work every day and their work is well known throughout their province since they also do work in other cantons. In these cases, they travel in order to carry out their work. They have been in business for 17 years and have always had a good customer base, in spite of the competition.
Carmen will use this loan to buy raw materials for making her products such as fabric, coverings, threads, fasteners, sponge, etc. She has been a member of her community bank since the beginning and she likes it for the benefits that she receives. Carmen's goals are to further increase her business and to continue making progress every day.

loan.use: to buy fabric, coverings, threads, fasteners, sponge, etc.

loan.name: Lider De Defensores Group

texts.es: Carmen es madre soltera tiene 03 hijos, siendo sola tiene que trabajar para mantener su hogar para poder ayudar a sus hijos, por mucho tiempo se dedico a la venta D. ropa pero no le fue bien debido a que muchos D. sus clientes no le pagaban a tiempo, es as que cambio D. rubro y empez con una pequea bodega en su misma casa ah venD. D. todo un poco entre productos D. pan llevar como verduras, carnes etc. en la actualidad el negocio marcha bien esto le alcanza para poder brindar a sus hijos una mejor vivienda y buena educacin, por otro lado Carmen tambin hace trabajos eventuales como dedicarse al cuidado D. personas enfermas, este oficio lo que le genera una ganancia extra, su prstamo le ser D. mucha ayuda comprara productos D. abarrote para poder abastecer a sus clientes, ella es la tesorera del grupo LIDER D. DEFENSORES el que esta conformado por mujeres emprendedoras.
texts.en:
Carmen is a single mother of three children. Because shes alone she must work to support her home and help her children. She sold clothes for a long time but did not do too well because many of her customers did not pay her on time so she changed her line of work and started a small grocery store at home. She sells a little bit of everything there like bread, vegetables, meats, etc. The business is doing well at present and she earns enough to proviD. her children with a better dwelling and a good education.
On the other hand, Carmen also does occasional work caring for sick people. This occupation generates extra income. The loan will be of great help to her. She will buy groceries to supply her customers.
She is the Treasurer of the Lider D. Defensores (Leader of the Defenders) group which is maD. up of enterprising women.

loan.use: to buy groceries.

loan.name: Anabel Rub

texts.es:
La Sra. Anabel Rub pertenece al Banco Comunal El Abiseo del Distrito de Juanjui, Departamento de San Martn. Es soltera y tiene 33 aos.
Hace ya algn tiempo se dedicaba a la venta de cosmticos a crdito, al ver que sus clientes no le pagaban puntualmente y ante la necesidad de generar sus propios ingresos, decide solitar a Manuela Ramos un prstamo inicial de S/. 500.00, con este dinero decidi dedicarse a la elaboracin de chupetes de frutas regionales, actividad que realiza a la fecha en su propia casa que por cierto son muy agradables y del deleite de sus consumidores.
Con este nuevo prstamo de S/. 1500.00 nuevos soles comprar frutas de la regin en sacos y esencias naturales para la elaboracin de chupetes (helados de hielo) y as continuar dando una mejor atencin a sus clientes.
La Sra. Anabel es una mujer fuerte y tiene como sueo instalar una heladera y vender refrigerios, esto le dara mayores ganancias. Est muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por ayudar a mujeres como ella a tener oportunidades de desarrollarse en el medio donde se desenvuelven.
texts.en:
Anabel Rub is a member of the 'El Abiseo' community bank which is located in Juanjui district, in San Martn department. She is 33 years old and single.
Some time ago, Anabel used to sell cosmetics on credit. However, as she noticed that her customers were not paying on time and, faced with the need to make her own income, she decided to request an initial loan for 500 Peruvian soles from Manuela Ramos. She decided to use this money to start a business making popsicles from regional fruit. This is the business in which she is currently engaged. She makes the popsicles in her home. They are very nice, of course, and they delight her customers.
Anabel will use this new loan for 1,500 soles to buy sacks of regional fruit and also natural flavorings for making her popsicles so that she can continue providing good customer service.
Anabel is a strong woman and her dream is to set up an ice-cream parlor and sell light refreshments. This would make her more profits. She is very grateful to Movimiento Manuela Ramos for helping women such as herself by providing them with opportunities to make progress in their business activities.

loan.use: to buy sacks of regional fruit and natural flavorings for making popsicles

loan.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El seor Jos Luis M. es un hombre muy responsable y buen padre de familia que desea ofrecer a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida. La vivienda la adquiri de inters social y este tipo de casas son muy pequeas por lo que el decidi construir en la parte trasera una recamara mas para vivir cmodamente, pues esta familia es formada por 5 integrantes esposa e hijos. Jos Luis con ahorros propios levanto lo que es la recamara principal pero aun le sigue faltando algunos detalles como loes enjarrar y pintar para que se vea mejor y este protegida. Con el prstamo otorgado comprara lo que es el material y pagar la mano de obra.
texts.en:
Jos Luis M. is a very responsible man and a good father who would like to offer his children a better quality of life. He acquired his home through a government subsidy program and these types of houses are very small. For this reason, he decided to build an additional bedroom out the back of his home so that he could live more comfortably, as his family has five members including his wife and children.
Jos Luis used his own savings to build the bedroom but he still needs to do some work such as plastering and painting so that it looks better and is protected. He will use the loan he has been granted to buy materials and pay labor costs.

loan.use: to plaster

loan.name: Delia

texts.es: Delia tiene 49 aos, es separada y vive en compaa de sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Tras aos de labor intensa, continua vendiendo artculos y herramientas en su ferretera, establecimiento que tiene desde hace 15 aos. En sus inicios, empez de manera ambulante pero con el paso de los aos ha crecido su negocio y ahora tiene un lugar formal. Era lo que siempre quiso y ahora se ha convertido en una serie de satisfacciones en la vida de sus hijos. Las ganancias que obtiene la deriva para el sosteniendo de su casa, considera que su negocio es muy rentable porque los materiales de construccin que vende tiene mucha demanda en su zona, an a pesar de la competencia, ya que en estos ltimos aos se han abierto mas puntos de venta alrededor de su negocio, pero las afronta con una buena atencin y ofertando alguno de sus productos. Su prioridad es tener mayor capital de trabajo para ofrecer a su clientela variedad de artculos de ferretera. Es su crdito nmero 8 con MFP, tiene muchas experiencias de trabajo dentro de su banco comunal que le ha permitido mejorar. Con el crdito que solicita, lo invertir en la compra de ms mercadera para su negocio.
texts.en:
Delia is 49 years old, separated, and lives with her two children in her own home. After years of hard work, she continues selling goods and tools in her hardware store which she has owned for 15 years.
Initially, Delia made her sales as an itinerant street vendor but, over the years, she has grown her business and now she has formal business premises. This is what she always wanted and it has fulfilled a series of needs in her children's lives. She uses the profits that she makes in her business to support her household. Delia considers her business to be very profitable because the construction supplies that she sells are very much in demand in her area, in spite of the competition. In recent years, more sales outlets have opened around her business but she faces up to them by providing good customer service and putting some of her products on special offer. Her priority is having more working capital so that she can offer her customers a good variety of hardware items.
This is Delia's eighth loan from MFP. She has a lot of experience working as a member of her community bank which has enabled her to improve. She will invest the loan that she has requested in buying more merchandise for her business.

loan.use: to stock her business

loan.name: San Juanita Idalia

texts.es: La Sra. Juanita es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable actualmente lleva ya tres aos dedicndose al comercio, ella compra y vende ropa, bicicletas y accesorios para el hogar, adems los fines de semana vende tamales y chicharrones de puerco, en esta ocasin requiere el apoyo para realizar la compra de mercanca para su negocio ya que este representa una manera de obtener ingresos y poder ayudar a su esposo con la manutencin de su hogar, agradece el apoyo brindado para realizar su proyecto.
texts.en: Juanita is a hard-working and very responsible lady who has been buying and selling clothes, bicycles and household goods for three years. On weekends, she also sells tamales and fried pork rinds. On this occasion, she needs support in buying merchandise for her business since it represents a way of making income and enables her to help her husband support their household. She is grateful for the support that is being given to carry out her project.

loan.use: to buy clothes and various other goods

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to repair the floor in his house.

loan.name: Mara Germania

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal 21 De Noviembre se rene cada quince das en el Cantn Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesana, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar conocimos a la seora Mara, tiene 21 aos de edad y mantiene una relacin de unin libre de la cual tiene un hijo de dos aos. El marido es electricista. Actualmente ella se encuentra estudiando en la Universidad Laica Eloy Alfaro De la ciudad de Manta, estudia para licenciada en Ciencias De la Educacin.
Trabaja de maestra por contrato o reemplazo en una institucin de la localidad, pero adems de eso se dedica al comercio, vende carteras y zapatillas de damas. Trabaja todos los das, en las maanas en la escuela cuando tiene sus contratos y por las tardes o noches recorrer la ciudad para ofrecer sus productos, tambin les vende a sus compaeras de clase las mismas que son sus clientes ms confiables comenta, vende a crdito y cobra cada semana. Sus productos los recibe en su casa, le envan desde Otavalo. Tiene dos aos que se dedica a esta actividad y le ha ido bastante bien.
Este crdito es para comprar carteras, zapatillas y zapatos. Este es el segundo ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la forma de pago que es muy conveniente.
Sus sueos son terminar sus estudios e incrementar su negocio.
texts.en:
The 21 De Noviembre community bank meets every two weeks in the Montecristi canton. It is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its artisanal crafts, known nationally and internationally. It is famous for its hats made from paja toquilla.
Here we meet Mara. She is 21 years old and in a common law marriage. She has a two year old son. Her husband is an electrician. At this time, she is studying at the Universidad Laica Eloy Alfaro in the city of Manta. She is getting her degree in Education Science.
She works as a contract or substitute teacher in a local institution. She is also a merchant. She sells purses and women's slippers. She works every day. Mornings she works in the school when she has a contract, and afternoons or nights she offers her products throughout the city. She also sells to her classmates, who she says are her most trustworthy customers. She sells on credit and collects every week. She recieves the products at her house, sent from Otavalo. She has been doing this activity got two years and it has gone very well for her.
This loan is to buy purses, slippers and shoes. This is her second cycle in the community bank and she likes it because the payments are convenient.
Her dream is to finish her studies and grow her business.

loan.use: to buy purses, slippers and shoes.

loan.name: Gloria Libett

texts.es: Doa Gloria, de 44 aos de edad, es originaria del Departamento de Len, esta casada, es madre de 3 hijos, ella se dedica a la costura. Ella inicio sus actividades de costura cuando ella tenia 20 aos de edad, ella trabajaba en un taller de costura, en donde elaboraba uniformes para algunas empresas privadas hacia uniformes para colegios, como camisas, shorts, pantalones ,faldas esto lo hacia medio tiempo, en su casa se dedicaba a hacer vestidos, trajes de vestir para nios , de hecho eso sigue haciendo hoy en da , antes los hacia y venda ambulante. Hoy ella comercializa sus trajes en el mercado central de Len, algunos pedidos que le hacen clientes conocidos, adems cuenta con el apoyo que su esposo le da para aportar en el hogar y fue as que preparo a sus hijos para que tuvieran una carrera universitaria. Ella solicito el prstamo para compra materia prima como telas, hilo, agujas, zper, botones. Esta inversin ser de mucha ayuda ya que as podr mejorar La calidad de sus diseos, vender y dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes a la hora de elaborar uniformes y trajes de vestir. Ella quiere instalar un taller, comprar maquinas de coser, maquinas industriales para elaborar bordados y logotipos. De hecho su prxima meta es comprar una maquina de coser industrial para hacer diseos con bordados, ya que le gustara presentar sus resultado en ferias municipales.
texts.en:
Doa Gloria, aged 44, lives in the department of Len. She is married and the mother of three children. She is a seamstress. She began her sewing activity when she was 20. She worked in a sewing workshop where she produced uniforms for private companies that dealt with school uniforms like shirts, shorts, pants and skirts. That was a part-time job. In addition, she worked at home where she produced dresses and children's clothes. In fact, she is still active in the latter business, except that nowadays she sells her products at the central market in Len, while earlier she used to sell them from door to door. She also takes orders from known customers. In addition, she can count on the support of her husband with household expenses and preparing their children for a university career.
Gloria applies for a loan to buy sewing materials, such as fabric, thread, needles, zippers and buttons. This investment will be very useful since it enables her to improve the quality of her dresses and offer a better service to her customers when she designs her uniforms, dresses and suits. She wants to install a workshop and equip it with sewing machines to make embroideries and logos. In fact, her next goal is to buy an industrial sewing machine for embroidery designs and sell her products at local fairs.

loan.use: to buy sewing material such as fabric, thread, needles, zippers and buttons.

loan.name: Douglas Antonio

texts.es: Douglas casado su esposa comerciante, sus hijos estudian, tiene de profesin carpintero y con el apoyo de su familia hoy en da tiene su propio taller de carpintera, inici como aprendiz ahora tiene una gran trayectoria en el ramos de elaboracin de hermosos muebles y otros aparadores de maderas. Con el prstamo comprara maderas, sustituir las herramientas gastadas por nuevas, ligas, barni, pega de madera, junco entre tejidos y otros diversos materiales. Agrandando la cantidad de productos, obteniendo ganancias. Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo al desarrollo de su micro empresa.
texts.en: Douglas is married. His wife is a merchant and his children are in school. He is a carpenter by trade and with the help of his family today he has his own carpentry shop. He started out as an apprentice but today he has great expertise in making beautiful furniture and other wooden sideboards. With his loan he will purchase wood and he will change his worn out tools for new ones. He will also purchase bands, varnish, wood glue, reed material, and a variety of other materials. This will help him increase the number of products he makes and the income he earns. He is thankful to the financial organization for the support in the development of his small business.

loan.use: to purchase wood for his business.

loan.name: Celia Sanjuanita

texts.es: La Sra. Celia es una persona muy respetuosa y trabajadora , acudi con nosotros porque comenta que quiere hacer una puerta a su domicilio, ya que por la puerta de la entrada principal con la que cuenta actualmente se le mete mucho el agua cuando llueve, llegando a ocasionar la perdida de los muebles que con tanto esfuerzo a ido comprando poco a poco, agradece el apoyo brindado para realizar su sueo realidad.
texts.en: Celia is a very respectful and hardworking person. She came to us because she needs to make a new door for her house. The door to the main entrance that is there now seeps a lot of water when it rains. It leads to the loss of furniture that she gradually purchased with such great effort. She is thankful for the support in making her dream a reality.

loan.use: to install a door in her home.

loan.name: Cayo

texts.es: Cayo, de 28 aos de edad, convive con su pareja Ruth y fruto de esa relacin tienen 01 hijo llamado Jos de 02 aos y juntos residen en su propia casa donde reina la comprensin. Cayo an cuando era adolescente trabajaba en las tierras de sus padres, pero hace 05 aos cuenta con su propia parcela de 02 hectreas cultivados con plantas de cacao y caf. La clave de su xito radica en la creatividad y las ganas de trabajar, sus plantas estn trabajadas de manera tecnificada porque recibe capacitacin de los Ingenieros Agrnomos, su producto con mayor demanda es el grano del cacao, por la calidad del y es gracias a los buenos rditos econmicos. Normalmente trabaja solo, pero en tiempos de cosecha contrata jornaleros, de esa manera pueda avanzar con mayor celeridad en la extraccin y seleccin de sus frutos. Su plan a futuro es seguir ampliando su produccin agrcola para que de esa manera pueda seguir satisfaciendo a sus clientes, y por ende mejorar su condicin de vida. Este es su primer crdito con MFP, sabe que este aporte le ser de mucha utilidad en el progreso de su trabajo. Agradece a la institucin por concederle el crdito. Con el crdito solicitado contratar jornaleros para que le apoyen en las cosechas y sacar la mala hierba de sus campos.
texts.en: Cayo is 28 years old and he lives with his partner, Ruth. Their son, Jose, is 2 years old and he is the fruit of their relationship. They live together in a house which they own and where mutual understanding reigns. As an adolescent, Cayo worked in his parents' fields. But for the past 5 years he has had his own 2-hectare parcel of land where he cultivates cocoa and coffee. The key to his success lies on his creativity and his eagerness to work. His plants are cared for in a technically sound manner, especially because he has received training from the Agricultural Engineers. His product which is in highest demand is the cocoa grains for its quality and it is yields the best economic returns. He usually works alone but during the harvest season he hires laborers to help him advance faster in the extraction and selection of the products. His plan for the future is to keep expanding his agricultural production in order to keep his clients satisfied, and therefore improve his quality of life. His is his first loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and he knows that his support will be very useful in the progression of his work. He is thankful to the organization for granting him this loan. With his loan he plans on hiring laborers to help with the harvest and to help him with the weeds in his fields.

loan.use: to hire laborers to help with the harvest.

loan.name: Satelital Group

texts.es: La Sra. Carmen Rosa tiene una librera , esta con su negocio cerca de un ao y se siente feliz por que ha prosperado mucho, en su librera vende todo tipo de tiles de escolares como cuadernos, hojas, lapiceros etc. por otro lado tambin tiene varios oficios que le permiten ingresos adicionales como dedicarse a la cosmetologa y la preparacin de tortas, Carmen es muy trabajadora quiere seguir progresando y sobretodo ayudar a sus hijos para que tengan una buena educacin y un mejor futuro es para eso que se esfuerza. Ella pertenece al grupo SATELITAL integrado por 07 socias todas son amigas y vecinas de ventanilla Per, en esta oportunidad el dinero de su prstamo lo usara para comprar productos para su librera.
texts.en: Carmen Rosa owns a stationery store which she has had for nearly one year. She feels happy because it has done very well. In her store she sells all kinds of school supplies such as composition books, paper, pens, etc. She also has several trades which allow her to make additional income such as cosmetology and making cakes. Carmen is very hard working and would like to continue making progress, above all helping her children to achieve a good education and a better future. This is why she works hard. She is a member of the "Satelital" group which has seven members who are all friends and neighbors. They all live in Ventanilla, Peru. On this occasion, Carmen Rosa will use her loan to buy products for her stationery store.

loan.use: to buy stationery products for her store

loan.name: Brenda Natali

texts.es: Brenda Natali es madre soltera de dos pequeos por quienes sale adelante y esta dispuesta a dar la vida por ellos. Para ofrecerles una vida cmoda trabaja en una maquiladora de la ciudad para poder cubrir los gastos del hogar. La seora Brenda en este momento desea remodelar su casa por dentro y quiere ir iniciado con una pintada por dentro por que las paredes ya se encuentran en malas condiciones y desea realizar esto lo antes posible antes de que se agrave el problema.
texts.en: Brenda Natali is a single mother of two little ones for whom she strives to move forward and he is ready to give her life for the. In order or offer them a comfortable life and to cover the household expenses she works at a manufacturing plant in the city. Brenda wishes to remodel the interior of her house. She will start out by painting the walls, given they are in poor condition. She wants to carry this out as soon as possible before the problem becomes worse.

loan.use: to paint the interior of her home.

loan.name: Ral Vicente

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal SAN JOSE DE URUBAMBA; La socia vive en el distrito de Urubamba en la provincia de Urubamba, departamento del Cusco.
El socio tiene 53 aos de edad y El socio es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos el socio trabaja en una minera en el poblado de Urubamba, el socio se encarga de trasladar los minerales de la mina, el socio desea el crdito para invertir en contratar maquinarias para el trabajo en la minera; el socio solicita el prstamo para invertir en el alquiler de la maquinaria.
El socio valora y agradece el crdito que le otorgaran para mejorar su calidad de vida, as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the "San Jos de Urubamba" community bank. He lives in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.
The borrower is 53 years old, lives with his partner, and has two children. He works in the mining industry in the town of Urubamba. He is in charge of transporting ore from the mine. He would like this loan to invest in hiring machinery for his mine work. He is requesting the loan to invest in hiring machinery.
The borrower appreciates and is grateful for the loan that he is being given to improve his quality of life. He also pledges to make all his repayments on time.

loan.use: to invest in hiring machinery

loan.name: Javier

texts.es:
Javier tiene 70 aos de edad, l es casado, reside en la ciudad de Chiclayo, junto a su esposa, en casa propia.
Javier ofrece servicio de transporte de carga, cuenta con una unidad mvil, la cual es su herramienta fundamental de trabajo. De dedica a transportar mercadera de todo tipo, con esta actividad l sustenta los gastos de su hogar.
Los ingresos de Javier han mejorado en estos ltimos meses. El desea poder seguir brindando un buen servicio para seguir teniendo buena acogida en sus clientes por ello, est solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1200 nuevos soles, para que pueda darle un mantenimiento adecuado a su vehculo.
Javier es una persona puntual, con buenas referencias de parte de las personas que lo conocen y estiman, pues lo consideran una persona honesta trabajadora y responsable.
texts.en:
Javier is 70 years old and married. He lives in his own home in the city of Chiclayo, together with his wife.
Javier offers a service transporting cargo. He has a vehicle which is his main work tool. He transports all types of merchandise and, through this business activity, he covers his household expenses.
Javier's income has improved over recent months. He would like to be able to continue providing a good service so that he can continue pleasing his customers. For this reason, he is requesting a loan for 1,200 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that he can have appropriate maintenance work carried out on his vehicle.
Javier is a very punctual person who has good references from people who know him and respect him. They consider him to be an honest, hard-working and responsible person.

loan.use: to have maintenance work carried out on his vehicle

loan.name: Daniel Bautista

texts.es:
Daniel de 43 aos de edad, es soltero, tiene casa propia con los servicios de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de San Jos a unos 15 minutos de la provincia de Chiclayo. En la cual los pobladores desarrollan como actividad principal la pesca, comercializacin de pescado y crianza de aves de corral.
Daniel se dedica a la compra y venta de pescado fresco en forma ambulatoria, desde hace algunos aos, su producto lo oferta por las calles de la ciudad de Chiclayo, ya que cuenta con clientela que le hace pedidos fijos. La venta de sus productos le ayudan a cubrir sus necesidades diarias.
Ha solicitado un prstamo de 800 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para comprar ms pescado fresco y a la vez pescado salado, lo que le permitir incrementar sus ingresos para poder pagar su crdito y mejorar su calidad de vida. La meta que se a propuesto Daniel es tener en un futuro un negocio que se dedique a la venta al por mayor de pescado a empresas grandes (como mercados y supermercados) con esfuerzo y trabajo lo podr lograr.
texts.en:
Daniel is 43 years old, single, and owns his own home which has water and electricity. It is located in San Jos district, some 15 minutes from Chiclayo province. The main business activities in this district are fishing, selling fish and raising poultry.
Daniel's business is buying and selling fresh fish as an itinerant vendor. He has been in this business for some years. He sells his products in the streets of the city of Chiclayo since he has customers who make regular orders with him. The sale of his products helps him to cover his daily needs.
Daniel has requested a loan for 800 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that he can buy more fresh and salted fish which will allow him to increase his profits. This will enable him to repay his loan and improve his quality of life. Daniel's goal for the future is to own a business selling fish wholesale to large companies (such as markets and supermarkets). With effort and hard work, he will be able to achieve this.

loan.use: to buy more fresh and salted fish

loan.name: Celenia Del Carmen

texts.es: Celenia madre soltera, mujer emprendedora unos de sus hijos trabaja y le ayudan econmicamente, los otros estudian en la secundaria, trabaja como domestica desde hace un tiempo, tiene como proyecto mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda que poco a poco ha ido realizando mejoras gracias al financiamiento de crdito. Con este prstamo construir el porche de la casa para eso requiere comprar materiales como: cemento, arena, portones, lmina de zinc entre otros materiales. Obteniendo proteccin y seguridad siendo el beneficio para su familia.
texts.en: Celenia is a single mother and an enterprising woman. One of her two children works and helps her financially. The other is in high school. She has been working as a janitor for some time. She has a project to improve the infrastructure of her house and gradually she has been making improvements thanks to these loans. With this loan she will build a porch to the house, so she needs to purchase materials such as: cement, sand, a gate, zinc sheeting and other materials. The benefit to her family will be added protection and security.

loan.use: to purchase construction materials to build a porch.

loan.name: Enrique

texts.es:
Enrique tiene 28 aos de edad, l es casado y tiene un hijo. Vive en casa propia ubicada en el casero de Tranca Sasape a 25 minutos de la cuidad de Mrrope, solo cuenta con los servicios de luz, sta es una comunidad pequea que consta de 200 familias aproximadamente.
Enrique se dedica a ofrecer servicio de transporte pblico de pasajeros en una unidad mvil que es de su propiedad. Esta actividad la realiza hace 3 aos, Enrique desarrolla esta actividad en la misma localidad donde vive y en todos los alrededores de las zonas rurales de Mrrope.
Enrique est solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 para que el pueda invertir en compra planchas de eternit para la renovacin de una parte del techo de su domicilio.
Enrique es una persona empeosa y trabajadora, la cual est tratando de superarse cada da para poder ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo.
texts.en:
Enrique is 28 years old, married, and has one child. He lives in his own home which is located in the small village of Tranca Sasape, 25 minutes from the city of Mrrope. The only service his house has is electricity. His is a small community which consists of approximately 200 families.
Enrique provides a public transport system with a vehicle that he owns. He has been in this business for three years. Enrique provides his service in his own town and in all the surrounding areas, in the rural areas of Mrrope.
Enrique is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that he can invest in buying sheets of fiber-cement roofing tiles and replace part of his house roof.
Enrique is a committed and hard-working man who is trying to get ahead every day so that he can offer his son a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy sheets of fiber-cement roofing tiles for the roof of his house

loan.name: Jose Ramos

texts.es:
Jos tiene 38 aos D. edad, l es casado, con 2 hijos en edad escolar, cuenta con casa propia ubicada en L. zona rural del distrito D. Mrrope, cuenta con servicios D. agua y luz, el lugar es una comunidad pequea con un aproximado D. 200 familias.
Jos se gana L. vida desD. hace 6 aos criando y vendiendo animales menores en corrales ubicados en L. parte posterior D. su domicilio, el suele criar ganado porcino, ovino y pavos y patos los alimenta con granos y pastos naturales, cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen punto D. desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que siempre visitan L. zona en donD. vive. Cuenta con ingresos adicionales producto por actividades relacionadas al jornal en agricultura
Jos est solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 3000 nuevos soles para que pueda invertir en L. compra D. animales para su comercializacin y compra D. arroz en verD.. Este negocio cuenta con competencia pero tambin cuenta con un amplio mercado para su comercializacin.
Jos es una persona con muy buenas referencias, sus familiares y amigos lo describen como una persona responsable y trabajadora.
texts.en:
Jos is 38 years old. He is married and has two school-age children. He has his own home, located in a rural area of the Mrrope district. His small community has water and electricity and is maD. up of about 200 families
Jos has learned a living since he was 6 years old by raising and selling small animals in corrals in the behind his house. He usually raises cows, pigs, sheep, turkeys and ducks. He feeds them grains and natural grasses. When the animals have reached a good point of development, he offers them for sale to the traders who always visit the area where he lives. Jos receives additional income from the daily agriculture work he does.
Jos is asking for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of $1100 in order to buy animals to sell and to buy rice seeds. He runs a competent business and also has a big market for his sales.
Jos has very good references. His family and friends describe him as a hard-working and responsible person.

loan.use: to purchase animals in order to sell them.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to build a new room in her house.

loan.name: Cristhian Carolina

texts.es: Cristhian casada, su esposo ingeniero le ayuda econmicamente en los gasto del hogar. Juntos como familia requiere realizar mejoras en la infraestructura de la vivienda para protegerse de los vndalos por la zona donde viven. Con el prstamo comprara materiales de construccin: cemento, arena, bloques, piedras canteras, piedrines, estribus y otros materiales para levantar el muro de la parte del patio. Obteniendo seguridad comodidad y proteccin.
texts.en: Cristhian is married and her husband is an engineer and he helps her financially with the household expenses. Together as a family, they need to make some improvements to the infrastructure of their house to protect themselves from vandals in their neighborhood. With the loan they will purchase construction materials: cement, sand, construction blocks, construction stone, gravel, steel, and other materials they need to build a wall around the patio, to obtain greater comfort and protection.

loan.use: to purchase construction materials to build a wall.

loan.name: Leoncio Elias

texts.es:
Leoncio tiene aos de edad, es soltero y sin carga familiar directa. Vive en casa alquilada la cual est ubicada en el distrito de Jos Leonardo Ortiz, su comunidad es urbana en vas de crecimiento cuenta con luz y agua propia.
Leoncio se dedica a ofrecer servicio de transporte pblico de pasajeros en taxi, unidad mvil que es de su propiedad. Esta actividad la realiza hace 5 aos, Leoncio desarrolla esta actividad en la misma localidad donde vive y en las calles principales de la ciudad.
Leoncio est solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para que el pueda adquirir un artefacto para su vivienda.
Leoncio es una persona bastante empeosa y trabajadora, su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresario para poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Leoncio is single and without any direct family responsibilities. He lives in a rented home located in the Jos Leonardo Ortiz District. He lives in a growing urban community with electricity and running water.
Leoncio offers public transportation to passengers in his taxi, which he owns. He has been working at this for 5 years. Leoncio works in the same area that he lives and in the main streets of the city.
He is asking for a loan from Edpyme Alternative for $200 so that he can buy an appliance for his home. He is a very diligent and hard-working man and his greatest desire is to continue growing as an entrepreneur so he can improve his quality of life.

loan.use: to buy an appliance for his home.

loan.name: Leslier

texts.es:
Leslier tiene 40 aos de edad, l es viudo y vive con su hijo menor en un centro poblado llamado nueva arica el la provincia de Chiclayo.
Leslier se gana la vida desde hace 10 aos criando y vendiendo animales menores en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio, el suele criar ganado porcino, ovino y pavos y patos los alimenta con granos y pastos naturales, cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen punto de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que siempre visitan la zona en donde vive.
Leslier est solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 para que el pueda invertir en compra de animales con sus respectivos alimentos para su posterior comercializacin.
Leslier es conocido en la zona por tener buenas referencias personales sus vecinos la describen como una persona empeosa y trabajadora, la cual est tratando de superarse cada da para poder ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo.
texts.en:
Leiser is 40 years old and is a widow. He lives with his youngest son in an area called Nueva Arica in the Chiclayo province.
Leiser has made a living for the last 10 years by buying and selling animals that he keeps in corrals behind his house. He usually raises cows, pigs, sheep, turkeys and ducks. He feeds them grains and natural grasses. When the animals have reached a good point in their development, he sells them to the traders who always visit the area where he lives.
Leiser is asking for a loan of $750 from Edpyme Alternative in order to buy animals and feed and then sell them. He is known in his neighborhood for having very good references. His neighbors describe him as a diligent and hardworking man, who is always trying to get ahead in order to offer a better quality of life to his son.

loan.use: buy animals and feed.

loan.name: La Estancia (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal La Estancia est formado por 10 mujeres y 2 hombres, quienes trabajan a diario en diferentes actividades para mejorar la economa de sus hogares, son personas muy responsables y amables. Viven por la comunidad de la Estancia que pertenece al Cantn Paute, este cantn es de clima templado propicio para la floricultura y produccin de frutas como las manzanas y peras. Cuenta con varios lugares tursticos para visitar y su gente mantiene su cultura y tradiciones.
La Seorita. Jenny vive por el sector de la Estancia, tiene 18 aos y es madre de una nia de 10 meses de edad. Vive en la casa de sus padres pero de manera independiente.
Nuestra socia hace 2 aos labora en una plantacin de flores de domingo a domingo desde las 7 de la maana hasta las 8 de la noche.
Es su primer crdito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por su mam. El dinero de su crdito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos para iniciar con este negocio.
Su meta es tener su casa propia.
Los dos nios de la fotografa son hijos de dos socias.
texts.en:
The communal bank "La Estancia" is made up of 10 women and 2 men. They work every day on different businesses to improve the finances of their homes. They are very responsible and friendly individuals. They live in the community of La Estancia, belonging to the community of Paute. This community is of a temperate climate conducive of flower harvests and the production of fruits, such as apples and pears. There are various tourist locations to visit and the population maintains their culture and traditions.
Jenny lives in the sector of La Estancia. She is 18 years old and she is the mother of a 10-month old baby girl. She lives at home with her parents, although she is independent.
She has been working at a flower plantation for the past 2 years, from Sunday to Sunday, from 7 in the morning until 8 at night.
This is the first loan she accesses through her communal bank. She was invited to join by her mother. The funds from her loan will be invested in the purchase of poultry to start this new business.
The children in the photograph are the children of two other members.

loan.use: to purchase poultry.

loan.name: Anastacia

texts.es: La Sra. Anastacia es una persona muy trabajadora, actualmente se dedica a la venta de ropa usada , en este momento desea comprar mercanca porque da con da tiene un mayor numero de clientes y su principal objetivo es ofrecerles un excelente servicio ya que este negocio representa la fuente principal de sus ingresos, agradece el apoyo brindado para realizar su proyecto.
texts.en: Anastacia is a very hard working person. She sells used clothing and she wants to buy some merchandise to cater to her increased number of clients. Her primary objective is to offer them an excellent level of service. This business represents her primary source of income. She is thankful for the support towards the realization of her business.

loan.use: to purchase used clothing.

loan.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha de 35 aos de edad, casada con 03 hijos. Vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus hijos, en el casero Palominos, ubicado en el distrito de Tambogrande, Piura. Martha vive en la parte rural de este distrito, pero solo cuenta con servicio de luz.
Martha se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio, el suele criar ganado porcino, ovino y pavos y patos los alimenta con granos y pastos naturales, cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen punto de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que siempre visitan la zona en donde vive.
Martha est solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles los cuales, los utilizar para comprar ms animales y sus respectivos alimentos balanceados.
Martha cuenta con muy buenas referencias laborales de parte de las personas que lo conocen y estiman, pues lo consideran una persona honesta trabajadora y responsable.
texts.en:
Martha is 35 years old and married with three children. She lives in her own home with her husband and her children, in the Palominos neighborhood, located in the Tambogrande district of Piura. Martha lives in the rural part of the district but she does have electricity.
Martha raises and sells animals in corrals located behind her house. She usually raises cows, pigs, sheep, turkeys and ducks. She feeds them grains and natural grasses. When the animals have reached a good point in their development, she puts them up for sale to traders who always visit the area where she lives.
Martha is asking for a loan of $375 dollars from Edpyme Alternativa, which she will use to buy more animals and feed for them.
Martha has great references from the people who know her. They consider her an honest, responsible, hard-working person.

loan.use: to buy animals and feed for them

loan.name: Tomasa

texts.es:
Tomasa tiene 68 aos de edad, casada. Cuenta con casa propia ubicada en una zona rural llamado casero Cruceta a unos 25 kilmetros del distrito de Chiclayo.
Tomasa cuenta con un terreno agrcola en la zona donde reside, contando con 5 hectreas de terreno agrcola de las cuales 3 hectreas son de mango y 2 de arroz, ella trabaja en sus tierras y con los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad se encarga de apoyar en la economa de su familia. Ella cuenta con varios aos de experiencia dedicndose a esta actividad y debido a ello conoce mucho del manejo de estos cultivos.
Tomasa est solicitando un crdito a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para la compra de fertilizantes para el cultivo de mango y arroz esto le permitir cultivo garantizar una buena cosecha que le permitir seguir creciendo y lograr una mejor calidad de vida.
Tomasa es una persona bastante hogarea y estimada por las personas de su comunidad, pues bien conocida por ser una persona tranquila y trabajadora.
texts.en:
Tomasa is 68 years old and married. She has her own home in a rural area called Cruceta, about 25 kilometers from the district of Chiclayo.
Tomasa has farm land in the area where she lives. She has 5 hectares of land and uses 3 of them to grow mango and 2 of them to grow rice. Tomasa works the land and with the her earnings she helps support her family. She has been doing this kind of work for many years and as a result knows a great deal about crop management.
Tomasa is asking for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa $550 in order to buy fertilizer for her mango and rice crops. This will help guarantee a good crop and will allow her to continue growing and to achieve a better quality of life.
Tomasa is a homebody and is known among the people in her community for being peaceful and hard-working.

loan.use: to buy fertilizer for her crops.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to broaden her business by acquiring more merchandise.

loan.name: Lina Mercedes

texts.es:
Lina tiene 34 aos de edad, soltera y sin hijos. Vive en casa propia, con sus padres, su casa est ubicada en un pueblo llamado Cruz del Perdnen la ciudad de Chiclayo. Lina vive en la parte rural de este distrito, y cuenta con los servicios bsicos de agua y luz.
Lina se dedica a prestar servicios como vendedora de productos de uso domstico en una empresa hace 2 aos en la ciudad de Chiclayo, esta actividad que le permite sobrevivir la viene realizando hace mas de 05 aos en otras empresas.
Lina est solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para que ella pueda realizar mejoras en la infraestructura de sus servicios higinicos, logrando de sta manera una mejor calidad de vida
Lina es una persona responsable y empeosa que tiene deseos de salir adelante, objetivo por el que trabaja con esmero.
texts.en:
Lina is 34 years old, single with no children. She lives in her own home, with her parents. Her house is located in a town called Cruz del Perdnen in the city of Chiclayo. Lina lives in the rural area of this district and has the basic services of water and power.
Lina has been working for the last 2 years providing services of selling domestic products in a business in the city of Chiclayo. This activity allows her to survive and she has been doing this for more than 5 years in other enterprises.
Lina is requesting a loan of 1000 new soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she could make improvements to the infrastructure of her hygienic services, thus improving her quality of life.
Lina is a responsible and diligent person who wants to get ahead, a reason for which she works very hard.

loan.use: to make improvements to the infrastructure of her hygienic services.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy spices, vegetables and grains.

loan.name: Arely Del Socorro

texts.es: Arely casada su esposo es comerciante, uno de sus hijos es discapacitado y sus anhel es que avance en el aprendizaje es muy difcil mantener el continuo seguimiento de visitas medica que se requiere para el mejoramiento de su hijo. Tiene su propio negoci una pulpera en donde se cubr los que son gasto econmico. La iniciaron con fondo de crdito ya con una trayectoria de experiencia en el mantenimiento y comercializacin de su producto en venta. Con este ciclo de prstamo ser invertido en la compra de materiales de construccin de un cuarto requiriendo cementos, arena, piedras canteras, baldosa, porcelana, cemento regular para porcelana, hierro, pliegos de peybom, pliegos de fornica entre otros materiales para la construccin de un cuarto que se est requiriendo para mayor comodidad, seguridad y proteccin. Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo al desarrollo de su negocio y el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en: Arely is married and her husband is a merchant. One of her children is handicapped and her goal is to see him advance in school. Learning is very difficult to him especially for the frequent medical visits that he needs to get better. She has her own grocery store business which helps her cover her expenses. They started out with a loan and with experience in management and sales of the products. The funds from this loan cycle will be invested in the purchase of construction materials to build a room: cement, sand, building stones, tiles, porcelain, grout, steel, linoleum sheets, and other materials needed to build a room. It will provide them with greater comfort, security, and protection. She is thankful to the organization for the support in the development of her business and for the welfare of her family.

loan.use: to purchase construction materials to build a room in her house.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase pants, blouses, men's shirts, towels, skin lotions, and silver jewelry for resale.

loan.name: Lili Elvira

texts.es: Lili madre soltera, sus hijos trabajan y le ayudan econmicamente. Mujer trabajadora y emprendedora tiene su propio negocio venta de ropa desde hace un tiempo siendo su ingreso. Sus proyecciones es aumentar sus ventas ingresando nueva variedades de productos. Inicio con ayuda de crditos, ha tenido dificultades cuando se enferma ya que tiene que tratarse medicamente. El prstamo ser invertido en la compra de mercaderas: zapatos, ropas de damas, caballero y nios, ropa interior, bisutera, sandalias, artculos para damas, perfume entre otros productos que le generan mayor ganancia. Agradece a la financiera por su apoyo al desarrollo de su negocio mejorando su nivel vida.
texts.en:
Lili is a single mother. Her children work and they contribute financially. She is a hardworking and enterprising woman who has had her own clothing sales business for some time. It is her source of income. Her plans are to increase her sales by introducing a new variety of products. She started out with the help of a loan. She has had difficulties when she gets sick because she needs to seek medical treatment. this loan will be invested in the purchase of merchandise: shoes, clothing for ladies, men, and children, undergarments, jewelry, sandals, ladies' accessories, perfumes, and other products that generate a larger profit.
She is thankful to the organization for their support in the development of her business and in the improvement of the quality of her life.

loan.use: to purchase merchandise for her store.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to cover her son's university expenses.

loan.name: Unidas De Santa Clara Group

texts.es: El comite se encuentra en el 4 ciclo, las integrantes se mantienen unidas y pagan responsablemente sus cuotas. Se encuentran muy animadas de permanecer en el grupo y se consideran muy buenas amigas. En sus reuniones planean las actividades mensuales que en grupo realizan. La Sra. Mirta Marlene tiene su confitera, se dedica a ella y realiza los bocaditos dulces y salados por pedido, adems sale a vender sandwiches, empanadas y chipas por la zona con ayuda de su hija de 12 aos. Es madre de tres nias que van a la escuela y es por ellas que lucha cada da por salir adelante. Ella desea progresar ms y por eso solicita el crdito para la compra de azcar, harina, cremas dulces, leche, etc.
texts.en: This group is on their 4th loan cycle. The members are a united group and they make their payments responsibly. They are very eager to remain in the group and they consider themselves to be very good friends. During their meetings they plan the monthly activities for the group. Mirta Marlene has a confectionary. She makes the sweet and salty snacks herself, for which she takes orders. She also goes out to sell sandwiches, stuffed pastries, and tapioca cheese breads in the region with her 12-year old daughters help. She is the mother of three girls and they are in school. It is for their sake that she struggles each day to move forward. She wants to progress further and for this she requests a loan. She will purchase sugar, flour, sweet creams, milk, etc.

loan.use: to purchase ingredients to make sweet and savory snacks.

loan.name: Mujeres Virtuosas Group

texts.es: Mujeres Virtuosas se denomina el excelente grupo de mujeres conformado en la ciudad de Villa Elisa, gracias a que la Sra. Damiana contact con la asesora en una reunin semanal que la misma tena en la zona, para informarse de la forma de trabajo que tiene el Comit de Mujeres Emprendedoras, una vez asesorada acerca del programa logr juntar a 15 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando en el 1 ciclo. Todas ellas realizan actividades para recaudar fondos, se ayudan mutuamente para llegar a los objetivos en comn que todas tienen dentro del grupo y con la Fundacin Paraguaya. La sra. Damiana se dedica a la costura, ella realiza prendas para hombres y mujeres, es muy reconocida en la zona por la excelente calidad de sus ropas. Tiene este rubro desde que era una adolescente, pues fue un oficio aprendido de manera rpida a travs de su madre y hoy da se ha convertido en el principal medio de ingreso econmico de su familia. Ella solicita el crdito para poder comprar telas de distintas calidades y colores a modo de poder confeccionar ms y tener mayor variedad para sus clientes.
texts.en:
The name of this group is "Mujeres Virtuosas", meaning "Virtuous Women". It is an excellent group of women from the city of Villa Elisa. Thanks to Damiana who contacted an assessor at a weekly meeting in the region to inform herself on the kind of work carried out by Comite de Mujeres Emprendedoras. Once she was informed on the program she was able to bring together a group of 15 women, and now they are on their first loan cycle. They all have business activities to earn an income. They help each other to meet their common group objectives and with Fundacion Paraguaya (Kiva Field Partner).
Damiana is a seamstress. She makes articles of clothing for men and women and she is very well known in the region for the excellent quality of clothing she makes.
She has had this business since she was an adolescent. It was a trade that she quickly learned from her mother and today it has converted into the primary source of income for her family.
She requests a loan to purchase fabrics of different qualities and colors in order to be able to produce more and to have a larger selection for her clients.

loan.use: to purchase fabrics.

loan.name: Women Of The Future Group

texts.es: Este grupo del Barrio San Miguel surgi por contacto de la Directora General con la fundacin, el grupo se encuentra en el 6 ciclo, opera con la Fundacin desde el ao 2009. Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. Marisa, ella se desempea como directora de finanzas, tiene 3 hijos dos mayores y una pequea, su marido es comerciante y ella tiene un local de venta de ropas en el nuevo circuito comercial. Cuenta la Sra. Marisa que el crdito que espera recibir lo utilizar para la compra de ropas para volver a surtir su mesita, y poder mejorar sus ingresos y el de su familia. Todas las seoras del grupo son mujeres muy trabajadoras y luchadoras que desean con muchas ganas sobresalir.
texts.en:
This group from the community of San Miguel came together following a contact from the Director General with the organization. This group is on their 6th loan cycle. They have been with Fundacion (Kiva Field Partner) since 2009.
One of the members of this group is Marisa. She is the director of finances. She has 3 children, two are grown and one is a girl. Her husband is a merchant and she has a clothing store in the new commercial circuit.
Marisa says that she hopes to invest her loan in the purchase of clotting to supply her business and to improve her income and that of her family.
All of the members of the group are women who very hardworking fighters who are very eager to excel.

loan.use: compra de ropas, pantalones, camisas, remeras, poleras, camperas, busos, etc.

loan.name: New Hope Group

texts.es: Para la formacin D. presente comit, tuvo el inicio la Seora Norma D. km. 9 Acaray de Ciudad D. Este. Ella contact con sus vecinas y amigas para formar el comit en su comunidad. El comit se denomina Nueva Esperanza" estn en el Quinto Ciclo con 15 integrantes, es un grupo que se destaca en el barrio por ser muy unidas, solidarias y responsables entre ellas, realizan actividades para el fondo D. grupo en caso de que alguna compaera est con dificultades de pago. En el caso de la Sra. Nancy, solicita el crdito para la compra de ropas nuevas y usadas para seguir creciendo en esta actividad, ms ahora que se aproxima el fro D. invierno. Ella se dedica netamente a esto pues es un ingreso seguro que posee debido a la cantidad de buenos clientes que fue adquiriendo a travs D. tiempo. Hoy da todas estn con esperanzas de poder prosperar con la ayuda de Kiva y Fundacin Paraguaya.
texts.en:
The group was formed by Norma of km. 9 Acaray of Ciudad D. Este. She contacted her neighbors and friends to form a group in their community. The name of this group is "Neuva Esperanza", meaning "New Hope". The 15 members of the group are on their fifth loan cycle. It is a group well-known in their community for being very united, supportive, and responsible to each other. They carry out activities for the group fund in case a member ever has trouble with their payment.
IN the case of Nancy, she requests a loan to purchase new and used clothing to keep her business growing, most importantly now that the cold of winter approaches. She dedicates herself solely to this business because it is a secure source of income given the number of good clients whom she has acquired through time.
Today they all hope to prosper with the help of Kiva and Fundacion Paraguaya (Kiva Field Partner).

loan.use: to purchase new and used clothing and cosmetics for resale.

loan.name: Virgen De Ftima Group

texts.es: Virgen de Ftima se denomina el excelente grupo de mujeres conformado en la ciudad de Ita, gracias a que la Sra. Teresa, quien se dedica a la venta de frutas, contact con la asesora en una reunin semanal que la misma tena en la zona, para informarse de la forma de trabajo que tiene el Comit de Mujeres Emprendedoras, logr juntar a 22 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya en el 8 ciclo. Todas ellas realizan actividades para recaudar fondos, se ayudan mutuamente para llegar a los objetivos en comn que todas tienen dentro del grupo. La Sra. Zunilda solicita en esta ocasin el crdito para la compra de ropas, cosmticos, frutas, verduras, ya que posee un negocio modesto dedicndose a la venta de esta variedad de productos, pues es su medio de ingreso econmico para poder mantener a su familia y a ella misma.
texts.en: The name of this excellent group of women is "Virgen de Fatima" and it is located in the city of Ita. It is thanks to Teresa, a fruits merchant, that the group of 22 women was formed following her contact with the assessor at a weekly reunion held in the region to inform herself on the work carried out by the Comite de Mujeres Emprendedoras. They are working very comfortably on their 8th loan cycle. They all have activities to earn an income. They help each other to reach the common objectives of the group. At this time Zunilda requests a loan to purchase clothing, cosmetics, fruits, and vegetables. She has a modest business selling this variety of products. This is the source of income that she earns to support her family and herself.

loan.use: to purchase clothing, fruits and vegetables, and cosmetics for resale.

loan.name: Sergio

texts.en:
Sergio, from the village of Lingating, Baungon, Bukidnon, is 66 years old and married. To make a living, Sergio has been raising pigs to sell for over six years, earning approximately 5000 PHP a month.

In 2008, Sergio joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Having repaid his previous loan of 17000 PHP from HSPFI that was used to purchase baby livestock to raise and sell, he is requesting his seventh loan for 23000 PHP to purchase medication for his livestock. Sergio plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand his enterprise.
